src_text: Taolo ya Dikoduwa Kamora Dikgohola.
tgt_text: Lulawulo lwenhlekelele ngemuva kwetikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete lebisitse matshediso bathong bohle ba lahlehetsweng ke beng ka bona dikgoholeng tsa morao tse mpe tse ileng tsa hlasela dibaka tse ngata tsa naha ya rona, haholoholo KwaZulu-Natal..     Sepheo ka tsebahatso ya Maemo Dikoduwa Naha le dithuso tsa boiphediso tse sa tswa tsebahatswa ke Presidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne le ho netefatsa karabelo atlehileng le hlophisehileng makaleng ohle mmuso, ka Setsi sa Taolo ya Naha ya Dikoduwa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalisa kudzabuka kwayo kubo bonkhe bantfu labalahlekelwe tihlobo tabo labatitsandzako kuletikhukhula letidale umonakalo letisandza kwenteka letikhahlamete tincenye letinyeti telive letfu, ikakhulu KwaZulu-Natal..     Kumenyetelwa kwetingenelelo tekuhhamula Simo Savelonkhe Senhlekelele netingenelelo tetenhlalomnotfo letisandza kumenyetelwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, kuhloswe ngato kucinisekisa kuphendvula lokuhlanganisiwe nalokunemphumelelo kuyo yonkhe imikhakha yahulumende, ngekusebentisa Sikhungo Savelonkhe Sekulawula Tenhlekelele.

src_text: Biliyone ya diranta eo mmuso e ntshitseng sebedisetswa ho tshehetsa maiteko dithuso le ho iphumana, ho kgutlisa ditshebeletso tsa motheo le ho phallela ba hlokang ka ho ba thusa ka dijo, metsi, botshabelo, tsa bohlweki le diaparo.
tgt_text: Sigidzigidzi sinye semarandi hulumende lasente kutsi sitfolakale sisetjentiselwa kwesekela kuhhamula nemitamo yekuvusetela kabusha, kubuyisela esimeni tinsita letisisekelo kanye nekuniketa lusito lwebuntfu ngendlela yekudla, emanti, kuhanjiswa kwekungcola kanye netimphahla tekugcoka.

src_text: Motjha wa ho aha botjha dibaka tse amehileng se qadile mme le batho ba naha ya rona ba kopane ka maikemisetso ho thusa ba lahlehetsweng ke bodulo le thepa ya bona..     Tlhahisoleseding ka Lefu laCoronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Lenchubo yekwakha kabusha tindzawo letitsintsekile seyivele icalile njengaloku bantfu belive lakitsi babumbana ekuncumeni kutsi basite labo labalahlekelwe ngemakhaya abo naloko labanako.

src_text: Kabinete kgathatsehile ka ho eketseha ha morao tjena ha ditshwaetso tsa COVID-19 dikarolong tse ding tsa naha mme ipileditse ho bohle ho nka mehato ya ho itshireletsa kgahlano le vaerase ena kotsi, haholoholo mariha tjena..     Vaerase ena ntse le kotsi mme ho enta ntse le sebetsa se bohlokwa haholo seo re ka itshireletsang ka sona.
tgt_text: Lokusha mayelana neSifo seLigciwane leKhorona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete thabiswa ke hore batho ba bangata ba ntse ba kgetha ho enta le tshireletso ya bona ya pele kgahlano le COVID-19 kamora hore dipalopalo tsa morao di bontshe hore batho ba baholo ba fetang dipersente tse mashome mahlano ba se ba entile diprovenseng tse hlano..     Kabinete ipiletsa ho ba so ente ho enta molemong wa ho itshireletsa le beng ka bona.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikucaphele ngekukhatsateka kwenyuka lokusandza kwenteka kwelufu lwe-COVID-19 kuletinye tincenye futsi icela bonkhe bantfu kutsi batsatse tinyatselo tekutivikela kuleligciwane lelibulalako, ikakhulu ngalesikhatsi sasebusika.

src_text: Bohle re lokela ho tswela pele le ho ikamahanya le melao ya ho itshireletsa ho COVID-19 kenyeletsang ho rwala semonkwana se kwahelang nko le molomo, ho hlapa matsoho ka metsi le sesepa, kapa ho sebedisa sehlwekisi se nang le alcohol ballwang dipersenteng tse 70, le ho arohana le ba bang ka bonnyane mitara..     Thuso Imollang Nakong ya Mathata (SRD).
tgt_text: Leligciwane solomane lisasenebungoti lobungapheli kantsi kugoma kusikhali lesiyimphumelelo lenkhulu sekutsi sitivikele.

src_text: Kabinete kgothaleditse baahi ba fumanang R350 ya SRDGrant ho etsa dikopo hape, kamora hore ho kenngwe tshebetsong melawana metjha laolang dikopo le ho lokela ha batho ho fumana dithuso.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ijabulile kubona bantfu labanyenti bachubeka nekukhetsa kugoma njengendlela yekucala yekutivikela ku-COVID-19 ngemuva kwelubalobalo lolusandza kwentiwa lolukhomba kutsi sesifinyelele ngetulu kwe-50 yemaphesenti ebantfu labadzala lasebagomile etifundzeni letisihlanu..     Ikhabhinethi icela labo labasengakagomi kutsi bagome kute bativikele kanye nalabatsandzekako babo.

src_text: Dikopo di ka etswa websaeteng ya Setheo sa Dithuso tsa Setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa (SASSA) leng:https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.Mokgwatshebetso wa dikopo butswe ka la 23 Mmesa 2022 mme etswa inthaneteng molemong wa ho potlakisa katleho ya ona..     Thuso ena ya ho imolla bohlokwa haholo malapeng hlokang le ka sulafallwang ke maphelo ka lebaka la bofuma le ho hloka mesebetsi.
tgt_text: Kufanele kutsi sonkhe sichubeke nekugcina tonkhe tinchubo tekutivikela ku-COVID-19, lokufaka ekhatsi kufaka sifonyo lesivala imphumulo nemlomo, sigeze tandla ngemanti nangensipho, nome sisebentise sibulalimagciwane sekugeza tandla lesine-70% ye-alkhoholi, kanye nekugcina libanga lekuchelelana leliphephile lokungenani libe imitha yinye..     Sibonelelo Sahulumende Sekuhhamula Inhlupheko (i-SRD).

src_text: Mmuso ikemiseditse ho fana ka dithuso tsa setjhaba hoba hlokang haholo ba kgone ho fumana tseo ba di hlokang tsa motheo..     Polokeho le Tshireletseho.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi igcugcutele takhamuti letitfola sibonelelo sahulumende sekuhhamula inhlupheko kutsi tiphindze futsi tifake ticelo, ngemuva kwekungeniswa kwemitsetfosimiso lemisha lelawula ticelo kanye nekufaneleka kutfola lesibonelelo sahulumende.

src_text: Kabinete tswella le ho nyatsa ho bolawa ka sehloho ha basadi mme ananetse karabelo potlakileng ya mapolesa ha tshwara babelaellwa polaong ya Mofumahatsana Hillary Gardee (28), waKamaguguMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Ticelo tingafakwa kuwebhusayithi ye-Ejensi Yesibonelelomali yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASSA ku: https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Kabinete boetse nyatsitse ho bolawa ha batho ba tsheletseng Khayelitsha, Motsekapa.
tgt_text: Luhlelo lwekufaka ticelo luvulwe mhla tinge-23 Mabasa 2022 kantsi lusebentisa ngalokuphelele inchubo yedijithali kute kutsi kutsatse sikhatsi sekukuphendvula lesiphangisako..     Lesibonelelomali sekuhhamula siyinetha yekuphephela lemcoka yemindeni leswelako lengabe ikhahlabetwe buphuya nekuswela umsebenti.

src_text: Dipolao tsena tse sehloho di re hopotsa hore re lokela ho sebetsa ka matla re le setjhaba ho fedisa dikgoka le dikgoka tsa bong le polao ya basadi (GBVF)..     Kabinete ipileditse ho bohle naheng ena ho sebetsa mmoho le mmuso ntweng kgahlano le bosenyi le GBVF.
tgt_text: Hulumende utimisele kuniketa lusito lwetenhlalo kulabo abahlaseleka lula kakhulu kute kutsi bakhone kuhlangabetana netidzingo tabo letisisekelo.

src_text: Mmoho re ka netefatsa hore metse le diterata tsa rona di bolokehile bakeng sa batho bohle, ho kenyeletsa maqheku, basadi le bana..     Moruo.
tgt_text: Tekuphepha Nekuvikeleka.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho bulwa semmuso ha feme ya ho etsa ditene ya Kwastina ya Corobrik, Driefontein,Gauteng ke Presidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro la la 4 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyachubeka nekuhlaba kubulawa kwabomake lokute ingcondvo futsi iyakwemukela kuphendvula ngekushesha lokwentiwe tiphatsimandla tekucinisekisa kugcinwa kwemtsetfo ngekubamba basolwa labayamaniswa nekufa kwaMk.

src_text: Feme ena ya maemo phahameng haholo ke karolo ya matsete diranta tse dimiliyone tse 800 tsamayang mmoho le diranta tse ding tse dimiliyone tse 200 tse behetsweng ho atolosa feme ya Corobrik ya konkreiti KwaZulu-Natal.Corobrik ke nngwe ya dikgwebo tsa mona tse ileng tsa utlwa boipiletso ba Presidente Ramaphosa ba hore dikgwebo tsa Afrika Borwa le tsa matjhaba di tsetele moruong wa naha ena.
tgt_text: Hillary Gardee (28), waKamagugu eMpumalanga.

src_text: Kabinete elelletswe hore moruo fokolang wahydrogen matlafaditswe kamora ho thakgolwa ha lori sebedisang hydrogen ke Anglo American.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ichubeka futsi ngekuhlaba sento sekubulawa kwebantfu labasitfupha eKhayelitsha, eKapa.

src_text: Lori ena neng sebedisa diesel mme ya fetolelwa tshebedisong ya hydrogen le sebedisang le dibetri tsa lithium-ion keya pele lefatsheng.
tgt_text: Lokubulala lokute ingcondvo kuyinkhumbuto yekutsi kufanele sente kakhulu njengemmango kute sicedze budlova kanye nebudlova lobucondziswe ebulilini lobutsite kanye nekubulawa kwalabasikati (i-GBVF).

src_text: Moruo wahydrogen hlwauwe le lewa le pele moruong wa naha ya rona lwantshang tshenyo ya tikoloho, mme moruo ona tla ntshetsa pele kgolo moruong thuse le ho thehweng ha mesebetsi..     Kabinetee boetse ananetse matsete mang moruong wa rona ka khampani ya dijo ya Ireland, The Kerry Group butseng feme ya diranta tse dimiliyone tse 650, Hammarsdale,KwaZulu-Natal, eo sepheo ka yona leng ho hlahisa dijo ho ya ho ile kontinenteng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi igcugcutela bonkhe bantfu lapha eveni kutsi basebentisane nahulumende ekulweni nebugebengu kanye ne-GBVF.

src_text: Feme ena ke ikgethang hobane na le dikarolo tsa moshwelella tse kenyeletsang disebediswa tsa eneji nyenyane, tlhahiso ya matla letsatsi ho fokotsa tshebediso ya motlakase wa keriti ya naha ena, mokgwa wa paballo ya eneji, le wa paballo ya metsi, tshebediso ya ona hape le mokgwa wa ho fokotsa tshebediso ya ona.
tgt_text: Ngekubambisana singasenta siciniseko sekutsi imimango yetfu kanye netitaladi tetfu tiphephile kubo bonkhe bantfu, lokufaka ekhatsi bantfu lasebakhulile, bomake nebantfwana.

src_text: The Kerry Group fihlile Afrika Borwa ka 2011, mme matsete yona amang ke letshwao la hore Afrika Borwa ntse ratelwa matsete.
tgt_text: Temnotfo.

src_text: Matsete ana tla kamora ho thakgolwa ha vene ena ya Isuzu D-Max hlahisitsweng naheng, Gqeberha, Kapa Botjhabela kgweding fetileng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikwemukele kuvulwa ngalokusemtsetfweni kwefekthri yekubhaka titini yakwa-Corobriks i-Kwastina lapha eDriefontein eGauteng nguMengameli Ramaphosa ngaLesitsatfu, mhla ti-4 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Koloi ena ya D-MAX ya mehleng ena bontsha boinehelo ba Isuzu naheng ena mmeke nngwe ya dikatleho tse fihletsweng tlasa Lenaneo la Ntshetsopele ya Tlhahiso ya Makoloi (APDP).
tgt_text: Lefekthri lesezingeni lemhlaba yakha incenye yelutjalomali lwetigidzi letinge-R800, loluhamba kanye naletinye tigidzi letinge-R200 letibekelwe kusebenta ngakhonkolo kwe-Corobrik lelapha KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: APDP ke mokgwatshebetso wa kgothatso wa tlhahiso bakeng sa indasteri ya makoloi oo sepheo ka ona leng ho phahamisa tlhahiso indastering boletsweng ya makoloi, ho phahamisa bolengindastering mme ka tsela ena ho thehwe mesebetsi makaleng ohle amanang le tlhahiso ya makoloi.Kediranta tse dibiliyone tse batlang di eba 2,8 tse tla etswa ka tlhahiso ya mona nakong ya tshebetso ya APDP.
tgt_text: I-Corobrik ingulenye yemabhizinisi lamanyenti endzawo laphendvulile kulesimemo lesentiwe nguMengameli Ramaphosa kumabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika kanye nakumabhizinisi emave emhlaba kutsi atjale timali kulelive..     Ikhabhinethi ikucaphele kutsi lomnotfo lomusha longakhiphi ikhabhoni lenyenti ugcugcutelekile ngesikhatsi kwetfulwa iloli lehamba ngemandla ehayidrojini baka-Anglo American.

src_text: Matsete tla thusa ho theha mesebetsi fetang 1000 ka palo ka kotloloho femeng, le meng ya tlatsetso hirang batho ba 24 000, mme sena se tla kenya letsoho matlafatsong ya baahi lebatoweng.
tgt_text: Leloli − lebeyihamba ngedizili yantjintjelwa kutsi ihambe ngehayidrojini, futsi ihamba ngencenye yemandla emabhethri e-lithium-ion – isezingeni lekucala lemhlaba.

src_text: Seboka sa tsa Merafo.
tgt_text: Umnotfo wehayidrojini ubonakale njengelisubuciko lelibekwe embili kutsi kucalwe ngalo kumnotfo lonekhabhoni lephasi walelive, kanye nekuchubela embili kukhula kutemnotfo nekucashwa..     Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela lolunye lutjalomali kumnotfo wetfu lolwentiwe yinkampani yekudla yase-Ireland, i-The Kerry Group, lesungule sikhungomkhicito lesisha setigidzi letinge-R650 lapha eHammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal lokuhloswe ngaso kutsi kukhicitwe kudla lokusimeme kwalelivekati.

src_text: Investing in African Mining Indaba 2022 neng tshwaretswe Cape Town International Convention Centreho tloha ka la 9 ho ya ho la 12 Motsheanong 2022, ke le leng la mapatlelo maholo ho bontshana le tshebedisano pakeng tsa ba amehang indastering ya merafo.
tgt_text: Lesikhungomkhicito sehlukile ngobe sikhombisa timphawu letinyenti tekusimama lokufaka ekhatsi tisetjentiswa letisebentisa emandla agezi lamancane, kuphehlwa kwemandla elilanga kute kuncishiswe kusetjentiswa kwemandla agezi kugridi yendzawo, konga kulahleka kwekushisa, kanye nekubamba emanti ngemphumelelo, kuwasebentisa futsi nekunciphisa kungcola.

src_text: Mookotaba wa ketsahalo ena ne le: “Ntshetsopele ho tsa Merafo Afrika: Matsete Diphetohong ho tsa Eneji, ESG, leMeruo”.
tgt_text: I-Kerry Group yafika lapha eNingizimu Afrika kusukela nga-2011, kantsi kuchubeka kwayo nelutjalomali kuluphawu lwekutsi iNingizimu Afrika iyindzawo yelutjalomali longatikhetsela yona.

src_text: Kabinete na le tshepo ya hore Seboka sa tsa Merafo se tla thusa ho pepesa le ho phahamisa Afrika Borwa jwaloka naha ka kgahlang batsetedi..     Afrika Borwa amohela matsete naheng ya rona mme inehetse ho theheng maemo loketseng kgolo kenyeletsang bohle le diphetoho moruong..     Dikamano le Dinaha tsa Matjhaba le tsa Mabatowa.

Kabinete boetse ananetse ditherisano tsa morao tjena tsa Presidente Ramaphosa le Presidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Presidente Emmanuel Macron wa France le Presidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia mapatlelong fapaneng.
tgt_text: Lolutjalomali lulandzela etinyatselweni tekwetfulwa kweveni i-Isuzu D-Max leyakhiwe kulelive eGqeberha eMphumalanga Kapa kulenyanga lephelile.

src_text: Dipuisano tsena di nehile Presidente monyetla wa ho tiisa maqhama le tshebedisano pakeng tsa Afrika Borwa le dinaha tse ding ditabeng tsa bohlokwa boemong ba mabatowa le matjhaba, ho kenyeletsa ho fumana tharollo ya kgotso ntweng ya Ukraine     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Lesitukulwane lesisha sema-D-Max siluphawu lwekutinikela kwe-Isuzu lapha eNingizimu Afrika futsi ingulenye  yetimphumelelo letifezekisiwe ngaphasi kweLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Kukhicitwa Kwetimoto (i-APDP).

src_text: Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete.
tgt_text: Le-APDP iluhlelo lekukhutsata kukhicita lokucondziswe embonini yetimoto lokuhloswe ngalo kugcugcutela umkhicito ngebunyenti kule mboni yetimotoe, ngekugcugcutela  lizingagugu lelengetiwe emkhakheni wemboni yetetimoto ngaleyo ndlela-ke kudaleke ematfuba emsebenti kutinchubo tekukhicita timoto.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho baahi bohle ho mamela Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete tsa mafapha naha mmuso le puo ya lefapha la Bopresidente molemong wa hore ba behe mmuso leihlo..     Ha ho tekwa Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso, mafapha ohle fana ka dintlha tse felletseng tsa merero le tsa bohlokwa tseo ikemiseditseng ho di phetha selemong.
tgt_text: Tilinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi leti-R. 8 letitawukwentiwa emkhicitweni welizingagugu walelive ngekusebentisa umjikeleto we-APDP.

src_text: Sepheo ka Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso ke ho netefatsa hore ditjhelete tsa setjhaba di sebediswa hantle ho thusa setjhaba ka tseo di se hlokang.
tgt_text: Lolutjalomali lutawudala imisebenti ngco lengetulu kwe-1000 kulesosikhungomkhicito bese kutsi bantfu labange-24 000 bacashwe hhayi ngco, lokuyintfo letawufaka ligalelo lelimcoka ekutfutfukiseni lesifundza..     Ingcugcutsela Yetetimayini.

src_text: Dipuo tsa ditekanyetso di boetse ke monyetla wa hore Matona hlalose haholwanyane ka mosebetsi wa mmuso, ho kenyeletsa dikatleho le diphephetso tseo tobanang le tsona.
tgt_text: Ingcungcutsela yeLutjalomali Etimayini Tase-Afrika yanga-2022 lebeyibanjelwe eCape Town International Convention Centre kusukela ngamhla ti-9 kuya mhla ti-12 Inkhwekhweti 2022, ingulenye yetinkhundla letinkhulu kakhulu tekuchumana nekuhlanganyela emkhatsini walabatsintsekako embonini yetimayini.

src_text: Lewa la Qalo ya Tshebediso ya Kgase ya Mafura (LPG).
tgt_text: Ingcikitsi yalomcimbi beyitsi: “Kugucugucuka Kwetimayini e-Afrika: Kutjala Timali eKuntjintjeni Kutemandla, i-ESG neMinotfo.”.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Lewa la Qalo ya Tshebediso ya LPG, le phatlaladitsweng hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka lona ka Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi inelitsemba lekutsi leNgcungcutsela Yetetimayini itawusita ekukhombiseni nasekugcugcuteleni iNingizimu Afrika njengendzawo yelutjalomali longatikhetsela yona.

src_text: Sepheo ka lewa ke ho atolosa indasteri ya kgase ya mafura naheng.
tgt_text: Live laseNingizimu Afrika liyalwemukela lutjalomali lapha kulelive letfu futsi itimisele kudala timo letikuvunako loko kute kutsi kube nekukhula lokufaka wonkhe wonkhe kanye nekugcuculwa kwemnotfo.

src_text: LPG tla ba le seabo se molemo phapanong ya mehlodi ya eneji..     Hara tse ding lewa le tla laola theko makaleng fapaneng tlhahiso le ho tshehetsa tlhahiso ya meqomo ya LPG naheng ena.
tgt_text: Budlelwane bemave emhlaba nebesigodzi.

src_text: Le tla boela le rute setjhaba ka melemo ya ho sebedisa LPG jwaloka mofuta mong wa eneji..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela kucocisana lokusandza kwenteka kwaMengameli Ramaphosa naMengameli Joe Biden waseMelika, Mengameli Emmanuel Macron waseFrance naMengameli Hakainde Hichilema waseZambiya ngetinkhundla tekuchumana letahlukene.

src_text: Le tla fumaneha kamora hore le phatlalatswe ke Lefapha la Diminerale le Eneji howww.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: Lokucocisana kwente kutsi Mengameli acinise budlelwane bemacembu lamabili kanye nekusebentisana emkhatsini weNingizimu Afrika nemibuso lebalingani mayelana netindzaba letimcoka tesifundza netemave emhlaba, lokufaka ekhatsi kutfola likhambi lekuthula kuloludvweshu lwase-Ukraine     Tincumo teKhabhinethi.

src_text: Moralotshebetso wa Batho ba sa Itekanelang wa Lewa wa Naha Mabapi le Matsholo ho Hlokomedisa ka Ditokelo tsa ba sa Itekanelang.
tgt_text: Emavoti eSabelomali.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Moralotshebetso wa Batho ba sa Itekanelang wa Lewa wa Naha mabapi le Matsholo ho Hlokomedisa ka Ditokelo tsa ba sa Itekanelang.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi icela tonkhe takhamuti kutsi tilandzelele laMavoti lahlukahlukene eSabelomali lentiwa ngematiko ahulumende wavelonkhe kanye neLihhovisi laMengameli kutsi tente hulumende kutsi atilandze.

src_text: Moralotshebetso tla tataisa lekala la poraefete le la setjhaba hore netefatse ho sireletswa ha ditokelo tsa basa itekanelang, jwalokaha di sireleditswe le Molaong wa Motheo wa Riphaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Ngesikhatsi seMavoti eSabelomali, onkhe ematiko anika inchazelo lenemininingwane yemasu awo kanye naloko lakubeke embili latawucala ngako akwente ngemnyaka.
EMavoti eSabelomali ahlose kucinisekisa kutsi timali tahulumende tisetjentiswa ngelikhono yini kuhlangabetana netidzingo temmango.

src_text: Moralotshebetso nehelana kadisebediswa tse tla thusa ho tlosa kgethollo thibelang ho nkuwa ha diqeto, haholoholo tse amanang le batho basa itekanelang boetse lemosa batho ba sa itekanelang hore ba tsebe ditokelo tsa bona jwalokaha di sireleditswe ke Molao wa Motheo.Moralotshebetso boetse fana ka thupelo hlokomedise mehloding ya ditaba le setjhabeng ka ditokelo tsa batho basa itekanelang thusa ho kenngweng tshebetsong ha Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang.Afrika Borwa saenne Tumellano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Ditokelo tsa Batho basa Itekanelang mmoho le Tokomaneya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) yaLekgotla la Tumellano la Ditokelo tsa Botho le Batho Afrika mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang leng Tokomane ya Tumellano ya Ditokelo tsa basa Itekanelang Afrika).
Ho bontshanwe le bohle ba amehang, ho kenyeletsa Ntshetsopele ya Moruo ya Naha le Lekgotlala Basebetsi..     Seboka sa Lefatshe Metseng ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe.
tgt_text: LaMavoti aphindze futsi ente kutsi kube nenkhundla lefanele kutsi Tindvuna tichaze kabanti umsebenti wahulumende, lokufaka ekhatsi timphumelelo netinsayeya.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Seboka saMetse ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe ka Labohlano la la 27 le ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong 2022, Gauteng..     Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Tlaleho ya Maikutlo ka Seboka saMetseng ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe ka Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: Kukhishwa kweLisubuciko lekwenta Igesi Leluketjeti (i-LPG).

src_text: Kabinete laetse hore ho be le dipontshano tse ding lebohle ba amehang..     Seboka ke sehlohlolo sa mosebetsi entsweng ngwahola ileng wa nonya maikutlo ba fapaneng ba amehang     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile Kukhishwa kweLisubuciko le-LPG kutsi lifezekiswe, lelashicilelwa ngeNdlovulenkhulu 2022 kutsi kubonisanwe ngalo nemmango.

src_text: Seboka sa Bohlano sa Lefatshe sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana.
tgt_text: Lelisubuciko kuhloselwe ngalo kutsi kwengetwe imboni ye-LPG kulelive.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwara Seboka sa Bohlano sa Lefatshe sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana, Durban International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natal ho tloha ka Sontaha sa la 15 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 20 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: I-LPG itawufaka ligalelo lelibonakalako ekwehlukaniseni imitfombolusito yetemandla..     Lelisubuciko emkhatsini waletinye tingenelelo, litawulawula intsengo yetinchubo temkhicito kanye nekwesekela kwakhiwa emabhodlela e-LPG kulelive.

src_text: Ke lekgetlo la pele Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Basebetsi (ILO) tshwarela seboka sena Afrika..     Baetapele ba Dinaha, matona 120, baemedi ba dikarolo tse tharo tsa dinaha tse 187 tseo leng ditho tsa ILO, makgotla Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba, ditheo tsa thuto phahameng, mekgatlo ya baahi, mekgatlo eo eseng ya mmuso le mehlodi ya ditaba ba lebelletswe ho ba sebokeng sena..     Seboka se tla boela se nehe Afrika Borwa monyetla wa ho beha ka pele Molao wa Motheo wa naha jwalokaha sireletsa ditokelo tsa bana.
tgt_text: Litawuphindza futsi lifundzise ummango mayelana netinzuzo tekusebentisa i-LPG njengalenye indlela yetemandla.

src_text: Naha tla bontshana le dinaha tse ding tse itlhommeng pele phedisong ya mosebetsi wa bana mme ithute ho tsona.
tgt_text: Lelisubiciko litawutfolakala ngemuva kwekutsi selishicilelwe Litiko Letetimbiwa Nemandla ku: www.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: Imbizo ya Presidente ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke (DDM).
tgt_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lwavelonkhe Lwelisubuciko lolumayelana neMkhankhaso Wekuvusa Kucashelwa kweMalungelo Ekukhubateka eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.

src_text: Presidente Ramaphosa tla ba le Imbizo ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke Mpumalanga ka Labohlano la la 20 Motsheanong 2022 tlasa mookotaba: “Ha re siye motho morao”.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iluvumile Luhlakamsebenti Lwavelonkhe Lwelisubuciko lolumayelana neMkhankhaso Wekuvusa Kucashelwa kweMalungelo eKukhubateka eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.

src_text: Jwaloka mokgwa wa bohlokwa wa ho ba le seabo ha setjhaba, Imbizo fa Presidente monyetla wa ho buisana le ba amehang ba fapaneng ka ho otloloha – haholoholo batho ba metseng ya mahae – le ho mamela mathata bona ka sepheo sa ho buisana le bona ka ona..     Sepheo ka Imbizo ya Presidente ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke ke ho lwantsha tse sitisang phumantsho momahaneng ya ditshebeletso le ho kgothaletsa seabo sa baahi ho ikamahantswe le Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke..     Maafrika Borwa ka latela le ho ba leseabo dipuisanong kaho kena diwebsaeteng tsa ho etsa setswalle tlasa #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: Loluhlakamsebenti kuhloselwe ngalo kukhomba indlela imikhakha yomibili yahulumende naletimele ekucinisekiseni emalungelo ebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka kutsi ayavikeleka, njengaloku abhalwe kuMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika.

Ho ketekwa ha selemo le selemo ha Kgwedi ya Afrika le Letsatsi la Afrika ka Laboraro lala 25 Motsheanong ho tla ba le mookotaba oo leng: “Selemo sa Phepo Nepahetseng: Matlafatso ya Phepo Nepahetseng le ya dijo tse lekaneng bohle kontinenteng ya Afrika”..     Jwaloka karolo ya ponelopele ya nako telele ho Agenda 2063 (eo leng leano la ntshetsopele la Afrika la ho fihlella ntshetsopele ya tsa bophelo kenyeletsang bohle le ya moshwelella ya dilemo tse fetang tse mashome mahlano), mookotaba ona tsepame bokgoning ba batho ba Afrika mme ho tsepamisitswe maikutlo haholo basading, batjheng le baneng.
tgt_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lingumgodla lotawusita ekususeni tihibe letibandlululako ekutsatseni tincumo, ikakhulu leto letiphatselene nebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka.

src_text: Sena se bohlokwa haholo bakeng sa ntshetsopele hobane se lebisa maphelong ntlafetseng bakeng sa motho ka mong, se lebise le meputsong hodimo le kunong hodimo bakeng sa dinaha..     Ntlha ka sehloohong meketeng ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ke Beke ya Dikgokahano ya Afrika tla ketekwa Constitutional Hill, Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 23 ho ya ho la 27 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Luphindze futsi lukhumbute bantfu labaphila nekukhubateka kutsi bati kutsi emalungelo abo avikelwe nguMtsetfosisekelo.

Loluhlelomsebenti luphindze futsi lwente kutsi kube nekuceceshwa, betindzaba lababikako kanye nekuvusa kucaphelisa ummango mayelana nemalungelo ebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka..     Lunika emandla kutsi Umtsetfo Lokusakhulunyisanwa Ngawo lomayelana neBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika ke monyetla wa ho phahamisa kopano ya Afrika le momahano tebileng ya lebatowa, le ho inehela botjha ha Afrika bokamosong bo le bong.
tgt_text: Live laseNingizimu Afrika lisisayinile Sivumelwano saMhlabuhlangene (i-UN) lesimayelana neMalungelo eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka kanye neNchubo yaMhlabuhlangene kuMculu wase-Afrika lomayelana neLuntfu neMalungelo eBantfu mayelana neMalungelo eBantfu Labaphila Ngekukhubateka (Inchubo yase-Afrika yeBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka).

src_text: Kabinete hopotsa bohle hore ditabatabelo tsa rona tsa naha di amana haholo le botsitso, kopano le tswelopele ya Afrika     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Loluhlakamsebenti kwabonisanwa ngalo nabo bonkhe labafanele labatsintsekako, lokufaka ekhatsi Tekutfutfukiswa Kwetemnotfo Nemkhandlu Webasebenti.

src_text: MatshedisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso malapeng le metswalleng ya bana: •    MmePhindile Xaba(53),ya sebeditseng nako telele le ka bokgabane indastering ya ditaba, Afrika Borwa le mose sebeleditse ntlafalo ya naha ena ka boitelo.•    LenqosaSilumkoSokupa(74),ya sebeleditseng Lekgotla la Tshireletseho ya Mmuso maemong fapaneng, nako telele sebetsa ka bokgabane Tshebeletsong ya Mmuso.
tgt_text: Ingcungcutsela yeKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba Nemalungelo eBunikati Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlaba eTindzaweni teMmango.

src_text: •    Profesa Francis Wilson(83), setsebi sa moruo se ipabotseng, le mothehi wa Lekala la Diphuputso la tsa Basebetsi le Ntshetsopele Lebatoweng le Borwa ba Afrika     KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba eso ka ba tlola molao..     Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo jwaloka Motlatsa-Molaodi-Kakaretso (DDG): Ntshetsopele ya Makgabane Ditheong, Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo (DCoG).
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kusingatfwa kweNgcungcutsela yeKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba neMalungelo eBunikati Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlaba eTindzaweni teMmango ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-27 nangeMgcibelo, mhla tinge-28 Inkhwekhweti 2022 eGauteng.

src_text: Monghadi Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomukajwaloka DDG: Botsamaisi ba Tshehetso le Dithuso Mebusong ya Lehae,DCoG..     Monghadi Risimati Patrick Mathyejwaloka DDG: Botsamaisi ba Ditshebeletso tsa Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS)..     MonghadiCollin Xolani Zwane jwaloka DDG: Taolo, Tumellano le Phethahatso,DWS.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi isivumile Sitatimende Sesinyatselo Leme Kuso lesimayelana neKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba neMalungelo eBunikat Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlabai eTindzaweni teMmango  ngeNdlovulenkhulu nga-.

src_text: MonghadiMelanchton Makobe jwaloka DDG:Ditshebeletso tsa Molao le Peholeihlo ya Tshebetso Pusong, Dikgwebong tsa Mmuso,Lefapheng la Dikgwebo tsa Mmuso     Kabinete dumellane le Matona ka ho hirwa ha ba latelang:.
tgt_text: Ifake sicondziso lesitsi kube nekubonisana lokuchubekako nalabanye labafanele labatsintsekako.

src_text: MonghadiBhekuyise Mathews Khenisajwaloka Mohlanka Moholo wa Phethahatso(CEO)Lekgotleng la Ntshetsopele ya Phumantsho ya Bodulo (HDA).
tgt_text: Lengcungcutsela itawuba ngumphumela wemsebenti lowentiwe kulomnyaka lophelile, leyacela imibono kulabatsintsekako labahlukahlukene     Imicimbi Letako.

src_text: Mme Joy KelediMasemolajwaloka Mohlanka Moholo wa Ditjhelete, HDA.
tgt_text: Inkhomfa Yemhlaba Wonkhe Yesihlanu lemayelana neKucedza Kusebentisa Bantfwana.

src_text: Ngaka Cornelius Ruiters jwalokaCEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika itawube isingatse Inkhomfa Yemhlaba Wonkhe Yesihlanu lemayelana neKucedza Kusetjentiswa Kwebantfwana letawube ise-Durban International Convention Centre KwaZulu-Natal kusukela ngeLisontfo, ti-15 kuya ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Boiphumano le Maiteko Kahobotjha Kamora Dikgohola.
tgt_text: Imitamo yekuvuselela nekwakha kabusha ngemuva kwetikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete rorisitse le ho ananela mosebetsi wa batho le mekgatlo yohle kentseng letsoho maitekong hore batho ba iphumane, le kahongbotjha kamora dikgohola tse mpe dikarolong tse ding tsa naha, haholoholo KwaZulu-Natal lebohile mekgatlo yohle eo eseng ya mmuso, ya ditumelo, baahi, beng ba dikgwebo le mekgatlo thusang faneng ka dijo, diaparo, dikobo, dipakana tse sebediswang ke bomme ha ba le matsatsing  le diaparo tsa sekolo malapeng tlokotsing sa kgoneng ho iphumanela tsa motheo tseo di hlokang..     Setsi Sa Taolo ya Dikoduwa se ntse se tswela pele le ho kopanya makala ohle mmuso maitekong sona ho fana ka thuso ya diphallelo malapeng ohle amehileng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kubonga lokukhulu kubo bonkhe bantfu netinhlangano letidlale indzima emitameni yekuvuselela kanye nekwakha kabusha ngemuva kwetikhukhula letisandza kwenteka kuletinye tincenye talelive, ikakhulukati KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Batho ba fetang 7 000 ka palo ba fuwa botshabelo diterekeng tse nne tse amehileng haholo KwaZulu-Natal qadile mosebetsi wa ho fumantsha malapa amehileng bodulo ba nakwana ditsheng tseo leng tsa mmuso tse hlwauweng KwaZulu-Natal tse ka sebedisetswang ho ahela batho.
tgt_text: Ibonge tonkhe tinhlangano letingekho ngaphasi kwahulumende, tinhlangano tetenkholo, imimango, bosomabhizinisi netinhlangano letisita imimango ngekudla, tingubo tekugcoka, tingubo tekulala, tinsita tekubuyisa sitfunti nekuhlonipheka kanye netinyifomu tesikolwa emindenini lekhahlabetekile kute kutsi ikhone kuhlangabetana netidzingo tayo letibalulekile..     Sikhungo Savelonkhe Setekulawula Kwetinhlekelele siyachubeka nekuchumanisa tonkhe tigaba tahulumende emitameni yaso yekusita ngelusito lwekuhhamula bantfu kuwo onkhe emakhaya latsintsekile.

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse boinehelo ba mmuso ba ho laola matlole dithuso tsa kamora dikgohola ka hloko le ka ho se pate letho.
tgt_text: Tinsita tekukhosela tinikwa bantfu labangetulu kwe-7 000 etigodzini letine letikhahlabeteke kakhulu KwaZulu-Natal..     Sewucalile umsebenti wekwakhiwa kwetindlu tesikhashana temindeni lekhahlabetekile etindzaweni letingaphasi kwahulumende letikhonjiwe  KwaZulu-Natal kute kutsi tihlaliswe.

src_text: Mohlahlobi Moholo wa Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete Afrika Borwa fana ka tshebeletso ya tlatsetso ya peholeihlo mme tlhophisobotjha ya ditjhelete ikamahanya le mokgwatshebetso wa mmuso wa ditekanyetso tsa ditjhelete..     Tsa Morao tsa Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikucinisekisile kutibophelela kwahulumende ekuphatseni timali telusito lwetikhukhula ngebuhlakani nangekungafihli lutfo.

src_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa ho nka mehato ya ho itshireletsa ho thibela ho ata ha COVID-19 kamora hore dipalopalo tsa morao tjena di bontshe hore palo ya batho ba tshwaetsehang le ba kulang a eketseha jwalokaha mariha se kene..     Kabinete hopoditse bohle ho tswela pele ka ho itshireletsa le batho ba bang ka ho hlapa matsoho kgafetsa, ho rwala dimonkwana ha motho le kahara moaho, ho se atamelane le ba bang, ho bula difenstere moya kene, le ho enta..     Ente ntse le tshireletso matla kgahlano le COVID-19 hobane thibela ho kula haholo, ho robatswa sepetlele le ho hlokahala.
tgt_text: Umcwaningimabhuku Jikelele waseNingizimu Afrika usita ngemsebenti wekulandzelela lowengetiwe kanye nekuhlela kabusha kusetjentiswa kwetimali lokufanele kutsi kubekwe embili ngekuhambisana neluhlelo lwahulumende lwesabelomali..     Takamuva mayelana neLigciwane leSifo seKhorona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Ha hloke hore be le aterese ya moo dulang teng hore ente.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi incuse bonkhe bantfu labaseNingizimu Afrika kutsi batsatse tinyatselo tekuphepha kute kutsi bagweme kubhebhetseka kwe-COVID-19 ngemuva kwekutsi tibalo takamuva tibonise kwandza lokuphawulekako kwelizinga lalesifo kanye netifo letihlobene nesikhatsi sasebusika eveni..     Ikhabhinethi ikhumbute wonkhe umuntfu kutsi achubeke nekuzivikela tsine kanye nalabanye bantfu ngekugeza tandla tetfu njalo noma kusebentisa sibulali-magciwane, kufaka tifonyo uma singekhatsi kwetakhiwo, sikhweshelane nebantfu, kuvula amafasitelo kute kutsi kungene umoya lohlobile kanye nekugoma.

src_text: Mang kapa mang ya nang le bukana ya boitsebiso le ya se nang yona ka enta mahala dibakeng tsohle tsa setjhaba tsa ho enta naheng ka bophara..     Kgethollo ya Mmala ha Fele!.
tgt_text: Kugoma nguyona ndlela lencono kakhulu yekutivikela ku-COVID-19 ngoba kuvimbela kugula lokumatima, kulaliswa esibhedlela ngisho nekufa.

src_text: Kabinete nyatsitse diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala ka matla naheng ena, ho kenyeletsa diketsahalo tse tlalehilweng tsa Sekolo se Phahameng sa Good Hope Seminary le Yunivesithi ya Stellenbosch, Kapa Bophirima.
tgt_text: Awudzingi likheli lasekhaya kute kutsi ugome.

src_text: Diketso tsena tse mpe di kgahlano le makgabane Molaotheo ao naha ya rona thehuweng hodima ona kenyeletsang seriti sa botho, ho se kgethollane ka mmala, ho se kgethollane ka bong, toka setjhabeng, ho se be leeme, le hlomphano.
tgt_text: Nanoma ngubani, angaba namatisi noma abete, ugoma mahhala kuto tonkhe tindzawo tekugoma kulo lonkhe lelive.

src_text: Molaotheo wa Riphaboliki ya Afika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona re tataisang hore re fedise dikarohano tse mpe le diketso tsa kgale tsa tlhokeho ya toka.
tgt_text: Vimba lubandlululo lwebuhlanga!.

src_text: Ho ipiletswa ho batswadi ho ruta bana ba bona ho se ikamahanye le diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala le ho atlarela diphapano jwaloka karolo ya letsholo la rona le tsitlalletseng ho kgothaletsa kaho ya setjhaba le momahano ya setjhaba re sebetseng mmoho ho pepesa diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala hohle moo di bonahalang di amoheleha mme re romele molaetsa hlakileng reng ha di amoheleha naheng ya rona ya demokrasi..     Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Germany.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi itigcekile kakhulu tonkhe tento tekubandlululana ngekwelibala eveni, lokufaka ekhatsi netehlakalo letibikiwe eSikolweni Semabanga Laphakeme sase-Good Hope Seminary kanye naseNyuvesi yaseStellenbosch eNshonalanga Kapa.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse leeto la semmuso le bileng le katleho la Tjhanselara ya Riphaboliki ya Federale ya Germany, Monghadi Olaf Scholz, Afrika Borwa ka Labobedi la la 24 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Letento letidzabukisako tingcubutana nemagugu eMtsetfosisekelo lekwakhelwe kulo live letfu lentsandvo yelinyenti, lokufaka ekhatsi sitfunti semuntfu, kungabandlululani ngebuhlanga, bulungiswa betenhlalakahle, kulingana kanye nenhlonipho..     Umtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996 uyinkhombandlela yetfu yekucedza luchekeko lolunyanyekako kanye nekungabi nebulungiswa kwesikhatsi lesendlulile.
Batali bayancuswa kutsi bafundzise bantfwana kwala kubandlululwa ngekwebuhlanga futsi bamukele kwehlukahlukana, njengencenye yemkhankhaso wetfu wekukhutsata kwakhiwa kwesive nekubumbana kwemmango.

src_text: Tjhanselara Scholz etetse kwano semmuso menngwe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa, eo leng moetapele wa letsholo la mmuso la ho kgothaletsa dikamano tse ntle tsa lebatowa le matjhaba, mmoho le ho hohela matsete hlokwang ka matla..     Hara tse ding baetapele bana ba babedi ba buisane ka ditsela tsa ho ntlafatsa tshebedisano ho tsa eneji le diphetoho maemong lehodimo, kgwebisano le matsete, le mekgwa ya ho lwantsha COVID-19 le tlhokeho matla ya ente.
tgt_text: Asisebente ngekubambisana kute sibeke ebaleni lubandlululo nanoma ngukuphi lapho lutsatfwa njengentfo lefanele siphindze futsi sitfumele umlayeto locacile wekutsi kute indzawo yalo lapha eveni letfu; lentsandvo yelinyenti..     Budlelwane beNingizimu Afrika – neJalimane.

src_text: Ba boetse ba buisana ka diketsahalo tsa kontinenteng ya Afrika le matjhabeng, ho kenyeletsa ntwa ya Ukraine le kamoo amang moruo wa lefatshe le phumaneho ya dijo le eneji.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ilwemukele Luvakasho Lolusemtsetfweni lwaShansela We-Federal Republic of Germany, Umhlonishwa Olaf Scholz, eNingizimu Afrika ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-24 Inhlaba.

src_text: Germany ke molekane wa bobedi moholo kgwebisanong le Afrika Borwa, mme boetse ke naha ya boraro eo leng mohlodi wa bahahlaudi ba mose tsetela haholo naheng ena mme ke molekane ho tsa ntshetsopele..     Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Bohlano sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana.
Kabinete ananetse ho phethelwa ka katleho ha Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Bohlano sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana se neng se tshwaretswe Durban ho tloha ka la 15 ho ya ho la 20 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Kuvakasha Lokusemtsetfweni kwaShansela Scholz bekungesimemo saMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, lohola umkhankhaso wahulumende wekugcugcutela budlelwano lobuhle besifundza kanye nemave emhlaba, kanye nekuheha batjalitimali labadzingeka kakhulu.

src_text: Ba amehang ba tswang lefatsheng ka bophara ba ne ba le sebokeng sena se neng se tshwerwe ka tshebedisano le Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Basebetsi..     Kamora ho buisana ka mesebetsi metle kentsweng tshebetsong ke dinaha tse fapaneng le ho hlwaya tse salletseng morao le mehato potlakileng hlokehang bakeng sa ho potlakisa phediso ya ya ho etsa bana makgoba le ho qobellwa ha bana ho sebetsa, ho thehilwe ‘Durban Call to Action’ ho sebetsana le bothata ba ho etsa bana makgoba..     Ho etsa bana makgoba ke ntho mpe etswang ke setjhaba mme beha bana pontsheng ya maemo kotsi.
tgt_text: Labaholi lababili bakhulume, emkhatsini walokunye, ngetindlela tekutfutfukisa kubambisana etindzaweni letifana namandla agezi nekuntjintja kwesimo selitulu, kuhwebelana nekutjalwa kwetimali, kanye nekubhekana ne-COVID-19 kanye nesidzingo sekugoma.

src_text: Ke tlhekefetso mme thibela bana ho fumana thuto le menyetla meng ka ba ntshetsang pele.
tgt_text: Baphindze babuka intfutfuko kulelivekati lase-Afrika nakulamanye emave, kufaka ekhatsi kungcubutana kwe-Ukraine nemtselela wako emnotfweni wemave emhlaba kanye nekutfolakala kwekudla nemandla agezi..     Ijalimane ayigcini-nje ngekuba ngumlingani weNingizimu Afrika wesibili ngebukhulu kuteluhwebo, kodvwa futsi ingumtfombo wesitsatfu ngebukhulu wetivakashi tangesheya kwetilwandle, batjalimali labakhulu kanye nebalingani betfu ngetentfutfuko..     Inkhomfa Yesihlanu Yemave Emhlaba Lemayelana Nekucedza Kwenta Bantfwana Kutsi Babe Basebenti.

src_text: Ngwana mong le mong wa Afrika Borwa na le tokelo ke keng ya phehiswa ya ho sireletswa diketsong tse sotlang mosebetsing.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi isemukele siphetfo lesiyimphumelelo seNkhomfa Yesihlanu Yemave Emhlaba Lemayelana Nekucedza Kwenta Bantfwana Kutsi Babe Basebenti lebeyibanjelwe eThekwini kusukela mhla ti-15 kuya kumhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti.

Badlalindzima labavela kuwo onkhe emave emhlaba bayihambele lenkhomfa, lebeyibanjwe ngekubambisana neNhlangano Yemhlaba Yebasebenti..     Ngemuva kwekucocisana ngemikhuba lemihle leyentiwa ngemave lahlukene nekubona emagebe kanye netinyatselo letiphutfumako letidzingekako kute kutsi kusheshiswe kucedvwa kwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti kanye nekusetjentiswa ngekuphocelelwa, bamukele ‘I-Durban Call to Action’ kute kutsi kubukwane nesihlava sekwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti.

src_text: Tokelo ya thuto ya motheo kentswe Molaong wa rona wa Motheo mme ho ya ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Afrika Borwa wa 1996 (Molao 84 wa 1996), “motswadi mong le mong tlameha ho netefatsa hore morutwana mong le mong eo mo hodisang kena sekolo ho tloha letsatsing la pele la sekolo selemong seo ngwana qetang dilemo tse supa ho sona ho fihlela letsatsi la ho qetela la sekolo selemong seo ngwana qetang dilemo tse 15 kapa bang ho kereiti ya borobong ho sona, ho tla ya ka hore ke efe etsahalang pele.” .
tgt_text: Kwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti kuveta sihlava lesibi kabi semmango kuphindze futsi kubeke bantfwana engotini.

src_text: Ho ya ka Molao wa Bana wa 2005 (Molao 38 wa 2005), “ha ho motho ya ka sebedisang reka fana ka ngwana hore sebetse kapa hire ngwana”     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Kukuhlukubeta kanatsi futsi kuvimbela bantfwana kutsi bangakhoni kutfola imfundvo kanye nalamanye ematfuba ekutfutfuka.

src_text: Kananelo ya ho ba karolo ya Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Tshireletso ya Batho Bohle ba Nyametswang ke Mapolesa (ICPPED).
tgt_text: Wonkhe umntfwana eNingizimu Afrika unelilungelo lelingeke liphikiswe lekutsi avikeleke kumikhuba yekusetjentiswa ngekubacaphata.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tokomane ya tlhahiso ya ICPPED palamenteng bakeng sa tekolo ha Afrika Borwa lohotha ho ba karolo ya tumellano ena.
Ke tumellano tlamang dinaha tse saenneng tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) sebetsanang le tlolo ya ditokelo tsa botho ka mokgwa wa ho nyametswa ha batho ke mapolesa.
tgt_text: Lilungelo lekutfola imfundvo lesisekelo licuketfwe kuMtsetfosisekelo wetfu futsi ngekweMtsetfo Wetikolwa waseNingizimu Afrika, wanga-1996 (Umtsetfo 84 wanga-1996), “wonkhe umtali kufanele ente kutsi wonkhe umfundzi ambophelele kutsi afundze esikolweni kusukela ngelilanga lesikolwa lekucala.

Lusuku lwemnyaka lapho lowo mfundzi ufinyelela iminyaka lesikhombisa kute kube lusuku lwekugcina lwesikolwa lapho lowo mfundzi afinyelela iminyaka le-15 noma ebangeni lesishiyagalolunye, kuye ngekutsi ngukuphi lokwenteka kucala”..     Ngekwemibandzela yeMtsetfo Webantfwana, wanga-2005 (Umtsetfo 38 wanga-2005), “kute umuntfu longasebentisa, atfole, noma anike noma acashe umntfwana njengemsebenti”     Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Tumellano hlalosa ho nyametswa ke mapolesa ho qobelletsweng ho kenyeletsa kwetelo, ho tshwarwa ke mapolesa, ho kwallwa kapa mekgwa meng ka bakang hore sesenyi se hane ho dumela kapa se pate hore lehlatsipa le kae..     Ha tumellano se ananetswe kenyeleditswe le melaong ya naha ena, ho tla lebellwa hore Afrika Borwa tlalehele Matjhaba Kopaneng dilemo tse ding le tse ding tse pedi ka kamoo sebedisang tumellano ena kateng.
tgt_text: Kungena Kusivumelwane Semave Emhlaba mayelana Nekuvikela Bonkhe Bantfu Ekunyamalaleni Ngekuphocelelwa (I-ICPPED) .

src_text: Tumellano fana ka mehato eo dinaha tseo leng ditho di ka nkang ho thibela ho nyametswa ha batho.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwe-ICPPED ePhalamende mayelana nekucutjungulwa kwekungena kweNingizimu Afrika kulesivumelwane.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Bone ya Naha ya Afrika Borwa ya Tshireletso le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Botho.
tgt_text: Lesivumelwane sivamise kuba sibopho saMhlabuhlangane (se-UN) lesibonelelanako lesibukene nekunyatselwa kwemalungelo eluntfu ngekusetjentiswa kunyamalala kwebantfu ngekuphocelelwa.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse tlhahiso ya Tlaleho ya Bone ya Naha ya Tshireletso le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Botho Lekgotleng la Matjhaba Kopaneng la Ditokelo tsa Botho.
Tokomane ena tla lekolwa hamorao selemong ke lekala la Matjhaba Kopaneng le lekolang diketsahalo tse amang ditokelo tsa botho dinaheng tseo leng ditho tsa UN.
tgt_text: Lesivumelwane sichaza lokunyamalala kwebantfu ngekubaphocelela kute kutsi kufakwe ekhatsi kutfumba, kubopha, kutokisa noma-ke ngutiphi letinye tinhlobo letingabangela kutsi umbhebhetseli ale noma kwemukela noma-ke futsi afihle kutsi umhlukubetwa ukuphi..     Sitawutsi  singavunyelwa kutsi sibe ngaphansi kwemitsetfo yetfu, iNingizimu Afrika kulindzeleke kutsi ibike njalo ngeminyaka lemibili ku-UN mayelana nekutsi isicalisa kanjani sivumelwane.

src_text: Afrika Borwa se lekotswe makgetlo mararo esale ba karolo ya Tumellano ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ya Matjhaba Kopaneng, mme tekolo ya ho qetela entswe ka Loetse..     Tlaleho fana ka tsa morao tse mabapi le dikgothaletso tse 187 tse amohetsweng tsa motjha wa tekolo wa.
tgt_text: Lesivumelwane siniketa tinyatselo tekuvimbela emave langemalunga lokudzingeka kutsi atibeke kute kutsi avimbele kunyamalala kwebantfu ngekuphocelelwa emaveni abo..     Umbiko Wesine Welive LaseNingizimu Afrika Wekuvikela Nekukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu.

src_text: Ho qotsitswe maikutlo mang dintlheng tse netefaditsweng, tlhahisoleseding tswang mafapheng amehang, ditheo tse tshehetsang demokrasi le mekgatlo ya baahi amehang.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwembiko Wesine Welive LaseNingizimu Afrika Wekuvikela Nekukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu kuMkhandlu Wamhlabunhlangene Wemalungelo Eluntfu.
Lubuyeketo Lwe-UN Lwanjalo Ngetikhatsi Letitsite lutawubuyeketa lombiko ekuhambeni kwalomnyaka.

src_text: Kabinete motlotlo ka kgatelopele entsweng ha ho kenngwa tshebetsong dikgothaletso tsena le ka dikarolo tseo ho ntseng ho sebetsanwa le tsona.
tgt_text: Kusukela yasayina Sivumelwano Semalungelo Ebantfu se-UN, iNingizimu Afrika seyibuyeketwe emahlandla lamatsatfu, lapho khona kubuyeketwa kwekugcina kwentiwa ngeNyoni yanga-..     Lombiko uniketa takamuva mayelana netincomo letemukelwe leti-187 kusukela nga-2017 kunchubo yekubuyeketa.

src_text: Tlaleho tla phatlalatswa ha se teketswe Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba ka Phato.
tgt_text: Imibono itsetfwe kumininingwane lecinisekisiwe, kulwatiso loluvela ematikweni lafanele, tikhungo teSahluko 9 kanye netinhlangano temmango letifanele..     Ikhabhinethi iyatfokota ngenchubekelembili leyentiwe ekuphumeleliseni letincomo kanye futsi naleto tindzawo letisasetjentwa.

src_text: Leano la Botsamaisi ba Metsi Merafo la.
tgt_text: Lombiko utawentiwa utfolwe sive ngemuva kwekwetfulwa ku-UN ngeNgci.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho kenngwe tshebetsong Leano la Botsamaisi ba Metsi Merafo la.
tgt_text: Inchubomgomo Yekuphatsa Emanti Asemayini yanga-.

src_text: Leano lena le fana ka mekgwa ya ho sireletsa le ho baballa metsi.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyivumile Inchubomgomo Yekuphatfwa Kwemanti Asemayini yanga- 2022 kutsi iphunyeleliswe.

src_text: Le setletsa mesebetsi ya merafong le boikarabello ba merafe ba ho netefatsa tshebediso ya metsi ya ho ya ho ile bakeng sa naha.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo iniketa timiso tekuvikela nekonga kusetjentiswa kwemanti.

src_text: Hara tse ding, leano le hlakisa mesebetsi le boikarabello ba makala mararo mmuso malebana le tse amanang le metsi merafo.
tgt_text: Isimamisa imisebenti yetemnotfo yasemayini ngeligunyakwenta lekuniketa lelive kusetjentiswa kwemanti ngalokusimeme.

src_text: Diphetoho tse sisintsweng di tla rarolla mathata ho tlisa dikotlo kgahlano le merafo silafatsang metsi mme di bebofatse   tshebediso ya molao reng ba silafatsang ba lefe.
tgt_text: Emkhatsini waletinye tingenelelo, lenchubomgomo icacisa tibopho netindzima letidlalwa emkhatsini waletinhlaka letintsatfu tahulumende mayelana netindzaba temanti.

src_text: Leano lena le hlahisitswe ho ikamahantswe le Molao wa Naha wa Metsi, 1998 (Molao wa 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Letingucuko letihlongotwako titawusombulula tinsayeya tekufaka lunswinyo kubangcolisi futsi kwente kube lula kubita umngcolisi akhokhe.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Moralotshebetso Nahanelang Bong wa Merero, Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete, Tekolo ya Peholeihlo le Bohlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo yentiwa ngekuhambisana neMtsetfo Wavelonkhe Wemanti, wanga-1998 (Umtsetfo 36 wanga-1998).

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tlaleho ya kgatelopele ya ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralotshebetso Nahanelang Bong wa Merero, Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete, Tekolo ya Pehololeihlo le Bohlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete.
tgt_text: Umbiko Weluhlakamsebenti Lwekuhlela Tekuphendvula Kutebulili, Kulandzelela, Kulinganisa kanye Neluhlakamsebenti Lwelucwaningomabhuku.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelopele matla entsweng ke mafapha fapaneng mmuso kentseng tshebetsong moralotshebetso ananetsweng ka..     Mafapha mang se behile pele maano tla tataisa mananeo matjha tla shebana le ditlhoko tsa basadi, batjha le batho ba sa itekanelang.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko wenchubekelembili mayelana neLuhlakamsebenti Lwekuhlela Tekuphendvula Kutebulili, Kulandzelela, Kulinganisa kanye Neluhlakamsebenti Lwelucwaningomabhuku.

src_text: Kabinete kopile hore ho be le mekgwa matla ya peholeihlo le tlaleho, haholoholo mafapheng so kenye ditlaleho tsa ona..     Puisano ya Batjha ya ho Tlotla Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho be le NMYD selemo le selemo ho tloha ka.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyitfokotele inchubekelembili leyentiwe ngematiko ahulumende lamanyenti ekufakeni loluhlakamsebenti etinhlelweni tayo lolwemukelwa nga-2019 kutsi luphunyeleliswe.

src_text: NMYD ya pele tla ba ka la 07 ho ya ho la 20 Phupu.

Bona ke boiteko ba Bopresidente ba ho neha batjha ba kontinente ena lepatlelo la ho tshwara ditherisano tse ahang ka ditaba tse ba amang..     Dipuisano tsena tse tla bua ka Mopresidente wa mehleng ya hlomphuwang haholo matjhabeng Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela, di tla thakgola meqoqo amanang le ho otlella tlwaelo ya boetapele bo kgabane Afrika..     Dipuisanong tsena batjha ba tla nehwa monyetla wa ho abelana ka botjhaba ba bona.
tgt_text: Kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi ematiko lamanyenti asemise ngemumo tinchubomgomo letibomabekwembili tekukhombindlela tinhlelo tekuhlanganisa leticondze bomake, lusha kanye nebantfu labaphila ngekukhubateka.

src_text: Boiteko bona bo tla boela bo matlafatse dikamano tsa batho ka ho otloloha hara batjha ba kontinente.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi seyimemetele kutsi kuciniswe sandla ekulandzeleleni nasekubikeni, ikakhulukati ngalamanye alamatiko lasengakabiki.

src_text: Lefapha la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang le tla fana ka dintlha tsa lenaneo la diketsahalo hamorao..     Tlaleho ya Selemo le Selemo ya Peholeihlo ya Tshebetso ya Ntlafatso ya Basadi le Tekano ya Bong, Ntshetsopele ya Batjha le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang ya 2021/.
tgt_text: Inkhulumomphendvulwane Yelusha Ka-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).

src_text: Kabinete fumane tlaheho ya selemo le selemo ya peholeihlo ya tshebetso ya 2021/22 malebana le ntlafatso ya basadi, batjha le batho ba sa itekanelang.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi icinisekise i-NMYD kutsi yentiwe njalo ngemnyaka kusukela nga-.

src_text: Tlaleho latella ditshupo tsa bohlokwa ntshetsopeleng ya tekatekano, boemo ba khiro le thuo le seabo sa dihlopha tsena tsa batho diketsahalong tsa mafapha le ditheo tsa mmuso..     Tlaleho bokeleditswe ho ikamahantswe le moralo, tekanyetso ya ditjhelete, peholeihlo, tekolo le moralotshebetso wa Hlahlobo ya Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete tsepameng ho bong ananetsweng ke Kabinete ka     Dibili.
tgt_text: Kwetfulwa kwale-NMYD kutawuba mhla ti-7 kuya kumhla tinge-20 Kholwane.

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho Merafong.
tgt_text: Lona ngumtamo weLihhovisi laMengameli wekunika lusha lwaleLivekati inkhundla yekukhulumisana ngenkhulumomphendvulwane mayelana netindzaba letibatsintsako.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho bakeng sa hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka yona.
Sepheo ka Bili ena ke ho ntlafatsa bophelo bo botle le polokeho tsa basebetsi ba merafong, ho kenyeletsa tikoloho eo tshebetso ya merafong etsahalang ho yona.
tgt_text: Letinkhulumomphendvulwane – letitawusima kulichawe letfu lemave emhlaba Mengameli  wesikhatsi lesengcile Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – titawucala tinkhulumo tekujulisa lisiko lebuholi lobunenkhambo lenhle yekutiphatsa e-Afrika.

src_text: Bili fetola Molao wa jwale wa Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho Merafong wa 1996 (Molao wa 29 wa 1996).
tgt_text: Titawunika bantfu labasha ematfuba ekucobelelana ngelifa labo lelinemasiko lanotsile.

src_text: Hara tse ding ditlhomathiso tse lokisitsweng di hlakisa dikgopolo tse ding tse kahara Molao, di matlafatse moralotshebetso wa bophelo bo botle le polokeho mme di amahanye le mekgwa ya tshebetso tswang pele lefatsheng ha ho tluwa ho tsa polokeho merafong.
tgt_text: Lomtamo utawuphindze futsi ucinisekise budlelwane bebantfu (kulomunye nakulomunye) emkhatsini welusha lwalelivekati.

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Molaotheo ya Leshome le Metso Robedi ya.
tgt_text: Litiko letaBomake, Lusha Nebantfu Labanekukhubateka litawuniketa imininingwane yeluhlelo lwalemikhosi esikhatsini lesitako..     Umbiko Wekulandzelela Kusebenta Wemnyaka 2021/22 lomayelana neKuhlonyiswa Kwabomake Nekulingana Ngebulili, Nekutfutfukiswa Kwelusha kanye neKukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Molaotheo ya Leshome le Metso Robedi ya 2022 hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka yona le hore Letona la Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Ditjhankana, Monghadi Ronald Lamola ntshe tsebiso nang le dintlha tsa tlhomathiso sisintsweng ya Molaotheo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko wekulandzelela kusebenta wemnyaka 2021/22 lomayelana nekuhlonyiswa kwabomake, lusha kanye nebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka.

src_text: Bili fetola Karolo ya 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 tsebahatsang hore dipuo tsa semmuso tsa Afrika Borwa tse 11 ke Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenḓa, Xitsonga, Afrikaans, English, isiNdebele, isiXhosa le isiZulu..     Ditlhomathiso di tla tlisa hlompho Puong ya Matsoho ya Afrika Borwa (SASL) jwaloka puo ya bo-12 ya semmuso naheng ena mme sena se tla ntshetsa pele puo le ba buang se boele se tiise tekano ya ditokelo tsa Maafrika Borwa ohle, ho sa kgathallehe maemo bona.
tgt_text: Lombiko ulandzelela tinkhomba letinkhulu tekukhutsatwa kwetekulingana, lizinga lemisebenti nebuniyo kanye nekuhlanganyela kwalamacembu kumisebenti yematiko kanye nasetikhungweni tahulumende.

src_text: Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le se le ananetse Puo ya Matsoho jwalo ka puo ya lapeng     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Lombiko uhlanganiswa mayelana nelwabiwomali lwekuhlela tekuphendvula kutebulili, kulandzelela, kulinganisa kanye neluhlakamsebenti lweLucwaningomabhuku lolwemukelwa yiKhabhinethi nga-     Imitsetfosivivinyo.

src_text: Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibiyela Temphilo Netekuphepha Emayini.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana ya Naha ho tloha ho la 29 Motsheanong ho ya ho la 4 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “A re Sireletseng Bana nakong ya COVID-19 le Kamora moo.”.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchitjelwa Kwetemphilo Netekuphepha Emayini kute kutsi ummango uphawule ngawo.

src_text: Bekeng ena ho tla tsepamiswa maikutlo ntlheng kgolo naheng ya ho ima ha batjha leng ntho totileng haholo ka nako ya COVID-19 ha batjha ba bangata ba beleha ka..     Kabinete ipileditse ho batswadi, mekgatlo ya baahi, ya ditumelo tse fapaneng le baahi ka kakaretso ho sebedisana le ho thusa ho lwantsha keketseho ya ho ima ha batjha..     Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Moruo (WEF).
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kwenta kancono temphilo netekuphepha tebasebenti basemayini, kufaka ekhatsi simondzawo lapho kwentiwa khona imisebenti yasemayini.

src_text: Afrika Borwa na le seabo ho WEF tla tshwarelwa Davos-Klosters, Switzerland ho tloha ka la 22 ho ya ho la 26 Motsheanong 2022, tlasa mookotaba reng: “Re Sebetsa Mmoho ho Kgutlisa Tshepo”.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uchibela Umtsetfo Wetemphilo Netekuphepha Emayini, wanga-1996 (Umtsetfo we-29 wa-1996).

src_text: Afrika Borwa thabela monyetla wa ho ba karolo ya tharollo le ho abelana ka boiphihlelo ba rona sebokeng sa lefatshe.
tgt_text: Letichibiyelo letibuyeketiwe tiniketa, emkhatsini walokunye, kucaciswa kwaleminye imicondvo lekuloMtsetfo, ucinise luhlakamsebenti lwekulawula temphilo netekuphepha uphindze futsi uwente uhambisane nekusebenta ezingeni lemhlaba leliphakeme kakhulu mayelana netekuphepha etimayini.

src_text: Boteng ba rona WEF bo bohlokwa haholo ho phahamiseng lebitso la rona sebakeng sa matsete sa lefatshe, ho abelana le lefatshe ponelopele ya rona ya bokamoso le ho totobatsa tse ntjha tse seng di sibollotswe kahara naha..     Kgwedi ya Batjha.
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Batjha la 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “Ntshetsopele ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa ya moshwelella ya batjha le matla bona molemong wa bokamoso bo tjhatsi.”.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibiyela Umtsetfosisekelo Kwelishumi nasiphohlongo wanga-2022 .

src_text: Letsatsi la Batjha le tla ketekwa semmuso Kapa Botjhabela..     Monongwaha ho tla be ho ketekwa selemo sa bo-46 esale baithuti ba itseka ka la 16 Phupjane 1976, Soweto, ba ipelaetsa kgahlano le ho qobellwa ho ithuta dithuto kaofela ka puo ya Afrikaans ke mmuso wa kgethollo..     Ka moya oo wa Phuptjane 1976, Kabinete ipileditse ho batjha ba naha ena ho lwantsha tlhokeho ya mosebetsi ntseng eketseha ya batjha ka ho ba le seabo mananeong ntshetsopele kang thupelo ya mosebetsi lebisang ho fumaneng mangolo, le mananeo thupelo ya mosebetsi bakeng sa ba seng ba na le mangolo..     Mmuso sibollotse mananeo nang le molemong wa ho tshehetsa ho thehwa ha mesebetsi bakeng sa batjha le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi ya nakwana.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchitjelwa  KweMtsetfosisekelo Kwelishumi nasiphohlongo Kwanga-2022 kute kutsi sive siphawule ngawo nekutsi Indvuna Yetebulungiswa Nekucondziswa Kwesimilo, Mnu.

src_text: Dikgwebo le tsona di kgothaletswa ho hohella batjha mosebetsing ka ho ba thehela menyetla ya mesebetsi..     Lenaneo la batjha bakeng sa kgwedi ya Phuptjane le kenyeletsa diketsahalo tse fapaneng ho tloha ho thakgolweng ha letsholo la dipulamadiboho tsa batjha, ho thakgolweng ha Lenaneo la Moemedi wa Letshwao wa NYDA le diketsahalo tse ding tsa tshebeletso ya naha ya Batjha naheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Ronald Lamola, anikete tatiso nemininingwane mayelana naletichibiyelo teMtsetfosisekelo letiphakanyisiwe..     LoMtsetfosisekelo uchibiyela Sigaba 6(1) seMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yeNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996, lomemetela kutsi tilwimi taseNingizimu Afrika leti-11 letisetsetfweni Sepedi, Sesothoisutfu, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, Sibhunu, Singisi, Sindebele, siXhosa kanye nesiZulu..     Letichibiyelo temukela Lulwimi Lwetimphawu LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASL) kutsi lulwimi lwe-12 lolusemtsetfweni lwalelive futsi lutawutfutfukisa kwemukelwa kwalo kutemasiko luphindze futsi lucinisekise kuba nemalungelo lalinganako kubo bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika, ngekunganaki kubanekukhubateka kwabo.

src_text: Letona la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang Lefapheng la Bopresidente haufinyane le tla hlakisa lenaneo kaofela.
tgt_text: Litiko Letemfundvo Lesisekelo selivele lemukela i-SASL njengelulwimi lwasekhaya     Imikhosi Letako.

src_text: Ho lebelletswe hore diketsahalo tsohle tsa batjha di ikamahanye le melawana ya bophelo bo botle ya COVID-.
tgt_text: Liviki Lekuvikelwa Kwebantfwana.

src_text: Seboka sa Lefatshe la Metseng ya Mahae.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika itawugubha Liviki Lekuvikelwa Kwebantfwana kusukela mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti kuya kumhla ti-4 Inhlaba 2022 ngaphasi kwalengcikitsi: “Asivikele Bantfwana ngesikhatsi se-COVID-19 neKwendlula lapho”..     Kuleliviki, kutawunakwa kakhulu ngalokukhetsekile ludzaba lwavelonkhe lwekukhulelwa kwelusha, lokwakhuphuka ngemandla lokwandlondlobala kakhulu ngesikhatsi se-COVID-19 lapho khona batala kakhulu nga-..     Ikhabhinethi icele kutsi kube khona kubambisana kubatali, kummango, emacembu ebetenkholo kanye nemmango ngebubanti bawo kutsi basite kube netingucuko ekukhulelweni kwelusha.

src_text: Mmuso, ka tshebedisano le ntlo ya Naha ya Baetapele ba Setso tla ba le Seboka sa Lefatshe la Metseng ya Mahae ka Labohlano la la 27 le ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong 2022 molemong wa ho buisana ka ditaba tse amanang le thuo ya mobu..     Ditaba tsena di kenyeletsa motjha wa ho tloswa ha lefatshe la metseng ya mahae Mmusong le iswa ho beng ba lona ba loketseng leng se bohlokwa bakeng sa matlafatso ya baahi ba metseng ya mahae.
tgt_text: Iforamu Yetemnotfo Yemhlaba (i-WEF).

src_text: Ho se be teng ha thuo ya lefatshe ka molao metseng ya mahae ho fokodisa ditokelo tsa beng ba lefatshe le ho fokotsa bokgoni ba bona ba ho le sebedisetsa ho ntlafatsa maphelo bona le maemo bona ditjhelete     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika itawuhlanganyela ku-WEF eDavos-Klosters, eSwitzerland kusukela mhla tinge-22 kuya kumhla tinge-26 Inkhwekhweti 2022, ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Sisebenta Ngekubambisana, Sibuyisa Litsemba”..     INingizimu Afrika itfokotela litfuba lekuba yincenye yalesisombululo nekuphindze futsi yabelane kuleforamu yemave emhlaba ngaloko lesihlangabetene nako.

src_text: MahlohonoloKabinete lebohisitse le ho lebisa ditakalletso tse ntle ho: Mme Leanne Manas, sebohodi sa lenaneo la SABC la Morning Live, ya hlomphilweng ka Kgau Tlotlang Tshebetso Ipabotseng ya France ho tswa naheng ya France ka Labobedi la la 17 Motsheanong 2022, bakeng sa seabo sa hae boqolotsing ba ditaba, kgasong le mesebetsing meng fapaneng ya ho thusa setjhaba.
tgt_text: Bukhona betfu ku-WEF kukhulisa lidvumela letfu njengendzawo yekwenta lutjalomali, sabelana nemhlaba ngembononchanti wetfu welikusasa kanye nekuphakamisa tintfutfuko letinsha ngekhatsi kulelive.

src_text: MatshedisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso malapeng le metswalleng ya bana: Monghadi Mpho Moerane (52), Ramotse wa mehleng wa Masepala wa Johannesburg, eo neng le radipolotiki ya neng lwanela ditokelo tsa batho bile le mohlanka wa batho ba Johannesburg.
tgt_text: Inyanga Yelusha.

src_text: Pele e ba Ramotse bile setho sa Komiti ya Ramotse ya Tikoloho le Meralo ya Ditshebeletso.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iluvumile Luhlelo Lwenyanga Yelusha lwanga-2022 ngaphasi kwalengcikitsi: “Kukhutsata tindlela tekutiphilisa letisimeme nekucina kwebantfu labasha kute babe nelikusasa lelincono”.

src_text: Ngaka Deborah Fraser (56), sebini se hapileng dikgau tse ngata mminong wa sedumedi se neng se sa tswa hlomphuwa ka Doctor of Philosophy in Sacred Music ke Christian Leadership Academy.Ngaka Namane Magau (70), serutehi se neng se hlompheha bile le setho se hlomphehang sa Boto ya Bahlokomedi ba Ditjhelete ba Lekgotla la Naha la AIDS Afrika Borwa.Monghadi Mike Schüssler (60), eo neng le setsebi se hlomphehang sa moruo Afrika Borwa le mokaubere indastering ena mme na le maikutlo tjhatsi ka maemo moruo wa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Lilanga Lelusha Lelisemtsetfweni litawukhunjulwa eMphumalanga Kapa.

src_text: Monghadi Jamie Bartlett (56), sebapadi se neng se tlotlwa Afrika Borwa sa kalaneng le dipapadi tsa thelevisheneng se neng se hapile dikgau tse ngata, se tumme ka seabo sa sona jwaloka Mike O'Reilly ho Isidingo le David Genaro ho Rhythm City.

Kabinete mmoho le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba boetse ba lebisitse matshediso mmusong le bathong ba United Arab Emirates (UAE) kamora ho hlokahala ha Mopresidente Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73) wa UAE      KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuteho ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe hore ha ba so ka ba tlola molao.
tgt_text: Lomnyaka lona utawuba ngumkhosi we-46 wekubungata umhla ti-16 Inhlaba 1976 wetibhelu tetitjudeni taseSoweto ngesikhatsi bantfu labasha balwa nekuhlisibetwa ngeSibhunu ngumbuso welubandlululo kutsi bafundziswe ngaso etikolweni.

src_text: Monghadi Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla ke Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong wa Phethahatso Botong ya Ntshetsopele ya Indasteri ya tsa Kaho.
tgt_text: Ngekwemoya weNhlaba yanga-1976, Ikhabhinethi imeme bonkhe bantfu labasha kutsi babukane nensayeya yekukhula kwelizinga lekweswelakala kwemisebenti ngekutsi bahlanganyele etinhlelweni tekutitfutfukisa njengetemfundzamakhono emsebentini netekusebentela kutfola sipiliyoni emsebentini.

src_text: Mongadi Shabeer Hamid Khan ke Akhaontente Kgolo Matlotlong Naha..     Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana ke Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong Thekong ya Thepa, Matlotlong Naha..     Kabinete dumellane le ho hirwa ha ba latelang bakeng sa ho tlatswa ha dikgeo Botong ya Balaodi ya Letlole le Leholo la Eneji     Monghadi Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.
Moruo.
tgt_text: Temnotfo.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse kgatelopele tsa morao tjena tse kgothatsang, maitekong mmuso ao sepheo ka ona leng ho kgothaletsa kgolo ya moruo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokungenelela lokuhle lokusandza kwenteka lokuhlose kuvuselela kukhula kwemnotfo.

src_text: Ho ya ka dipalopalo tsa morao tjena tsa tlhokeho ya mosebetsi tse tswang ho ba Dipalopalo Afrika Borwa, tlhokeho ya mosebetsi fokotsehile ho tloha dipersenteng tse.
tgt_text: Ngekwetinombolo letisandza kukhishwa letikhishwe beteLubalobalo TaseNingizimu Afrika, kuswelakala kwematfuba emsebenti kunciphe kusuka kumaphesenti la-.

src_text: 3 kotareng ya bone ya 2021 ho ya dipersenteng tse.
tgt_text: 3 kulekota yesine yemnyaka we-2021 kwaya kumaphesenti la-.

src_text: 5 kotareng ya pele ya.
tgt_text: 5 kukota yekucala yemnyaka we-.

src_text: Ke kotara ya bobedi jwale sekgahla se atolositsweng sa tlhokeho ya mosebetsi se fokotseha.
tgt_text: Lokukhula kwemazinga ematfuba ekungacashwa kunciphe kwalandzelana emakota lamabili.

src_text: Mesebetsi mengata fumanwe makaleng ditshebeletso tsa baahi le setjhaba, makaleng tlhahiso le bohwebi.
tgt_text: Umkhakha wetematfuba emsebenti lozuze kakhulu ngilowetinsita temmango netenhlalakahle, tekukhucita netekuhwebelana.
Linani lemikhicito yasekhaya likhule nge-.

src_text: Tlhahiso yohle ya kahara naha kotareng ya pele ya 2022 hodile ka persente tse.
tgt_text: 9% kukota yekucala yemnyaka we-2022 lokutsatsa bukhulu bemnotfo wakitsi kuwuyise esikhatsini sangembi kwekucala kwalobhubhane.

src_text: 9% mme sena sa lekanya moruo wa rona le nakong ya pele ho sewa sena.
tgt_text: Ngalesikhatsi salekota, umkhakha wetekukhicita ngiwo lowasebenta kahle lowaba nekukhula kumikhicito yetephethilomu neyemakhemikhali, yetekudla neyetinatfo, neyemamethali neyetemishini.

src_text: Kotareng eo, lekala la tlhahiso bile lona le sebetsang ka matla mme le bile le kgolo tlhahisong ya petroliamo le dikhemikhale, dijo le dino, le dimethale le metjhini..     Phaello tsena tse itekanetseng di bontsha hore moruo wa rona ntse le matla le hore maiteko kang Leano la Tlhophisobotjha le Tsoseletso ya Moruo ntse matlafala.
tgt_text: Lokuzuza loku lokungakendluleli kukhomba kutsi umnotfo wakitsi usatawuhlala usebenta ngemandla nekutsi kungenelela lokufana neLuhlelo Lekwakha Kabusha Nelekuvuselela Umnotfo lutfola emandla.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho bohle ho tshehetsa dikgwebo le diindasteri tsa lehae ka ho reka dihlahiswa le ditshebeletso tsa tsona..     Kabinete boetse ananetse qeto ya mokgatlo wa ditekolo wa S&P Global ya ho lekolabotjha maemo Afrika Borwa ho kgona ho lefa melato ya yona – ho tloha maemong tsitsitseng ho ya ho matle.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi yenta lubito kuwonkhewonkhe kutsi kusekelwe emabhizinisi asekhaya netimboni ngekutsenga imikhicito netinsita talapha ekhaya.

src_text: Mokgatlo ona boetse behile bokgoni ba naha ba ho lefa melato ya ditjhelete tsa dinaha tse ding ho BB minus le ya tjhelete ya kwano ho BB.
Theko ya tsa ho Iphedisa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela futsi lesincumo se-ejensi yekulinganisa emazinga i-S&P Global sekubuyeketa simo seNingizimu Afrika sekukweleta – kusuka kulesinekusimama kuya kulesihle kakhulu.

src_text: Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19) le ntwa ntseng tswela pele lefatsheng di bile le kameho matla thekong ya tsa ho iphedisa lefatsheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Le-ejensi yekulinganisa emazinga futsi icinisekisile kutsi lesimo semazinga ekukweleta esikhatsi lesidze semali yasekhaya neyemave angaphandle sihlala siku-BB minus naku-BB ngekulandzelana kwawo.

src_text: Maafrika Borwa le ona tsieditswe ke theko nyolohang ya mafura, dijo le tse ding tsa bohlokwa..     Re lokela ho sebetsa mmoho, re thusane re boele re baballe disebediswa tsa rona nakong tsena tse boima.

Mmuso etsa ka hohle kamoo ka kgonang kateng ho thusa bohle, haholoholo ba futsanehileng..     Banka ya Afrika Borwa Kgolo sebetsang hantle matla le ikemetseng thusa ho sireletsa setjhaba ditlamoraong tsa boleng ba tjhelete ka ho tsitlallela infleishene seng batsi tlase ha ho bapiswa le ya dinaha tse ding..     Kabinete ananetse qeto ya Matlotlo Naha ya ho eketsa nako ya ho fokotswa ha Lekgetho la Mafura la Kakaretso (GFL).
tgt_text: Tindleko tekuphila.

src_text: GFL fokoditswe ka  50 bakeng sa litara ya mafura ka Mmesa le Motsheanong, mme sena se tla tswela pele le ho tloha ho la 1 Phuptjane ho ya ho la 6 Phupu.
tgt_text: Bhubhane Weligciwane Lekhorona (i-COVID-19) kanye nalokungcubutana lokuchubekako kwemave emhlaba kube nemtselela lomubi kutindleko tekuphila emhlabeni wonkhe.

Bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika nabo bakhatsatekile ngalokwenyuka kwetindleko temafutsa etigitjelwa, tekudla netetintfo letimcoka..     Kufuneka sonkhe sibambisane, sisitane futsi sivikele tinsita takitsi kulesikhatsi lesimatima.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse qeto ya Khomeshene ya Ditlhodisano ya ho beha ditheko tsa dintho tsa bohlokwa leihlo, haholoholo pehelo ya hore dikgwebo di lokela ho fana ka mabaka ho eketsa ditheko tsa dihlahiswa..     Kopano ya tsa Kgwebo ya Japan le Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Hulumende wenta konkhe lokusemandleni kunika lusito kuwo wonkhe umuntfu, kakhulu kulabo labaphuyile.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse diphetho tsa Kopano ya morao ya tsa Kgwebo ya Japan le Afrika Borwa, eo ho yona ho dumellanweng ka lenaneo le leholo la mosebetsi le kenyeletsang tshebedisano ho tlisweng ha diphetoho ho tsa tikoloho, ditheknolojing tsa dipalangwang tsa motlakase le mehlodi ya motlakase ya tsa tlhaho..     Kopanong ho boetse ho dumellanwe ka hore ho be le letsholo la marangranng la ho hlakisa menyetla teng Afrika Borwa ho beng ba dikgwebo ba Japan, ntshetsopele ya boiphihlelo indastering ya lehae ya tlhahiso ya makoloi, menyetla ya tlhahiso le phapanyetsano ya boiphihlelo ho tsa tekgniki..     Japan ke nngwe ya dinaha tseo leng balekane ba bohlokwa kgwebisanong le rona mme tsetela haholo makaleng fapaneng Afrika Borwa, ho tloha ho tsa tlhahiso ya makoloi ho ya metjhining tswang pele ya merafong, le ho tloha ho kgwebo ho tsa temothuo ho ya ditshebeletsong tsa ditjhelete..     Kabinete boetse ananetse ho thehwa ha Mokgwatshebetso wa Barekisetsi ba Dinaheng tse ding ba Batho ba Batsho ke Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Diindasteri le Ditlhodisano (dtic), molemong wa ho kopanya difeme tse romelang thepa entsweng naheng ena dinaheng tse ding lefatsheng.
tgt_text: Libhangengodla lakitsi LaseNingizimu Afrika lelisebenta kahle, lelinemandla nalelitimele liyancedza kuvikela ummango kulokucekelwa phansi kwekwehla kwemandla emali ngekuwagcina angekhatsi kwebubanti lobuncane lobuhlosiwe; lobungaphasi kakhulu kulabo lobentekako ngalesikhatsi kulamanye emave..     Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela sincumo Semgcinimfa Wavelonkhe sekungeta sikhatsi lesibekiwe sekunciphisa Intsela Yephethilomu Jikelele (i-GFL).

src_text: Mokgwatshebeso ona tla thusa kabelanong ya tlhahisoleseding, bokgoni le tsebo, mme tsamaya mehlaleng ya dikatleho tsa Lenaneo la Beng ba Diindasteri ba Batho ba Batsho.
tgt_text: Le-GFL yancishiswa nge-R. 50 ilitha enyangeni yaMabasa neyeNkhwekhweti, futsi itawuchubeka yelulwe kusuka mhla lu-1 Inhlaba kuya kumhla ti-6 Kholwane.

src_text: Eneji.
Mehato ya rona ya ho netefatsa boteng ba motlakase sa timeng  nako telele matlafaditswe kamora hore ho nehelanwe ka Karolo ya 4 ya Sebaka sa ho Fehla Motlakase sa Kusile, Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi futsi isamukele sincumo Sekhomishini Yetekucudzelana sekuhlala icaphele kakhulu tindleko tetintfo letitsatfwa njengekudla lokumcoka, kakhulu sibonelelo sekutsi emabhizinisi kufuneka anikete bufakazi lobuvakalako bekwenyusa tindleko..     Umhlangano Wetemabhizinisi emkhatsini kweJapan neNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Ho nehelana hona ke letshwao la phihlello ya bohlokwa matsapeng Eskom ho tsitsisa mokgwatshebetso wa motlakase mme ho tla eketsa dimekawate (MW) tse 800 keriting ya matla..     Kabinete elelletswe hore kaho ya dikarolo tse nne tsa tse tsheletseng tsa ho fehla motlakase phethetswe projekeng ya Kusile ya ho Fehla Motlakase..     Kabinete ananetse ho eketswa ha bokgoni bo bong ba ho fehla motlakase keriting leng ntho kgonahaditsweng ke ho dumella bahlahisi ba motlakase ba ikemetseng hore ba hlahise motlakase.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyamukele lemiphumela yakamuva Yemhlangano Wetemabhizinisi emkhatsini kweJapan neNingizimu Afrika, lovumelene ngeluhlelo lwemsebenti lolunemandla lolufaka kusebentisana ekukhuliseni umnotfo ngekusebentisa emandla lahlantekile, buchwepheshe betimoto tagezi kanye neyehayidrojini lehlantekile..     Lomhlangano futsi uvumelene kutsi kube “nembukiso” we-inthanethi lotawuveta ematfuba eNingizmu Afrika kumabhizinisi lamanyenti aseJapan, kutfutfukiswa kwemakhono kulemboni yetetigitjelwa yalapha ekhaya, kumikhakha leyehlukene yetematfuba ekukhicita kanye nekutsi kube nekuniketana ngemakhono..     I-Japan ingulabanye bebalingani betfu labamcoka kakhulu kutekutsengiselana futsi ihamba embili ekutjaleni timali kumikhakha leminengi yaseNingizimu Afrika, lehlukahlukene lesukela kuyetetigitjelwa iye kutemishini yasetimayini lehamba embili, nalesuka kumabhizinisi etekulima kuya kuwetetinsita tetimali.

src_text: Mmuso sa tswa saena tumellano ya ho reka dimekawate tse 150 ho Scatec ASA, bao leng bahlahisi ba motlakase tswang mehloding ya tlhaho..     Lekgotla la Boeletsi la Matlafatso ya Batho ba Batsho Batsi Moruong (B-BBEE).
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yamukela lokusungulwa kweNethiwekhi Yalabamnyama Yekutsengisela Emave Angaphandle lokucalwe Litiko Letekutsengiselana, Letimboni Nelekucudzelana (i-DTIC), kute kuhlanganiswe timboni tebantfu labamnyama lekungunyalo titsengisela emave emhlaba imphahla leyentiwe lapha ekhaya.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho kgethwa ha Lekgotla le letjha la naha la Boeletsi la B-BBEE.
tgt_text: Lenethiwekhi itawenta kutsi kube nekwabelana ngelwatiso, ngesipiliyoni kanye nengendlela yekwati kwenta tintfo, futsi yenta loku ikususela kulemphumelelo yaLoluhlelo Lwetimboni Tebantfu Labamnyama.

src_text: Lekgotla le na le batho ba bangata ba tswang makaleng kgwebo, mekgatlo ya basebetsi, mekgatlo ya baahi le ditheo tsa thuto hodimo, ba tla thusa ho tataisa mmuso ho tlisweng ha diphetoho moruong..     Leha ho bile le kgatelopele kgahlisang molemong wa ho lokisa tse senyehileng nakong ya mmuso wa kgethollo, ho sa na le tse ngata tse lokelang ho etswa ho matlafatsa botsamaisi ba batho ba batsho, ho matlafatsa ntshetsopele ya bokgoni le ho atolosa phumano ya thepa le ditshebeletso molemong wa ho neha batjha le basadi ba batho ba batsho menyetla.
tgt_text: Temandla.

src_text: Dikgohola.
tgt_text: Indlela yetfu yesikhatsi lesidze yekuvikela neyekutfola emandla itfole kusekelwa lokukhulu kulandzela lokuniketwa kwe-Unit 4 Esiteshini Setemandla Ikusile Empumalanga.

src_text: Dithuso tse ntseng di tswella tsa mmuso diprovenseng tse anngweng ke dikgohola di etsa phapang kgolo.
tgt_text: Lokuniketwa kwaleyunithi kungulenye inchophamlandvo yemitamo ye-Eskom yekusimamisa luhlelo lwetemandla futsi kutawengeta emamegawatsi (MW) la-8000 kulegridi yagezi wavelonkhe..     Ikhabhinethi iyabonga kutsi kwakhiwa kwemayunithi ekukhicita gezi lamane kulasitfupha sekuphotfuliwe kulomklamo waleSiteshi Semandla iKusile..     Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokungetwa kwalamanye emandla ekukhicita lamasha kulegridi, lokubangwe ngilesincumo sekuvumela bakhiciti labatimele kutsi bakhicite gezi.

src_text: Mmuso behile pele phumantsho ya dijo, metsi le botshabelo bakeng sa batho ba tlaletsweng ke naha, le ho lokiswa ha meralo ya ditshebeletso senyehileng.
tgt_text: Hulumende usandza kusayina sivumelwano sekutsenga emandla la-150MW kumkhiciti losebentisa tindlela letehlukahlukene tekukhicita gezi, i-Scatec ASA..     Umkhandlu Wekululeka Ngekunika Emandla Langetiwe Etemnotfo Ebantfwini Labamnyama.

src_text: Ho sebetswa ka matla ho tsoseletsa ditshebeletso tsa motheo tse kang metsi, motlakase, bohlweki le tsamaiso ya dikgwerekgwere..     Ke tjhelete ka bang dimiliyone tse R189, 217 sebediswang Lenaneong la Ntlafatso ya Mekhukhu leo ka lona sepheo leng ho fetola boleng ba bophelo ba ba phelang mekhukhung..     Ho boetse ho na le dimiliyone tse R733, 086 tsa Ntshetsopele ya Nyehelo ya Phumantsho ya Matlo tse tla thusa ho thehweng ha bodulo ba moshwelella le bo momahaneng ha batho..     Kabinete ananetse thuso ya botho tswang naheng ya Qatar ya dijo, diaparo, di-generator, dihlwekisametsi, metjhini thusang bakudi ho phefumoloha, ditente le disebediswa tsa bongaka.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokukhetfwa KweMkhandlu Lomusha Wekululeka We-B-BBEE nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa..     Lomkhandlu wakhiwe licembu lebantfu labavela kumabhizinisi lahlukahlukene, kutinyonyana, kutinhlangano temmango letitimele nakumkhakha wetifundziswa, lotawusebenta kweluleka hulumende mayelana nekugucula simo semnotfo.

src_text: Nyehelo ena tla thusa batho ba fetang 4 000 ka palo ba fuweng bodulo ba nakwana ditsing tsa tlhokomelo tsa baahi.
Kabinete boetse ananetse thuso ya botho tswang United Arab Emirates (UAE) ya dijo le metsi ho thusa mahlatsipa dikgohola..     Ho Thehwa ha Letlole la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Nanoma kube nemsebenti lomkhulu lowentiwe ekubuyiseleni emuva kudvukiswa kutemnotfo kwelubandlululo, mkhulu umsebenti lekusafuneka wentiwe kute kukhuliswe kuphatsa kwebantfu labamnyama, kwengeta kutfutfukiswa kwemakhono nekukhulisa litfuba lenchubo yekutsenga nekutsengiselana kute kunikwe bomake labamnyama nelusha ematfuba.

src_text: 1    Kabinete ananetse ho thehwa ha Letlole la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba ke Mokgatlo wa Ntshetsopele ya Diindasteri (IDC) sebedisana le lefapha la Bookamedi le dtic.
tgt_text: Tikhukhula.

src_text: Tshehetso ena tla thusa ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi ya nakwana bakeng sa batjha ba ka bang 50 000 leng mesebetsi tla tswela setjhaba molemo etswang metseng.. 2    Tshehetso tla kenyeletsa tlhokomelo ya bophelo bo botle le ya baahi, dijo le phepo ntle ka mokgwa wa dibaka tsa ho phehela batho, ntshetsopele ya ho ngola le ho bala, mananeo ho hlokomedisa ka tsa tikoloho le ho lwantsha diphetoho maemong lehodimo mmoho le maiteko ho tshehetsa batjha.
tgt_text: Imitamo lechubekako yahulumende yekunika lusito etifundzeni letitsintsekile mayelana neletikhukhula yenta mtselela lomcoka.

src_text: Letlole le tla tshehetsa dikgwebo tse 26 tsa baahi le tse sa iketsetseng phaello..     Bosenyi le Bobodu.
tgt_text: Hulumende ucalise embili kuniketa kudla, emanti nendzawo yekuhlala ebantfwini labasusiwe etindzaweni tabo kanye nekulungiswa kwesakhiwonchanti lesimoshakele.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho tshwarwa ha batho mabapi le diketso tsa manyofonyofo, ho patwa ha mehlodi ya ditjhelete tse seng molaong le bobodu.
tgt_text: Umsebenti lomkhulu wekubuyisela tinsita letisisekelo letifana nemanti, nagezi, netekutfutfwa kwendle netibi uyachubeka..     Kusetjentiswe tigidzi letilinganiselwa ku-R. 217 kuLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Tindzawo Temikhukhu loluhlose kutfutfukisa lizinga lemphilo yebantfu labahlala etindzaweni temikhukhu..     Kunetigidzi leti-R. 086 letingetiwe letiniketwe ngekusebentisa Sibonelelo Sekutfutfukisa SeLitiko Lekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu kute tisite ekwakheni tindzawo tekuhlala letisimeme naletihlanganisa wonkhe umuntfu..     Ikhabhinethi iyalwamukela lolusito loluvela kuHulumende waseQatar lolufana nekudla, timphahla, emajeneretha, kokuhlanta emanti, emaventhiletha, emathende kanye nemitsi.

src_text: Ba tshwerweng ba kenyeletsa bao neng le bahlanka ba hodimo mmusong le dikgwebong tsa mmuso, mme ba bang ba bona ba tobane le diqoso tse kenyeletsang ho tlolwa ha Molao wa Botsamaisi ba Ditjhelete tsa Setjhaba, 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).
