tgt_text: Lomnikelo utawusita kwesikhashana bantfu labangetulu kwe-4 000 labahlaliswe etikhungweni tekunakekela ummango.

src_text: Ho tshwarwa ha batho bana ho kenyeletsang le ho tshwarwa ha mohlanka wa Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha, Setsing sa Kamohelo ya Baphaphathehi sa Desmond Tutu, Pretoria, ya belaellwang ka ho nka tjotjo ho letswantle, ke bopaki ba hore ha ho motho eo molao sa tlo mo fihlela mme ha ho sebaka sa basebetsi ba sa tshepahaleng lekaleng la setjhaba..     Kabinete boetse ananetse kgatelopele bonahalang pusetsong ya baena ba ha Gupta, Rajesh le Atul, Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi futsi iyalamukela lusito lwebuntfu loluvela ku-United Arab Emirates (i-UAE) lolufana nekudla nemanti kute kusitakale bantfu labantsintsekile kuletikhukhula letisandza kwenteka..     Kusungulwa Kwesikhwama Sekutfutfukisa Temisebenti.

src_text: Sena se latela ho tshwarwa ha morao ha bona Dubai, UAE, kamora hore Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Mapolesa Bosenyi (Interpol) ntshe ditsebiso tsa ho ba batla.
tgt_text: 1    Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela kusungulwa Kwesikhwama Sekutfutfukisa Temisebenti lesicalwe Yinhlangano Yekutfutfukisa Timboni (i-IDC) ngekubambisana nelihhovisi laMengameli ne-DTIC.

src_text: Bobedi bona bo batleha Afrika Borwa mabapi le seabo sa bona ho hatjweng ha mmuso, ho kenyeletsa manyofonyofo le ho patwa ha mehlodi ya ditjhelete tse seng molaong.
tgt_text: Lokwesekelwa kutawuvula ematfuba emisebenti ebantfwini labasha labangafika ku-50 000 kumisebenti lebalulekile leyenteka kumimango yendzawo.

src_text: Ditherisano pakeng tsa mekgatlo ya tshebetso ya molao ya naha ya UAE le Afrika Borwa ka pusetso ya bona naheng ya rona di tswela pele.

Ho tshwarwa ha bona ke sesupo sa maikemisetso mmuso ho lwantsha bosenyi le bobodu ntle le tshabo kapa leeme..     Ho tshwarwa ha bona ke sesupo sa metjha le mekgwa sebetsang hantle ya hore ba belaellwang ka bosenyi ba ikarabelle diketsong tsa bona tse mpe le ho netefatsa hore ha ho ya kahodima molao..     Kabinete nyatsitse boiteko bo se nang dihlong ba ho kgella mmuso le naha ya rona fatshe kamora hore ho senngwe hampe kheibole Karolong ya 1 ya Seteishene sa ho Fehla Motlakase sa Matla sa Eskom, Mpumalanga ne le ketsahalo ya bone ya tshenyo belaellwang seteisheneng sa ho fehla motlakase kamora hore diketsahalo tse tshwanang le eo di tlalehwe diteisheneng tse ding tse tharo dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng.
tgt_text: 2    Lokwesekelwa kutawufaka temphilo netekunakekelwa kwemmango, kudla kanye nekusekelwa ngetindlela tekuniketa kudla lokunemphilo letifana nemakhishi emasobho, ngekugcugcutela kufundza nekubhala, ngekulandzela tinhlelo tekungenelela letimayelana nekugucugucuka kwesimo selitulu netekuphila ngendlela lengabulali indalo kanye nangekuta netindlela tekusekelwa kwelusha.

src_text: Dipalopalo tsa morao tjena tsa diketso tsa bosenyi ke pontsho ya hore re tlameha ho leka ka matla re le setjhaba ho etsa hore ho be le polokeho metseng ya rona.
tgt_text: Lesikhwama sitawusekela imimango le-26 kanye netinhlangano letitimele letingenti inzuzo.

src_text: Dintlha tsena di re hopotsa hore ho lwantsha bosenyi ke boikarabelo ba setjhaba le hore kaofela ha rona, ho kenyeletsa mapolesa, baetapele ba dipolotiki, baahi, malapa, beng ba dikgwebo, basebetsi le mekgatlo ya baahi, re lokela ho ba le seabo twantshong ya bosenyi..     Kabinete na le tshepo ya hore ditjhelete tse ding tse behetsweng thoko ke Lefapha la Mapolesa bakeng sa diteishene tsa mapolesa tse nang le palo hodimo ya melato ya dipolao, dipeto le diketso tse ding tsa bosenyi ba dikgoka, di tla thusa ho fetola maemo le ho tlisa polokeho metseng..     Tsa Morao tsa COVID-.
tgt_text: Bugebengu nenkhohlakalo.

src_text: Kabinete hopoditse bohle hore COVID-19 ha so fele mme dikotsi tsa tshwaetso tse ntjha di tla eketseha nakong ya mariha.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokuboshwa kwebantfu labahlukahlukene mayelana nekukhohlisa nekukhwabanisa imali kanye nangekwenta inkhohlakalo.

src_text: Re tlameha ho tswela pele ho nka mehato ya bohlokwa ya ho itshireletsa le ba bang kenyeletsa ho hlapa kapa ho hlwekisa matsoho kgafetsa, ho rwala semonkwana ha le kahara moaho, ho se atamelane le ba bang, ho bula difenstere hore ho kene moya le ho enta..     Seboka sa African Union (AU).
tgt_text: Loku kufaka ekhatsi basebenti baphambilini labebasetikhundleni letisetulu nalabo bebasebentela tinkhapani tahulumende, labanye babo babukene nemacala ekuphula Umtsetfo Wekuphatfwa Kwetimali Tahulumende, wemnyaka we-1999 (Umtsetfo we-1 wemnyaka we-1999).

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tsebahatso, boitlamo le boinehelo bo ananetsweng Sebokeng se sa Tlwaelehang sa AU sa Boferekanyi le Diphetoho tse sa Tsamaelaneng le Molaotheo Afrika se neng se tshwaretswe Malabo, Republic of Equatorial Guinea, ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong..     Baetapele ba Afrika ba lekotse ditshoso tse pheelletseng, ba lekola mekgwa ya jwale ya ho di arabela mme ba itlama ho matlafatsa polokeho ya dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa AU tse tobaneng le boferekanyi le bongangele..     Lefu la Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Lokuboshwa loku – lokufaka ekhatsi sisebenti SeLitiko Letasekhaya kuSikhungo Sekwamukela Tifikanemtfwalo   i-Desmond Tutu ePretoria lesisolwa ngekugwazelwa ngumuntfu lomchamuki – kuletsa bufakazi bekutsi akekho umuntfu longetulu kwemtsetfo nekutsi kute indzawo yebasebenti labangakatsembeki kumkhakha wahulumende.

src_text: Kabinete tiiseditse Maafrika Borwa hore balaodi ba rona ba tsa bophelo bo botle ba malala laotswe ho beha leihlo le ho thibela lefu la Monkeypox kamora hore le qhome dinaheng tse se nang lona.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyawamukela futsi umsebenti lochubekako wekuletfwa eNingizimu Afrika letelamani temajaha takaGupta, Rajesh na-Atul.

src_text: Leha ho se motho ya fumanweng na le lefu lena Afrika Borwa, balaodi ba tsa bophelo bo botle naheng ba tswela pele ho beha maemo ana leihlo     Qeto ya Kabinete.
tgt_text: Loku kulandzela kuboshwa kwabo lokusandza kwenteka eDubai endzaweni yase-UAE emva kwekutsi Inhlangano Yemhlaba Yemaphoyisa Etebugebengu (i-Interpol) ikhiphe sicwayiso.

src_text: Puisano le Setjhaba ka Mehato ya ho Sebetsana le Kgwebo seng Molaong ya Masalla Ditshepe.
tgt_text: Letelamani leti tiyafunwa eNingizimu Afrika mayelana netinsolo tekubandzakanyeka kulokubamba umbuso ngabhongwane, lokufaka ekhatsi kukhohlisa nekushushumbisa imali.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho be le dipuisano le setjhaba mabapi le ditshisinyo tsa ho thibela kgwebo ya masalla ditshepe tse utswitsweng le tse lokisitsweng.
tgt_text: Kuyachubeka kucocisana emkhatsini kwema-ejensi etemtsetfo ase-UAE newaseNingizimu Afrika kute baletfwe kulelive.

src_text: Boshodu ba masalla ditshepe le dikheibole tsa koporo meralong ya ditshebeletso ya setjhaba bo sitisa tshebetso ya moruo ka ho baka ditjeho tse hodimo.
tgt_text: Kuboshwa kwabo kukhomba kutibophelela kwahulumende ekulweni nebugebengu nenkhohlakalo ngaphandle kwekutsatsa luhlangotsi nangekungesabi.

src_text: Tse ding tsa ditshitiso di kenyeletsa tshitiso ya phepelo ya motlakase le ditshebeletso tsa diterene ka lebaka la diporo tse sentsweng.
tgt_text: Lokuboshwa kwabo kukhombisa kutsi tinhlelo netinchubo tisebenta kahle kakhulu ekwenteni labo labagangako baphendvule kuletigameko tabo tebugebengu lobesabekako nekucinisekisa kutsi kute umuntfu longetulu kwemtsetfo.

src_text: Ho sitisa tsamaiso ya dipalangwang tsa bapalami ho eketsa ditefello tsa ho tsamaya.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyayigceka lemitamo lesebaleni yekucekela phasi umnotfo nelive lakitsi kulandzela lokulinyatwa kwekhebuli kuYunithi 1 ye-Eskom Esiteshini iMatla eMpumalanga.

src_text: Dikheibole tsa motlakase tse sentsweng le tse sa bolokehang di kotsi ho baahi, haholoholo bana..     Kabinete laetse dtic ho etella pele dipuisano bakeng sa nako itseng, le ho nonya maikutlo setjhaba le makala loketseng, ka mehato sebetsang hantle eo mmuso ka kenyang tshebetsong ho thibela ho senngwa ha meralo ya ditshebeletso ya bohlokwa.
tgt_text: Lesi bekusigameko sesine setinsolo tekucekela phasi titeshi takitsi tagezi emva kwekutsi kube naletinye tigameko letifana naleti etiteshini letintsatfu kulamaviki lamatsatfu lengcile.

src_text: Kamora moo, Kabinete tla tsebahatsa mehato tjhaetsweng monwana     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Letibalobalo takamuva tebugebengu tikhomba kutsi kufuneka sente kancono njengemmango kute sicinisekise kutsi imimmango yetfu iphephile.

src_text: Seboka sa Matjhaba se Mabapi le Theknoloji Polokong ya Kgotso (PTPS) sa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN).
tgt_text: Loku kusikhumbuta kutsi kunciphisa bugebengu kungumsebenti wemmango wonkhe nekutsi sonkhe – lokufaka ekhatsi emaphoyisa, baholi betepolitiki, imimmango, imindeni, bosomabhizinisi, basebenti kanye netinhlangano temmango – kufuneka sidlale indzima yetfu.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwara seboka sa Botshelela sa PTPS Lekgotleng la Diphuputso tsa Saense le Diindasteri Pretoria ho tloha ka Labobedi la la 21 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 24 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi inekutetsemba lokukhulu kutsi imali leyengetwe Yindvuna Yetemaphoyisa yacondziswa kutiteshi temaphoyisa letinemazinga lasetulu ekubulala, ekudlengula kanye nalamanye emacala lanebudlova itawusita kugucula simo bese kuba nemimmango lephephile..     Takamuva nge-COVID-.

src_text: Ho lebelletswe baromuwa ba 300 ba tswang dinaheng tse 50 tseo leng ditho sebokeng sena..     Seboka se kopanya ba nang le thahasello ho tswa sesoleng, sepoleseng, le batho ka kakaretso Dinaheng tseo leng Ditho tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng molemong wa hore ba sebetse mmoho tshebedisong ya ditheknoloji tsa sejwalejwale le tse tswetseng pele le dikgopolotaba matsholong poloko ya kgotso Matjhaba Kopaneng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikhumbuta wonkhe umuntfu kutsi i-COVID-19 iyakapheli futsi bungoti bekutseleleka kabusha butawenyuka ngesikhatsi sasebusika.

src_text: Seboka se tla sebediswa jwaloka lepatlelo la ho abelana ka tlhahisoleseding le ho qothisana lehlokwa bakeng sa dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa UN tse nang le seabo matsholong ho boloka kgotso ka tshebediso ya ditheknoloji tsa morao tjena matsholong ana..     Tlhodisano ya Naha Tshwarwang Kamora Dilemo tse Pedi tla Tshwarwa Lekgetlo la Bone ya WorldSkills South Africa (WSZA).
tgt_text: Kufuneka sichubeke kulandzela tonkhe tindlela tekutivikela netekuvikela labanye bantfu.

src_text: Ho tshwerwe Tlhodisano ya Naha ya Kamora Dilemo tse Pedi ya Bone ya WSZA, Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natal ho tloha ka la 7 ho ya ho la 10 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba: “Ntlafatso ya Tlhahiso ya ba Etsang Mesebetsi ya Matsoho Mongwahakgolong wa bo-21”..     Ketsahalo ena sebedisetswa ho ntlafatsa boiphihlelo ba batho ba etsang mesebetsi ya matsoho jwaloka mosebetsi ka phedisang motho le ho lebisa tshebedisanong le ba bang indastering ena.
tgt_text: Loku kufaka ekhatsi kuhlala sigeza tandla noma sisebentisa sibulalimagciwane, kufaka sifonyo uma sisendzaweni levalekile, sihlale ngekuchelelana, sivule emafasitelo kute kungene umoya nekutsi sigome.

src_text: Ketsahalo ena boetse sebedisetswa ho lekola boemo ba boithuto ba mosebetsi le ntshetsopele ya ba etsang mesebetsi ya matsoho hodima ho kgothaletsa ho kgethwa ha mesebetsi ya matsoho jwaloka kgetho ya pele ya baithuti ba rona     Molaetsa.

MatshedisoKabinete le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba lebisitse matshediso Lelapeng la Boreneng le setjhabeng sa Borena ba Maphoto kamora ho hlokahala ha Motlotlehi Morena Moholo Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau     KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba so ka ba tlola molao..     Monghadi Jacob Ganny Mbele jwaloka Molaodi-Kakaretso (DG) Lefapheng la Diminerale le Eneji..     Mme Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada jwaloka Motlatsa-Molaodi-Kakaretso (DDG): Botsamaisi ba Meru Lefapheng la Meru, Botshwasi le Tikoloho.
tgt_text: Umhlangano weLubumbano Lwemave Ase-Afrika.

src_text: Mme Susan Mafanedza Masapu jwaloka Moeletsi ya ka Sehloohong wa Mmuso wa Molao Lefapheng la Toka le Ntshetsopele ya Molaotheo..     Mme Doris Tshepe jwaloka Mokhomeshenara Khomesheneng ya Ditlhodisano..     Ngaka Alex Mahapa jwaloka Moeletsi ya Ikgethang wa nako tsohle ho Letona le Tshwereng Mokobobo lefapheng la Tshebeletso ya Mmuso le Tsamaiso.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela lesimemetelo, titsembiso nekutibophelela letitsetfwe Emhlanganweni We-AU Longakavami Wetekuvukela Umbuso Newetingucuko Letingekho KuMtsetfosisekelo e-Afrika lobewubanjelwe eMalabo, eRiphabhlikhi Yase-Equitorial Guinea, NgeMgcibelo, ti-28 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Diphetoho Maemong Lehodimo.
tgt_text: Kuntjintja Kwesimo Selitulu.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo ya Monghadi Alok Sharma, Afrika Borwa, eo leng Mopresidente wa Seboka sa bo-26 sa Maemo Lehodimo sa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN), ho tloha ka la 19 ho ya ho la 21 Phuptjane 2022, le tekolo ya hae ya hore Afrika Borwa bontshitse ho ikemisetsa ho fetohela enejing ya mehlodi ya tsa tlhaho..  Ka 2021, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa kopane le baetapele ba bang tsebahatsong ya tshebedisano ya bohlokwa le dinaha tsa France, Germany, United Kingdom le Amerika, mmoho le European Union, molemong wa ho tshehetsa phetoho nang le toka moruong sebedisang mehlodi ya eneji sa hlahiseng khabone le setjhaba se nang le bokgoni ba ho emelana le maemo lehodimo mabe..  Afrika Borwa sebeditse ka thata itokisetsa ho fetela tlhahisong ya motlakase hlwekileng le ho fallela mehloding ya eneji ya tlhaho kang matla mafura hlwekileng etswang ka metsi le motlakase, dimela, matla moya, matla letsatsi le metsi, hara mehlodi meng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwemukele kuvakasha eNingizimu Afrika kweMnu.

src_text: Motswako ona wa eneji tlisa tekatekano pakeng tsa mehlodi ya eneji ho netefatsa matla tshepehang emelanang le ditlhoko tsa naha tsa eneji tse eketsehang..  Tshebediso ya Ente ya Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Alok Sharma, Mengameli weNgcungcutsela yema-26 yekuGucugucuka kwesimo selitulu yeNhlangano YaMhlabuhlangene (i-UN), kusukela mhla ti-19 kuya kumhla ti-21 iNhlaba 2022, kanye nekuhlola kwakhe kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ikhombise kutibophelela ngalokucacile  ekugucukeleni emandleni lahlobile.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho theoha ka matla ha palo ya batho ba tshwaetswang ke COVID-19 rekotilweng Afrika Borwa dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng mme ya kgothaletsa batho bohle ba loketseng, ho tswela pele ka ho enta leng ntho thusang ho thibela ho kula haholo, ho robatswa sepetlele le ho hlokahala..  Ho fihlela jwale halofo ya palo ya batho ba baholo ba Maafrika Borwa se fumane bonnyane ente le nngwe ya COVID-.
tgt_text: Nga-2021, Mengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela nalabanye baholi ekumemeteleni budlelwane lobuyinchophamlandvo nahulumende waseFrance, iJalimane, i-United Kingdom ne-United States, kanye ne-European Union, kusekela ingucuko lenebulungiswa emnotfweni wekhabhoni lephansi kanye nemphakatsi lokwati kumelana nesimo selitulu.

src_text: Mmuso ikemiseditse ho sebedisa tjhelete ya tswala tlase eo sa tswa kadingwa ke Banka la Lefatshe ho reka diente tse ding tsa COVID-19 le ho netefatsa hore setjhaba se sireletsehile ka ho lekaneng ditshwaetsong tse ka bang teng..  Kabinete boetse buisane ka dintlha tse amanang le tswelopele taolong ya sewa sa COVID-19, haholoholo kgatelopele etswang molemong wa ho kgutlela bophelong bo tlwaelehileng.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika beyisebenta kamatima ekulungiseni sisekelo setfu sengucuko yemandla lahlobile futsi siye emitfonjeni yemandla lahlobile lefana ne-hydrogen leluhlata, i-biomass, emandla emoya, emandla elilanga nemandla laphehlwa ngemanti, kulokunye lokuvuselekako.

src_text: Letona la Bophelo bo Botle, Ngaka Joe Phaahla, le tla fana ka dintlha tse ding..  Letsatsi la Naha la Batjha.
tgt_text: Loku lokubitwa ngekutsi kubhicwa kwemandla kuvumela kulingana phakatsi kwemitfombo yemandla kuze kucinisekiswe emandla latsembekile kuze kuhlangabetwane netidzingo temandla letikhulako telive.

src_text: Kabinete lebohile Maafrika Borwa ohle ikamahantseng le mekete ya naha ya Letsatsi la Naha la Batjha ya Labone la la 16 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “Ntshetsopele ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa ya moshwelella ya batjha le matla bona molemong wa bokamoso bo tjhatsi.” Moya wa tjantjello le matla bontshitsweng ke batjha naheng ka bophara ke dintho tse ka ketekelwang mme di tlisa tshepo ya bokamoso bo tjhatsi..  Jwalokaha re lebile mafelong Kgwedi ya Naha ya Batjha re tebiseng matsapa rona ho netefatsa hore batjha ba fihlella mananeo mangata ao mmuso fanang ka ona le ho ba thusa hore ba kgone ho ba le seabo moruong..  Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba, jwaloka mohiri moholo arabetse phephetso ena ka ho thusa batjha ba phethetseng dithuto tsa bona ba sa sebetseng ho fumana boiphihlelo ka Lenaneo la Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba la ho Rupella Batjha Mosebetsing.
tgt_text: Kugomela Sifo seLigciwane leKhorona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Mmuso boetse kenya tshebetsong Letlole la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba (SEF) le Tsehebeletso tsoseleditsweng ya Naha ya Batjha (NYS) leng maiteko ho theha mesebetsi tla thusa khirong ya batjha ba ka bang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kwehla lokukhulu kwetifo letiphatselene ne-COVID-19 letirekhodwe eNingizimu Afrika kulamaviki lambalwa lakengcile yaphindze yakhutsata bonkhe bantfu labafanelekile kutsi bachubeke nekugoma, lokusita kuvimbela kugula lokumatima, kulaliswa esibhedlela nekufa.
Ihhafu yabo bonkhe bantfu labadzala baseNingizimu Afrika kuze kube manje basitfolile silinganisomutsi sinye semjovo wekugomela i-COVID-.

src_text: Maiteko ana tla fana ka boiphihlelo bo hlokehang haholo ba mosebetsing mme boele tiise molemo wa seabo sa baahi.
tgt_text: Hulumende uhlose kusebentisa imali lenentalo lencane lesandza kugunyatwa liBhange leMhlaba kutsenga nekwengeta imitsamo yemjovo ye-COVID-19 aphindze acinisekise kutsi sive sivikeleke ngalokwenele etifweni letingaba khona.

src_text: SEF sebetsa mmoho le mekgatlo eo eseng ya mmuso (di-NGO) ha NYS hira batjha ditshebeletsong tse tswelang baahi molemo naheng ka bophara..  Dipalangwang.
Kabinete ananetse Morero wa Dintlha tse 11 wa Tshebetso tla sebetsana le ho kwalwa ha mebila le ho hirwa ha matswantle jwaloka bakganni ba dilori.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yacubungula tindzaba letiphatselene nentfutfuko ekulawulweni kwabhubhane we-COVID-19, ikakhulukati ngenchubekelembili leseyentiwe kuze kubuyelwe ngalokugcwele emisebentini yetenhlalomnotfo letayelekile.

src_text: Morero ona sibollotsweng ke Komiti ya Matona Fapaneng (IMC) ya Mebila le ho tsamaiswa ha Thepa ka tshebedisano le ba amehang indastering ya ho tsamaiswa ha thepa, hara tse ding kgothaletsa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha ditokomane tsa ho eta le ho ikamahanya le melao ya tsa basebetsi..  IMC thehetswe ho sebetsana le diketsahalo tse jeleng setsi tsa ho kwalwa ha mebila le mehwanto ya boipelaetso ya bakganni ba dilori ba Maafika Borwa ba sa kgotsofalang.
tgt_text: Ngcongcoshe Wetempilo, Dkt.

src_text: Mehwanto le ho kwalwa ha mebila di na le kameho mpe phallong ya dipalangwang tshosa boramatsete ba dinaha tse ding mme sa bohlokwa haholo na le kameho mpe moruong le metjheng bohlokwa ya phepelo sebedisang mebila amehang mehwantong..  Kgaello ya metsi Masepaleng Moholo wa Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).
tgt_text: Joe Phaahla, utawuniketa imininingwane leyengetiwe.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse seabo sa Lefapha la Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS) Masepaleng Moholo wa NMB, Kapa Botjhabela molemong wa ho thibela ho kwalwa ha phepelo ya metsi nakong eo provense tobaneng le mathata matla kgaello ya metsi qadileng ka.
tgt_text: Lusuku LweLusha LwaVelonkhe .

src_text: DWS sebetsa le provense ho kenya tshebetsong mehato ya nako kgutshwane bohareng le telele ya ho lwantsha ditlamorao tsa komello..  Kabinete boetse ipileditse ho baahi ba NMB ho ikamahanya le melawana ya metsi behilweng ke bomasepala ba lehae ho netefatsa boteng ba metsi nako telele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika ngekuhlanganyela emigubhweni yeLilanga Lwelusha Lwavelonkhe ngaLwesine, mhla ti-16 kuNhlaba 2022 ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Kutfutfukisa kuphila lokusimeme nekusimama kwebantfu labasha kuze kube nelikusasa lelincono.”  Umoya wemdlandla newekucina lokhonjiswe lusha esiveni sakitsi imphela usizatfu sekubungata kanye nelitsemba lelikusasa lelincono.

src_text: Ka kakaretso, metsi sebediswang ka letsatsi lokela ho fokotswa ka dilitara tse dimiliyone di 50, ho tloha ho dilitara tse dimiliyone di 280 tse sebediswang hona jwale ka letsatsi, mme sena se tla lebisa tshebedisong ya dilitara tse dimiliyone di 230 ka letsatsi..  Bosenyi le bobodu.
tgt_text: Njengoba iNyanga Yavelonkhe Yelusha seyiya ngasekupheleni, asicinise imitamo yetfu yekucinisekisa kutsi bantfu labasha bayafinyelela etinhlelweni letinyenti tekwesekwa letiniketwa nguhulumende futsi sente kube lula kutibandzakanya kwabo emnotfweni..  Luphiko Lwetemisebenti Yahulumende, njengemcashi lomkhulu kunawo onkhe, liphendvule lensayeya ngekwenta labaceceshwe ngeticu labangasebenti kutsi batfole lwati lwekusebenta nangeluHlelo Lwekusebenta Ufundza ngaloluphiko lwetemisebenti Yahulumende.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tshwarwa ho sa tswa etsahala ha mosebetsi wa Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha ofising ya Benoni ya nehileng moahi wa Bangladesh bukana ya ho eta ya mokunyata.
tgt_text: Hulumende uphindze futsi waphumelelisa Sikhwama Sekucashwa Kwetenhlalo (i-SEF) kanye netindlela letivuselelwe temisebenti yeLuhlelo Lwelusha Lwavelonkhe (i-NYS) letitawutsatsa bantfu labasha labange-50 000 ngalinye emnotfweni.

src_text: Mosebetsi eo leng Mme Sibongile Simelane fumane beili ya R5 000 Lekgotleng la Dinyewe la Makgistrata la Benoni ka Labobedi la la 21 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Lemitamo ngeke inikete kuphela sipiliyoni sekusebenta lesidzingeka kakhulu   kodvwa itawuphindza futsi icinisekise ligugu lekuba sakhamuti lesisebentako.

src_text: Moahi enwa wa Bangladesh leng Monghadi Fahim Kazi tshwerwe leka ho tswa naheng ena ka la 12 Motsheanong 2022 sebedisa lebitso la ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.
tgt_text: I-SEF ibambisana netinhlangano letitimele (ema-NGO) bese kutsi i-NYS ibhalisa bantfu labasha kutinsita letenta imiphakatsi izuze eveni lonkhe..  Tekutfutsa   .

src_text: Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha (DHA) le sa tswa romela sebapadi sa dipaleng sa Lithuania, Ieva Andrejevaite naheng ya habo, ha ne batla ho sebedisa hampe botsamaisi ba Afrika Borwa ba taolo ya baphaphathehi iqapela pale eo seng nnete batla botshabelo kwano ka lebaka la “ntwa Ukraine.”.
tgt_text: IKhabinethi ilwamukele luHlelo lwekuSebenta lolunemaphuzu la-11 lekubukana nekuvinjwa kwemigwaco kanye nekucashwa kwebantfu bangaphandle njengabashayeli bemaloli.

src_text: Kabinete rorisitse mosebetsi etswang ke Karolo ya ho Lwantsha Bobodu ya DHA thoholetsa le ho kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa ho tswela pele ka ho tlaleha diketso tseo tsa tlolo ya molao.
tgt_text: Loluhlelo, lolwasungulwa liKomidi Labongcongcoshe Betemigwaco Nemitfwalo (i-IMC) ngekubambisana nalabatsintsekako embonini yetemgwaco nemitfwalo, likhutsata kulokunye kuphocelelwa kwetidzingo tema-visa kanye nekutfotjelwa kwemitsetfo yetebasebenti.

src_text: Diketso tse seng molaong tsa Maafrika Borwa rekisang boitsebiso ba ona di na le ditlamorao tse mpe le tse kgolo bakeng sa polokeho ya naha le maemo yona bophelong ba setjhaba le moruong wa yona.
tgt_text: I-IMC yasungulwa kuze kutsi ibukane nekwandza kwekuvinjwa kwemigwaco kanye nemibhikisho yebashayeli bemaloli baseNingizimu Afrika labangakajabuli.

src_text: Mmuso tla tswella le ho nka mehato matla kgahlano le mang kapa mang ya ikamahanyang le diketso tse seng molaong tseo leng tello melao ya rona ya ho kena naheng ena, ntle le tshabo kapa leeme..  Kabinete boetse ananetse ho tshwarwa ho sa tswa etsahala ha titjhere ya Durban, mme Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – ya ahlotsweng dilemo tse tharo tsa ho sebeletsa setjhaba le tse nne tsa tjhankaneng, mme hloletswe kantle dilemo tse tharo ke Lekgotla la Dinyewe la Lebatowa la Mlazi, Kwazulu-Natal – ka ho tlola Molao wa Dikgetho tsa Bomasepala wa Mebuso ya Lehae, 2000 (Molao wa 27 wa 2000).
tgt_text: Imibhikisho nekuvinjwa kwemigwaco kuba nemtselela lomubi ekuhambeni, kwetfuse nebatjalitimali balamanye emave futsi lokubaluleke kakhulu, kuba nemtselela lomubi emnotfweni kanye nekuphakelwa kwemikhicito lebalulekile lesebentisa tindlela letitsintsekile.

src_text: Jwaloka titjhere sekolong se neng se le sebaka sa ho kgetha nakong ya Dikgetho tsa Bomasepala, Mme Gabuza dumetse molato wa ho kgetha makgetlo 24, ho kenyeletsa makgetlo 12 Dikgethong tsa Bomasepala le 12 Dikgetho tsa Diwate..  Kahlolo ena ke pontsho matla ya boinehelo ba Khomeshene ya Dikgetho ya Afrika Borwa ya ho nka bohato kapele le ho bontsha taolo ya boitshwaro bo bobe.
tgt_text: Kuswelakala Kwemanti kuleliDolobhakati le-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB).

src_text: Ena ke tiisetso matla ya mekgwatshebetso ya dikgetho seng matlafaditswe ka ho hlahiswa ha Sesebediswa sa Taolo ya Bakgethi thibelang ho kgetha habedi..  Kabinete tiisitse hore dikgetho ke tshiya ya demokrasi ya rona mme di lokela ho sireletswa ka hohle kamoo ho ka kgonehang kateng..  Seboka sa bo-12 sa Matona (MC12) sa Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Kgwebisano (WTO).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kungenelela kweLitiko Letemanti Nekutfutfwa Kwekungcola (i-DWS) kuMasipala weliDolobhakati lase-NMB eMphumalanga Kapa kuze kugwenywe Kwehla Kwemanti Emadamini njengoba sifundza sibukene nengwadla yekuswelakala kwemanti lokucale nga-.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse diphetho tsa WTO MC12 neng tshwaretswe Geneva, Switzerland ho tloha ka la 12 ho ya ho la 17 Phuptjane 2022, haholoholo qeto reng dinaha tse nang le bokgoni di ka ba le ditokelo tsa ho hlahisa diente tsa COVID-19 ho fihlela ka.
tgt_text: I-DWS isebentisana nesifundza kwenta tinyatselo tesikhatsi lesifishane, lesiphakatsi nalesidze kubukana nekunciphisa umtselela longaba khona wesomiso.

src_text: Qeto ya ho atolosa sena hore se kenyeletse kalafo le hlahlobo tsa COVID-19 kgutliseditswe morao ka dikgwedi tse tsheletseng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze futsi incusa base-NMB kutsi babambelele emigomeni yemanti lebekwe bomasipala bendzawo kuze kutsi kucinisekiswe kuvikeleka kwemanti.

src_text: Esale Afrika Borwa itlhomme pele boipiletsong ba hore WTO dumelle dinaha tse ding ho ba le ditokelo tsa ho iketsetsa diente tsa COVID-19 mme sena se ka netefatsa hore ho na le phihlello lekanang enteng le ho kgonahatsa hore dinaha tse nang le bokgoni ba ho hlahisa diente di di etsa..  Seboka se boetse sa inehela motjheng bulehileng le kenyeletsang bohle molemong wa ho tlisa diphetoho mesebetsig ya sona, mme ha dumellanwa ka ditumellano tsa kgwebisano tse sebetsanang le tsa bophelo bo botle, ho behwa ha meedi dithusong tsa botshwasi, kemiso ya nakwana kgwebisanong ya marangranng le boteng ba dijo nako telele  Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Sekukonkhe, kusetjentiswa kwemanti kufanele kwehliswe ngemalitha latizigidzi leti-50 ngelilanga, kusukela ezingeni lamanje lemalitha latigidzi leti-280 ngelilanga kwehle kuye emalitheni latizigidzi leti-230 ngelilanga.

src_text: Kgatelopele Lenaneong la ho Fallela Kgasong ya Dijithale (BDM).
tgt_text: Bugebengu Nenkhohlakalo.

src_text: Kabinete tsebisitswe ka tsa morao Lenaneong la BDM mme ya amohela kgatelopele entsweng ka ho kenngwa ha di-set-top box le karolo ya ho fallela kgasong ya dijithale ho tloha ho ya analogue.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kuboshwa kwakamuva kwesikhulu seLitiko Letasekhaya lesisebenta ehhovisi lase-Benoni ngekuniketa sakhamuti sase-Bangladeshi ipasipoti yemgugu.

src_text: Kabinete boetse tobokeditse tlhokeho potlakileng ya ho phethela BDM molemong wa ho etsa hore ho be le spectrum se hlokehang bakeng sa phihlello ya inthanete, le bakeng sa mesebetsi meng amanang le theknoloji ya tlhahisoleseding le dikgokahano..  Letona la Dikgokahano le Ditheknoloji tsa Dijithale, Khumbudzo Ntshavheni le tla ba le seboka le boraditaba hosane (Labohlano, 24 Phuptjane) ho fana ka dintlha tse ding.
tgt_text: Sikhulu, Mk Sibongile Simelane, uniketwe ibheyili ye-R5 000 eNkantolo yaMantji yaseBenoni ngaLwesibili, mhla ti-21 iNhlaba.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Selemo le Selemo ya Naha ya Maemo Ditokelo tsa Ngwana.
tgt_text: LowaseBangladeshi, uMnu Fahim Kazi, waboshwa ngesikhatsi atama kubaleka kuleli mhla ti-12 iNkhwekhweti 2022 ngaphansi kweligama lelitsi, 'Lebogang Ndlovu'.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tlaleho ya bobedi ya Selemo le Selemo ya Naha ya Maemo Ditokelo tsa Ngwana.
tgt_text: Litiko Letasekhaya (i-DHA) lisandza kucosha umlingisi waseLithuania, Mk.

src_text: Tlaleho fana ka tlhahisoleseding mabapi le ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Morero wa Naha wa Tshebetso wa Bana bakeng sa 2019 ho ya ho.
tgt_text: Ieva Andrejevaite, lobekafuna kuhlukumeta umbuso wekuphatsa babaleki eNingizimu Afrika lapho acambe indzaba yekufuna kufaka sicelo sekukhoseliswa ngenca “yemphi lese-Ukraine”.
IKhabhinethi iyawuncoma umsebenti lowenziwa yi-DHA's Counter Corruption Unit.

src_text: Tlaleho hlakisa dikatleho tsa 2020 ho ya ho boetse hlakisa dibaka tse sa ntseng di fana ka bothata, ho kenyeletsa polokeho ya bana le ho se lekane pakeng tsa bana ba hlokang le ba sa hlokeng.
tgt_text: Ishayela lihlombe futsi ikhutsata bantfu nje baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi bachubeke nekubika tento tebugebengu letinjengaleti.

src_text: Tlaleho boetse bontsha kamoo sewa sa COVID-19 se ammeng bana kateng nakong ena..  Sepheo ka mehato ya ho kena dipakeng kenngwang tshebetsong ke mmuso ke ho netefatsa ho hlomphuwa ha ditokelo tsa bana, jwalokaha di hlalositswe Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Tento letingekho emtsetfweni tebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika labatsengisa bunjalo babo tinemiphumela lemibi kakhulu ekuvikeleni live kanye nesimo senhlalomnotfo yelive.

src_text: Mehato ena boetse tshehetsa maitlamo naha Ditumellanong tsa Dinaha tsa Matjhaba tsa Ditokelo tsa Ngwana (UNCRC) le Tokomane ya Tumellano ya Afrika ya Ditokelo le Thekolohelo ya Ngwana (ACRWC).
tgt_text: Hulumende utawuchubeka utawucinisa sandla kunome ngubani lobandzakanyeka etentweni letingekho emtsetfweni letibukela phansi imitsetfo yetfu yekufika kwebantu lababuya kulamanye mave, ngaphandle kokwesaba kumbe kukhetsa.

src_text: Afrika Borwa saenne ditokomane tsa UNCRC le ACRWC..  Tlaleho bokeleditswe ka tshebedisano le mafapha mmuso le ba bang ba amehang boemong ba naha le ba diprovense.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yakwemukela kuboshwa nekugwetjwa kwakamuva kwathishela waseThekwini, Mk Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) - logwetjwe minyaka lemitsatfu yekucondzisa tigwegwe kanye neminyaka lemine abhadla ejele, lokulengiswe yonkhe iminyaka lemitsatfu, eNkantolo yesiFundza yaseMlazi KwaZulu- Natal – ngekwephula uMtsetfo Welukhetfo Lwabomasipala Bahulumende Wasekhaya uMtsetfo, wa-2000 (uMtsetfo Nombolo-27 wa-2000).

src_text: Tlaleho felletseng tla behwa websaeteng ya Lefapha la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba: www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Njengathishela kulesikolwa lebesisetjentiswa njengesikhungo sekuvota ngesikhatsi seLukhetfo laboMasipala ngeMphala 2021, Mk.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Nako le Nako ya Afrika Borwa ho UNCRC Kopantsweng ya boraro ho ya ho ya botshelela ho UNCRC.
tgt_text: Gabuza walivuma licala lekukhwabanisa emavoti lange-24, lahlanganisa la-12 eLukhetfo lwaboMasipala lokufaka nala-12 eLukhetfo lwemaWadi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Tlaleho ya boraro ho ya ho ya botshelela ya Nako le Nako ho UNCRC.
Tlaleho ena tla kamora ya bobedi tekilweng ho UNCRC ka.
tgt_text: Kuboshwa nekugwetjwa kugcizelela kutibophelela kweKhomishini yeluKhetfo yaseNingizimu Afrika, kungenelela kusenesikhatsi nekusebentisa kuphatfwa kwemiphumela.
Loku kubufakazi lobucinile betinhlelo telukhetfo, leseticinisiwe kusukela kwetfulwa lithulusi Lekuphatsa Bavoti i-Voter Management Device lelivimbela kuvota kabili.

src_text: Tlaleho bokeleditswe ho latela Karolo ya 44 ya UNCRC, mme boetse akaretsa ditlhokomelo le dikgothaletso tse entsweng tlalehong ya ho qetela.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikucinisekisile kutsi lukhetfo lusisekelo sentsandvo yelinyenti yetfu futsi kufanele luvikelwe ngato tonkhe tindlela.

src_text: UNCRC rometse ditlhokomelo le dikgothaletso tsa naha ka.
tgt_text: Inkhomfa Yetindvuna (i-MC12) ye-12 yeNhlangano Yemhlaba Yekuhweba (i-WTO).

IKhabhinethi iyamukele imiphumela ye-WTO MC12 lebeyibanjelwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland kusukela mhla ti-12 kuya mhla ti-17 kuNhlaba 2022, ikakhulukati sincumo sekutsi emave lafanelekile angaweca emalungelo ebunikati bemjovo we-COVID-19 kuze kube ngu-.

src_text: Pokeletso entswe ka tshebedisano le mafapha ohle loketseng le ba amehang naheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Sincumo sekutsi kululwe lokulashwa nekuhlolelwa i-COVID-19 kwabambeteleka tinyanga letisitfupha.

src_text: Tlaleho felletseng tla phatlalatswa ha se teketswe UNCRC.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika beyisolo ihola lubito lwekutsi i-WTO ihocise emalungelo ekuvikelwa kwemphahla lecanjiwe lephatselene nemitsi yekugomela i-COVID-19 letawucinisekisa kufinyelela lokulinganako emitsini yekugoma futsi ivumele emave lanemakhono ekwenta imitsi yekugoma kutsi ayente.

src_text: Tlaleho ya naha ka ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong.
tgt_text: Ingcungcutsela iphindze yatibophelela eluhlelweni loluvulelekile nalolubandzakanya konkhe lokugucula yonkhe imisebenti yayo futsi yavumelana ngenhlanganisela yetivumelwano tekuhwebelana letibukene netindzawo letifana netemphilo, kubeka mincele ekusiteni ngekudoba lusito lwetimali, kumisa kuhweba nge-inthanethi kanye nekutfolakala kwekudla  Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha tlaleho ya pele ya Afrika Borwa ya naha mabapi le ho Kenngwa Tshebetsong ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong tekwa Lenaneong la Phumantsho ya Bodulo la UN (UN-Habitat).
tgt_text: Inchubekelembili lemayelana neLuhlelo Lwekutfutsela eKusakateni Ngedijithali (i-BDM).

src_text: UN-Habitat amohetse Lenaneo la yona le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong, Sebokeng sa yona sa Phumantsho ya Bodulo le Ntshetsopele ya Bodulo ba Ditoropng bo Tsitsitseng ka Mphalane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi itfole lwati lolusha ngeluHlelo lwe-BDM futsi yaphawula ngenchubekelembili leseyentiwe ngekufakwa kwemabhokisi elizinga lelisetulu njengencenye yekusuka ekusakateni nge-analogu kuya ekusakateni ngedijithali.

src_text: Ho ne ho lebelletswe hore dinaha tseo leng ditho di nehelane ka ditlaleho tsa kgatelopele ka ho ithaopa..  Afrika Borwa tsheheditse ho amohelwa ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong mme hamorao ya le kenya tshebetsong ka Moralotshebetso Momahaneng wa Ntshetsopele ya Metse ya Ditoropong (IUDF).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yakugcizelela kuphutfuma kwekuphotfula i-BDM kukhulula emagagasi emoya ladzingekako ekusakata kabanti abomakhalekhikhini, kanye naletinye tinjongo letiphatselene nebuchwepheshe belwatiso netekuchumana.

src_text: Sepheo sa IUDF ke ho tataisa ntshetsopele ya bodulo ba ditoropong bo kenyeletsang bohle, bo matla le bo nang le seriti..  Tlaleho ya kgatelopele bokeleditswe ka tshebedisano le mmuso wa naha, diprovense le mebuso ya lehae, le mekgatlo loketseng eo seng ya mmuso..  Lewa le Momahaneng la Ntshetsopele ya Batjha (IYDS).
tgt_text: Ngcongcoshe weTekuchumana Nebuchwepheshe Bedijithali Khumbudzo Ntshavheni utobamba umhlangano nebetindzaba kusasa (ngaLwesihlanu, mhla ti-24 kuNhlaba) kuze anikete imininingwane leyengetiwe.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha IYDS.
tgt_text: Umbiko Wemnyaka Wavelonkhe Wesimo Semalungelo Ebantfwana.

src_text: Lewa le thusa ho kenya tshebetsong Leano la Naha la Batjha la 2020 ho ya ho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate uMbiko Wesibili Wemnyaka Wesimo Savelonkhe Semalungelo Ebantfwana latoshicilelwa.

src_text: Le hlalosa diketsahalo, diprojeke le mananeo lokelang ho etswa ke ba fapaneng ba amehang ho tswa mekgatlong ya batjha..
tgt_text: Umbiko uniketa ngelwati lolusha mayelana nekucaliswa kwekusebenta kweluHlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwekusebenta Lwebantfwana esikhatsini sa-2019-.

src_text: Le boetse le thusa ka ho fokotsa phethapheto ya dithuso tsa mmuso mme le tataise kamoo mekgatlo ya basebetsi le lekala la poraefete di ka tshehetsang batjha ho fihlella menyetla.
Pokeletso ya lewa na le maikutlo makala fapaneng setjhabeng..  Moralo wa Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Paballo le Tshebediso ya Ho ya Ho Ile ya Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Umbiko ugcamisa timphumelelo letirekhodiwe tesikhatsi sa-2020-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka moralo wa Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Paballo le Tshebediso ya Moshwelella ya Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Iphindze ivete tindzawo letisasele letiyinsayeya, lokuhlanganisa kuphepha kwebantfwana kanye nekungalingani lokuchubekako phakatsi kwalabaphuyile nalabanotsile macondzana nebantfwana.

src_text: Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa di fana ka motheo wa bohlokwa bakeng sa kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo, mme di bohlokwa boiphedisong ba batho..  Tokomane ena ya Tataiso thusa ho kenya tshebetsong dkgothaletso tsa Moifo wa Boemo bo Hodimo wa Ditsebi kgethilweng ka 2019 hore lekolebotjha maano jwale, molao le mekgwa ya ditaba tse amanang le mefuta ya bohlokwa ya dihlodilweng..  Tlaleho kgothaleditse tshibollo ya leano le leholo le akaretsang la paballo le tshebediso ya Moshwelella ya dihlodilweng tsa naha.
tgt_text: Lombiko uphindze uvete kutsi bhubhane we-COVID-19 ube nemtselela kangakanani ebantfwaneni ngalesikhatsi.

src_text: Leano le tla kenngwa tshebetsong makaleng ohle mmuso.
tgt_text: Tinyatselo tekungenelela leticaliswa nguhulumende kuhloswe ngato kuphumelelisa emalungelo ebantfwana, njengoba kuvetwe kuMtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wa-.

src_text: Paballo bohlokwa bakeng sa letsholo la naha la ho potlakisa kgolo ya moruo le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..  Lewa la Nama ya tse Hlaha.
tgt_text: Tiphindze tisekele tibopho telive eTingcungcutseleni te-UN Letihlangene ngeMalungelo Ebantfwana (i-UNCRC) kanye neMculu Wase-Afrika weMalungelo Nenhlalakahle Yebantfwana (i-ACRWC).

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa Lewa la Nama ya tse Hlaha hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka lona.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika isayine i-UNCRC kanye ne-ACRWC..  Umbiko uhlanganiswe ngekubonisana nematiko ahulumende kanye nembijana letsintsekako labafanelekile ezingeni lavelonkhe nelesifundza.

src_text: Sepheo ka lewa ke ho hophisa le ho tlisa diphetoho indastering ya nama ya tse hlaha.
tgt_text: Umbiko logcwele utofakwa kuwebhusayithi weLitiko Letekutfutfukiswa Kwemphakatsi: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Sepheo se seng ke ho ba le seabo phumanehong ya dijo nako telele..  Indasteri ya nama ya tse hlaha indastering eo haholoholo sa hlophisehang sebetsang ka mokgwa sa momahanang.
tgt_text: Umbiko Wesikhatsi waseNingizimu Afrika Lohlanganisiwe wesitsatfu kuya kuwesitfupha ku-UNCRC.

src_text: Lewa lena le sisinngwang le fana ka mokgwa wa tshebetso tla hlophisa le ho matlafatsa lekala lena jwaloka le fanang ka dijo nako telele le la kgolo ya moruo le ka thusang ho thehweng ha menyetla ya mosebetsi  Dibili.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwetfulwa kweMbiko weSikhatsi wesitsatfu kuya kuwesitfupha ku-UNCRC.

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Merero ya Setso ka Kakaretso ya.
tgt_text: Lombiko ulandzela Umbiko weSikhatsi wesibili lowetfulwa ku-UNCRC nga-..  Lombiko uhlanganiswe ngekulandzela Sihloko se-44 se-UNCRC, uphindze futsi ufake ekhatsi lokucasheliwe kanye netincomo talelive tanga-..  Lombiko wahlanganiswa ngekubonisana nawo onkhe ematiko lafanele kanye nalabatsintsekako eveni lonkhe.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Merero ya Setso ka Kakaretso ya 2022 Palamenteng bakeng sa hore ke sekasekwe.
tgt_text: Umbiko lophelele utawukwatiswa ummango nasewetfulwe ku-UNCRC.

src_text: Sepheo ka dikarolo tse ngotsweng botjha ke ho lekolabotjha Molao wa Boetapele ba Setso le ba MaKhoi-San wa 2019  (Molao wa 3 wa 2019) keneng tshebetsong ka la 01 Mmesa.
tgt_text: Umbiko wavelonkhe lomayelana nekufezekisa Luhlelo Lolusha Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwetindzawo Tasemadolobheni.

Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwembiko wavelonkhe wekucala waseNingizimu Afrika lomayelana nekufezekiswa kweLuhlelo Lolusha Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwetindzawo Tasemadolobheni kuLuhlelo Lwekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu laMhlabuhlangene (i-UN-Habitat).

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya 2022 ya Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang.
tgt_text: I-UN-Habitat yavuma leluHlelo layo Lolusha Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwemadolobha kuNkhomfa yayo lemayelana neteTindlu neNtfutfuko Lesimeme yaseMadolobheni ngeMphala.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya 2022 ya Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang, Palamenteng bakeng sa hore ke sekasekwe.
tgt_text: Emalunga emibuso bekalindzeleke kutsi angenise umbiko wenchubekelembili ngekungacindzetelwa.

src_text: Ha se amohetswe, Bili tla fetola Molao wa jwale wa Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo Kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang wa 2004 (Molao wa 33 wa 2004).
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yalusekela loLuhlelo Lolusha Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwemadolobha yaphindze futsi yalufezekisa ngekusebentisa Luhlakamsebenti Loluhlangene Lwekutfutfukisa Tindzawo Tasemadolobheni (i-IUDF).

src_text: Bili ena fetile motjheng matla wa dipuisano le setjhaba kamora hore tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Motsheanong.
tgt_text: I-IUDF ihlose kuhola embili ekutfutfukiseni kwawonkhe wonkhe, kuhlaliswa kwebantfu edolobheni lokucinile nalokuphilekako.

src_text: Sepheo ka diphetoho ke ho tjhorisa metjha ya kwano ya ho lwantsha boferekanyi le ya lefatshe teng.
tgt_text: Lombiko wenchubekelembili wahlanganiswa ngekubonisana nemikhakha yahulumende yavelonkhe yetifundza kanye neyendzawo, kanye nema-NGO lafanele..  Lisubuciko Lelihlanganisiwe Lekutfutfukiswa KweLusha (i-IYDS).

src_text: Diphetoho di boetse tsa lokisa dikarolwana tseo ho neng hothwe ha di ikamahanye le molaotheo ke Lekgotla la Molaotheo..  Jwaloka setho sa Lekgotla la Tshireletseho la Matjhaba Kopaneng, Afrika Borwa tlameha ho sebedisa melao ya matjhaba naheng ena leng melao eo sepheo ka yona leng ho matlafatsa mehato ya ho lwantsha boferekanyi lefatsheng  Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kutsi kusetjentiswe i-IYDS.

src_text: Seboka sa bo-14 sa Brazil, Russia, India, China le Afrika Borwa (BRICS).
tgt_text: Lendlelalisu ibangela kubakhona kweNchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yelusha ya-2020-.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla etella pele Afrika Borwa Sebokeng sa mokgwa wa vidiyo sa bo-14 sa Baetapele ba dinaha tsa BRICS se tla tshwarwa ke People’s Republic of China ho tloha ka Labone la la 23 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 24 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Ichaza tento, imiklamo kanye netinhlelo lokumele tentiwe ngulabatsintsekako labehlukahlukene labavela etinhlanganisweni telusha.

Iphindze ibukane nekunciphisa kuphindzaphindza kwekungenelela kwahulumende futsi icondzise kutsi tinhlangano temmango kanye nemikhakha letimele tingabeseka njani bantfu labasha ekufinyeleleni ematfubeni.

src_text: Botho ba rona ba BRICS bo tswela pele ho tswela naha molemo.
tgt_text: Kugcogcwa kwalendlelalisu kubandzakanya imibono leyehlukene levela emikhakheni leyehlukahlukene yemmango.

src_text: Ngwahola thepa ya Afrika Borwa rometsweng dinaheng tse ding ballwang dipersenteng tse fetang tse 17 ile dinaheng tsa BRICS, mme dipersente tse fetang tse 29 tsa thepa tlileng kwano di ne di tswa dinaheng tseo.
tgt_text: Luhlaka LweMtsetfo Lohlongotwako lomayelana Nekongiwa Nekusetjentiswa Lokusimeme Kwetinhlobonhlobo Talokuphilako taseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Boleng ba kgwebisano ena ntse bo ntse bo hola, mme kgwebisano yohle ya Afrika Borwa le dinaha tse ding tsa BRICS ka 2021 ballwa dibiliyoneng tse R702, ha ka 2017 ne ballwa dibiliyoneng tse  .
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate luhlaka lweMtsetfo Lohlongotwako lomayelana Nekongiwa Nekusetjentiswa Lokusimeme Kwetinhlobonhlobo Talokuphilako taseNingizimu Afrika kuze ummango uphawule ngawo.

src_text: Tshebedisano hara dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa BRICS makaleng kang bophelo bo botle le kgwebisano ntlafetseng hodisitse diindasteri tsa naha ena, mme tswetse ditho tsohle tsa BRICS molemo.
tgt_text: Tinhlobonhlobo talokuphilako taseNingizimu Afrika tiniketa sisekelo lesibalulekile sekukhula nekutfutfukiswa kwemnotfo, futsi tibalulekile etimphilweni tebantfu.

src_text: Sepheo ka botsetedi ba rona diprojekeng tsa ntshetsopele ya meralo ya ditshebeletso le maiteko ho potlakisa metjha ya kgwebo ke ho eketsa thepa romelwang ho balekane ba rona ba BRICS..  Sekolo sa Mariha sa Tsamaiso ya Moruo.

Sekolo sa Naha sa Mmuso (NSG) se tla tshwara Lenaneo la sona la boraro la sekolo sa Mariha sa Tsamaiso ya Moruo bakeng sa Bahlanka ba Phethahatso, Johannesburg ho tloha ho la 27 Phuptjane ho ya ho la 1 Phupu.
tgt_text: Umtsetfo Lohlongotwako unika emandla tincomo letentiwe Yiphaneli Yabochwepheshe Belizinga Lelisetulu lelikhetfwe nga-2019 kuze kutsi libuyekete tinchubomgomo tetfu letikhona, imitsetfo kanye nemihambo etindzabeni letiphatselene neluhlobolunye lwalokuphilako..  Lombiko uncome kutsi kutfutfukiswe inchubomgomo lebanti ngekongiwa nekusetjentiswa ngendlela lesimeme kwetinhlobonhlobo tetintfo letiphilako telive.

src_text: Sebokeng ho tla tla Matona tswang Côte d'Ivoire; South Sudan le Afrika Borwa; le Balaodi-Kakaretso ba Lesotho, Zambia, Democratic Republic of Congo, Tanzania le Ghana.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo itosetjentiswa kuyo yonkhe imikhakha yahulumende.

src_text: Boramotse ba Afrika Borwa, mmoho le ditho tsa dikomiti tsa boramotse le makgotla phethahatso ba tla ba teng le bona..  Ho lebelletswe hore bahlanka bana ba phethahatso ba tswang dinaheng tse fapaneng ba abelane dikgopolo le dithuto ka maemo fapaneng ao ba kopanang le ona mosebetsing wa bona wa letsatsi le letsatsi..  NSG radile lenaneo la selemo le selemo bakeng sa ditho tsa phethahatso ka 2020 le karolo ya tshehetso ya yona boinehelong ba mmuso ba ho aha naha nang le bokgoni.
tgt_text: Konga kubalulekile emkhankhasweni welive wekukhulisa umnotfo masinyane kanye nekwakha ematfuba emisebenti.

src_text: Sepheo ka sekolo sena hara tse ding ke ho hlomella bahlanka ba phethahatso makaleng mararo mmuso ka boetapele bo ntlafetseng le bokgoni ba ho hlokomela le hore ba kgone ho lekola botjha diphephetso tsa tsamaiso tse sitisang ho kenyeletswa ha bohle le kgolo ya ho ya ho ile ya moruo..  Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Nelson Mandela.
tgt_text: Lisubuciko Lenyama Yetinyamatane.

src_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Nelson Mandela le ka Mantaha, 18 Phupu 2022, mme le tla ketekwa tlasa mookotaba: “Etsa seo se kgonang, ka seo nang le sona, moo leng teng”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kushicilelwa kweluhlaka Lisubuciko Lenyama Yetinyamatane kuze kutsi ummango uphawule ngalo.

src_text: Ke boipiletso bo matla bathong hore ba tshehetse le ho ba le seabo letsholong lena ka maiteko moshwelella nang le thuso ya nako telele..  Bo bong ba maiteko ao moshwelella ke Dipuisano tsa selemo le selemo tsa Batjha tsa ho tlotla Nelson Mandela le Lenaneo la Boetapele bo Kgabane bo tsepameng dintlheng tseo ho buuwang ka tsona haholo tse amanang le batjha Afrika Borwa le lefatsheng ka bophara..  Nako ya Lekgetho.
tgt_text: Indlelalisu icondze kwenta imboni yenyama yetinyamatane kutsi ibe semtsetfweni kanye nekuyintjintja.

src_text: Sehla sa 2022 sa ho kenya ditokomane tsa lekgetho se qala ka la 1 Phupu ho ya ho la 24 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Futsi icondze kufaka sandla ekutfolakaleni kwekudla ngendlela lesimeme.

src_text: Balefi ba lekgetho ba kgothaletswa ho kenya ditokomane tsa bona tsa lekgetho ka mokgwa wa eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) kapa ho MobiApp ya Tshebeletso ya Pokello ya Lekgetho ya Afrika Borwa (SARS)..  Monongwaha SARS tla nne sebedise tlhahisoleseding eo e bokellang ya motho ka mong, ho etsa tlaleho ya motho nang le dintlha tsohle tsa hae tsa ditjhelete, ho thusa ho bebofatsa motjha wa ho kenya ditokomane tsa lekgetho.
tgt_text: Imboni yenyama yetinyamatane ngalokuvamile iyimboni lengekho emtsetfweni lesebenta ngendlela letincetu letehlukene.

src_text: Ka 2021 SARS bokelletse tlhahisoleseding ya balefi ba lekgetho ba dimiliyone tse fetang tse tharo.
tgt_text: Lendlelalisu lehlongotwako iniketa luhlelo lwekusebenta lolutoba semtsetfweni futsi lucinise lomkhakha njengaloniketa kutfolakala kwekudla kanye nekukhulisa umkhakha wetemnotfo longasita ekudaleni ematfuba emisebenti  Imitsetfosivivinyo.

src_text: Ho kenngwa ha ditokomane ka nako le ka nepo ho netefatsa hore batho ba ikamahanye le melao ya lekgetho, le ho thusa mmuso ho isa ditshebeletso ho Maafrika Borwa di hlokang haholo  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Jikelele  Temdzabu wa-.

src_text: DithoholetsoKabinete thoholeditse le ho lebisa ditakaletso tse ntle ho bana: • Moahlodi Owen Lloyd Rogers kamora hore kgethelwe ho ba moahlodi wa Lekgotla la Molaotheo la Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kwetfulwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Jikelele Wetindzaba Tendzabuko wa-2022 ePhalamende kuze uchubeke ucutjungulwe.

src_text: • Kabinete le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba lakaleditse Mopresidente wa Mehleng Thabo Mbeki mahlohonolo Letsatsi la Tswalo ha qeta dilemo tse 80, leo le ketekileng ka la 18 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Letichibiyelo ticondze kubuyeketa uMtsetfo Webuholi Bendzabuko kanye neMtsetfo weBuholi be-Khoi-San, wa-2019 (Umtsetfo Nombolo-3 wa-2019), locale kusebenta mhla ti-1 kuMabasa.

src_text: Monghadi Mbeki lakaleditse Maafrika Borwa ohle bokamoso bo tjhabileng le bo nang le katleho  KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba so ka ba tlola molao.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tekuvikela Tikhungo Tentsandvo Yelinyenti Kumaphekulasikhuni Nemisebenti Lephatselene Naloko wanga-.

src_text: Balaodi ba Ikemetseng ba Boto ya Boladi ya Bofofisi Afrika Borwa  Monghadi Ernest Khosa  Mme Bulelwa Koyana  Monghadi Surendra Sooklal; led.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tekuvikela Tikhungo Tentsandvo Yelinyenti Kumaphekulasikhuni Nemisebenti Lephatselene Naloko wanga-2022 kutsi uchubeke nekucutjungulwa.

src_text: Mme Rejoice Edith Phewa.
tgt_text: Ungaze wemukelwe, loMtsetfosivivinyo utochibiyela uMtsetfosisekelo wanyalo WekuVikelwa kweNtsandvo Yelinyenti Lomelene Nebuphekulasikhuni Netento Letihlobene Naloko, wa-2004 (uMtsetfo Nombolo-33 wa-2004).

src_text: Ditho tsa Ofisi ya Diphatlalatso tsa Dilounu tsa ho reka Matlo le Phatlalatso ya Dikoloto tsa Matlo  Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Modulasetulo)  Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt  Monghadi Errol Vincent Magerman  Moadvokheiti Mandla Dludlu  Monghadi Matsobane Gabriel Mello  Mme Palesa Mawasha  Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton  Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga  Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo ungene enchubeni lebanti yekubonisana nemmango ngemuva kwekutsi sewugunyatwe yiKhabhinethi ngeNkhwekhweti.

src_text: Tsa Moraorao Mabapi le Kokwanahloko ya Khorona (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Takamuva mayelana neLigciwane leSifo seKhorona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete leboha batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa ba ileng ba kgetha ho enta le ho ikobela dipehelo tsohle tse mabapi le COVID-19 leng se entseng hore lenane la batho ba tshwaetsehang le se ke la phahama haholo leqhubung la bohlano la sewa sena naheng ena..     Leha ho le jwalo, re ntse re tlameha ho ba hlokolosi jwalo ka ha COVID-19 ntse so fele.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi income bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika labakhetsa kugoma kanye nekutfobela tonkhe tindlelanchubo te-COVID-19 lokwente kutsi lelive likhone kuvikela kukhula kwemanani lamasha ekwesuleleka ngesikhatsi sekucubuka kwesihlanu kwalolubhubhane..     Nanoma kunjalo, asikafaneli kukhibika ngoba phela i-COVID-19 isesekhona emkhatsini wetfu.

src_text: Leha mmuso sa tswa phumula molao qobellang batho ho apara dimonkwana setjhabeng, empa batho ba nang le mafu sa phekoleheng, le ba kulang, ba ntse ba tlameha ho tswela pele le ho di apara.
tgt_text: Nanoma-nje lelive lisandza kuvala kugcokwa kwetifonyo ngalokuphocelelekile etindzaweni temmango, bantfu labanetifo letibomahlalakhona kanye nalabo labagulako bakhutsatwa kutsi bachubeke nekugcoka tifonyo.

src_text: Re ntse re tlameha ho tswela pele le ho hlapa matsoho rona kgafetsa kapa ho hlwekisa ka sebolaya dikokwanahloko, ho iqaqolohanya le ba bang mmoho le ho ba sebakeng se kenang moya hantle..     Ente ntse le yona feela mokgwa nang le bopaki ba saense ba hore thibela COVID-19, mme Kabinete kgothaletsa batho bohle ba so kang ba enta ho etsa jwalo ka potlako le ba entileng ho fumana ente ya tlatsetso mahala ditsing tse haufi tsa ho entela..     Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Sifanele futsi sichubeke nekugeza noma-ke sigeze tandla tetfu ngesibulalamagciwane, siphindze futsi sitfobele umtsetfo wekukhweshelana nekungenisa umoya.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya behwa sehlohlolong sa ditaba tsa moraorao mabapi le Monkeypox le ho tshwaetsa ha yona naheng ena ho latela ho fumaneha ha motho wa bobedi ya nang le bohloko bona naheng ena.

Bakudi bana ka bobedi ba ipolokile ka bonngwe malapeng mme ho ntse ho tsongwa batho bao ba kileng ba kopana le bona, bao ho ka etsahalang hore ba bile kotsing ya ho tshwaetseha..     Ka bobedi Lefapha la Bophelo bo Botle le Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Mahloko Tshwaetsanang, ba sebedisana mmoho le Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle ho hlahloba kotsi ya tshwaetsano bohlokong bona naheng ena ba ipapisitse le dipehelo tsa Matjhaba tsa Bophelo bo Botle..     Kokwanahloko ya monkeypox ha tshwaetsane ha bonolo ntle le ha thetsane le motho ya nang le yona jwalo ka ho sunana, ho mo sika kapa ho thetsa dikarolo tsa mmele tse nang le yona.
tgt_text: Kugoma kuyachubeka nekuba yindlela yekutivikela  ku-COVID-19 lecinisekiswe ngekwesayensi futsi Ikhabhinethi ikhutsata bonkhe bantfu labangakagonywa kutsi bangacitsi sikhatsi bagome bese kutsi bantfu labagonyiwe bahambe bayotfola ticinisamgomo tabo etindzaweni tekugoma letidvute nabo..     Incubulunjwane yetingobiyane.

src_text: Batho ba se nang matshwao kokwanahloko ena ba ke ke ba tshwetsa ba bang..     Kabinete eletsa batho ba bang le matshwao feberu mokgohlane tlwaelehileng tsamaisanang le matjhatjhetsi kang lekgopho hore ba etele ditsi tsa bophelo bo botle ho ka fumana ho hlahlojwa le ho alafuwa sa le nako..     Koduwa ya Tameneng ya East London.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi yatisiwe ngetakamuva mayelana nekubhebhetseka kwesifo  Incubulunjwane yetingobiyane kulelive ngemuva kwekucinisekiswa kwesehlakalo sesibili kulelive.

src_text: Koduwa hlahileng Tameneng ya Enyobeni, East London mane Kapa Botjhabela, ka la 26 Phuptjane 2022, eo ho yona ho ileng ha hlokahala batjha ba 21 ile ya tshosa naha ka bophara.
tgt_text: Labantfu labatsintsekako basemakhaya abo bakhweshisiwe kulabanye futsi kwamanje kulandzelelwa labo lekungenteka kutsi besulelekile..     Litiko Letemphilo kanye neSikhungo Savelonkhe Setifo Letitsatselwanako basebentisana neNhlangano Yetemphilo Yemhlaba wonkhe kuhlola bungoti bekwesuleleka endzaweni ngekuhambisana neMitsetfomgomo Yetemphilo Yemave Emhlaba.

src_text: Re ipotsa hore be malapa bona ikutlwa jwang ka ho lahlehelwa ke bana ba ona koduweng kang eo..     Kabinete fetisetsa matshidiso yona ho malapa ohle lahlehetsweng ke beng ka bona mmoho le ho leboha bohle ba ileng ba bontsha moya wa botho ka ho tshehetsa malapa ao nakong eo ya tlokotsi..     Ke ntho ngongorehisang hore bana ba dilemong tsa bo 13 ba dumellwe ho kena dibakeng tseo ho nowang jwala ho tsona.
tgt_text: Ligciwane lencubulunjwane yetingobiyane alibhebhetseki kalula futsi ngalokuvamile livela kuphela ngemuva kwekusondzelana lokufana nekucabuzana, kugonana noma kutsintsa tincenye temtimba letinaleligciwane lencubulunjwane yetingobiyane.

src_text: Re ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore le sona se nke karolo ho netefatsa hore bana ba rona ba bolokehile ka dinako tsohle..     Bana ba dilemo tse ka tlase ho tse 18 ha ba dumellwa ho kena ditameneng, dishibining, dibakeng tseo ho nwellwang ho tsona le tse rekisang jwala.
tgt_text: Bantfu labete timphawu tencubulunjwane yetingobiyane abakwati kusabalalisa leligciwane kulabanye..     Ikhabhinethi yeluleke bantfu labanetimphawu temfiva (umkhuhlane), timphawu temkhuhlane lowetayelekile, lolandzela libhamuta sengatsi ucubukile kutsi babikele tikhungo tetemphilo letidvutane kute kutsi lesifo sitfolakale kusenesikhatsi nekutsi sisheshe selashwe..     Inhlekelele yaseMonti.

src_text: Ke tlolo ya molao ho batho bohle ba hwebang ka jwala ho se ikobele melao ena, mme hape ba tlameha le ho amohuwa dilaesense tsa bona tsa ho rekisa jwala..     Sephetho sa Kopano ya Baetapele ba Dinaha tse Supileng (G7).
tgt_text: Inhlekelele leyenteke eThaveni Enyobeni eMonti eMpumalanga Kapa ngeLisontfo, mhla tinge-26 ngeNhlaba 2022 leyendlule nemiphefumulo yelusha lenge-21, iphazamise live lakitsi lonkhe.

src_text: Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ile nka karolo Kopanong ya Baetapele ba G7 neng tshwaretswe Bavaria, Jeremane, ka Mantaha wa la 27 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Kumatima kucabanga lusizi lwemindeni leshonelwe bantfwana ngendlela lebuhlungu kangaka.

src_text: Mopresidente ne menngwe kopanong ena ke Moetapele wa naha eo ho neng ho tshwaretswe kopano ena ho yona leng Motjhanselara Olaf Scholz.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kudzabuka kwayo emindenini lelahlekelwe tihlobo tayo futsi ibonge wonkhe umuntfu ngekusekela kwabo imindeni leshonelwe ngalesikhatsi lesintima.

src_text: Kopanong ena, ho ne ho sekasekwa ditaba tse amang maemo lehodimo, motlakase, tsa bophelo bo botle, tlhahiso ya dijo boemong ba matjhaba le tekatekano ya bonng..     G7 ke tshebedisano ya mebuso le diforamo tsa dipolotiki dinaheng tse kang Khanada, Fora, Jeremane, Ithali, Japane, United Kingdom le Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Amerika     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Kuyintfo lekhatsatana kakhulu kutsi bantfwana labancane labaneminyaka le-13 budzala bavunyelwe kungena endzaweni baphindze futsi banatse tjwala.

src_text: Moralo wa Tshebetso wa Lekala la tsa Molao (LSC).
tgt_text: Sicela imimango kutsi idlale indzima yayo ekugcineni bantfwabetfu baphephile ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi..     Bantfwana labaneminyaka lengaphasi kwe-18 abakavunyelwa kungena emathaveni, emashibhini, emaphabhu nasetitolo tetjwala.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa LSC bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Batsengisi betjwala labatfolakala bephula noma yimiphi yalemitsetfo kumele babekwe emacala baphindze futsi bemukwe netincwadzi tabo tekusebenta.

src_text: Maikemisetso dipehelo tsena ke ho potlakisetsa ho etswa ha diphetolo lekaleng lena ho etsa hore kemedi ho lona be nepahetseng ho ya ka maemo setjhaba ka ho fapana.

Dipehelo tsena di tla thusa ho theha mokgatlo tla netefatsa hore lekala lena le ba le batho ba rupeletsweng ka botlalo ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa molao..     Ho ngolwa ha moralo ona wa LSC ho ne ho okametswe ke Mokgatlo wa Basebeletsi ba Molao leng mokgatlo thehilweng ho latela Karolo ya 4 ya molao wa Legal Practice Act, 2014 (Molao wa bo 28 wa 2014) ka tlasa tataiso ya Leano la molao wa Tshehetso ya ba Batsho Moruong (B-BBEE) wa 2013 (Molao wa bo 46 wa 2013).
tgt_text: Imiphumela Yengcungcutsela yeLicembu Lemave Lasikhombisa (i-G7).

src_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 neha Letona la Dikgwebo le Ditlhodisano matla ho etsa dipehelo mabapi le tshebetso nepahetseng ho tsa tshehetso ya ba batsho moruong makaleng itseng.
tgt_text: Mengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela kuNgcungcutsela yeBaholi be-G7 lebeyibanjelwe eBavaria, eJalimane ngeMsombuluko, mhla tinge-27 ngeNhlaba.

src_text: Ha jwale, ba ditshebeletso tsa molao ha ba na dipehelo tseo ba sebeletsang hodima tsona ho tobana le mathata ho se lekalekane lekaleng lena la tsa molao..     Moralo ona wa LSC tla phatlalatswa Bukeng ya Diphatlalatso tsa Mmuso matsatsi 60 hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka ona..     Tlaleho ya Tshebetso ya Habedi ka Selemo.
tgt_text: Mengameli – lowahlanganyela etingcocweni tekusebenta lapho khona  bekudzingidvwa tesimo selitulu, emandla agezi, temphilo, kutfolakala kwekudla emhlabeni wonkhe kanye netindzaba tekulingana ngekwebulili – bekamenye ngumngenisi (sokhaya), Shansela Olaf Scholz..     I-G7 iyinkhundla yetepolitiki lefaka ekhatsi iCanada, iFrance, iGermany, i-Italy, iJapan, ne-United Kingdom kanye ne-United States     Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlaleho ya tshebetso tswang habedi ka selemo ya ho tloha ka Mphalane 2021 ho isa ho Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: Luhlaka Lwemitsetfotimiso Yemkhakha Wetemtsetfo (Luhlaka Lwe-LSC).

src_text: Ditlaleho tsena ke karolo ya Leano la Meralo ya Nako ya Bohareng (MTSF) ho tloha ka selemo sa 2019 ho isa ho sa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweLuhlaka Lwe-LSC kute kutsi sive siphawule ngalo.

src_text: Leano lena la MTSF 2019-2024, ke moralo wa tshebetso oo ka ona ho boetseng ho ikemiseditsweng ho fihlela Leano la Naha la Ntshetsopele: Leano la Tjhebelo pele la selemo sa 2030 tla beng le nako ya puso ya botshelela..     Ditlaleho tsena di shebile haholo maikemisetso ao mmuso a behileng pele leng (1) Diphetoho moruong le thehong ya menyetla ya mesebetsi; (2) Tsa thuto, thupello, le tsa bophelo bo botle; (3) Leano la tshehetso ya setjhaba ka ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa boleng ka tsela otlolohileng; (4) Tsa bodulo ba setjhaba le tsa bommasepala; (5) Tshebedisano ya setjhaba mmoho le polokeho ya sona; (6) Theho ya mmuso nang le bokgoni le puso nang le toka; le (7) Ho theha maemo betere Afrika le matjhabeng mmoho le ho kenella ha puso ya botshelela..     Kabinete amohetse kgatelo pele dikarolong tse neng di hlwahilwe nakong ena ya ho lekola botjha.
tgt_text: Tinjongo talemitsetfotimiso kuchuba tingucuko temkhakha wetemtsetfo kute kutsi kube nekumelelwa ngekuya kwetinhlobonhlobo tebantfu balelive.

src_text: Kabinete boetse elelletswe le dikarolo tseo ho sa ntsa neng ho hlokahala ho kenellwa ho tsona ka lebaka la tieho bileng teng ka lebaka la sewa sa COVID-.
tgt_text: Lemitsetfotimiso itawuphindze futsi icinisekise kwakhiwa kwemtimba lotawukhicita batfulitinsita betemtsetfo labaceceshwe ngalokufanele nalabawatiko umsebenti wabo.

Kwakhiwa kwaloLuhlaka Lwe-LSC bekwenganyelwe nguMkhandlu Webasebenti Betemtsetfo, umtimba wetemtsetfo lowasungulwa ngekwemibandzela yeSigaba se-4 seMtsetfo Wekusebenta Kwetemtsetfo, 2014 (Umtsetfo we-28 wanga-2014) futsi bowukhonjwindlela nguMtsetfo Wekuhlomisa Ngemandla Emnotfo Umkhakha Lobanti Webantfu Labamnyama (i-B-BBEE), 2013 (Umtsetfo 46 wanga-2013).

src_text: Matona tla tshwara diboka tsa boraditaba dibekeng tse mmalwa tse tlang ho hlalosa ha batsi ka ditlaleho tsa ona le ho hlalosa dikarolong tseo ho hlokahalang hore ho sebetswe ka thatanyana ho tsona     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Umtsetfo we-B-BBEE wanga-2013 unika Indvuna yeTekuhwebelana, Timboni Nemncintiswano kutsi ikhiphe imitsetfotimiso yekusebenta ngalokufanele  kutekuhlonyiswa kwalabamnyama ngemnotfo emikhakheni-ngco letsite.

src_text: Seboka sa Boradiindasteri ba Batsho le Barekisi Dinaheng tsa Matjhaba (BIEC).
tgt_text: Emalunga etebungcweti betemtsetfo kwamanje ete umtsetfosimiso wemkhakha lobakhombindlela ekulungiseni kungalingani nekungasimami lokukhona kutebungcweti betemtsetfo.

src_text: Seboka sa pele sa BIEC se tla tshwarelwa Sandton International Convention Centre, Lejweleputswa ka Laboraro la la 20 Phupu.
tgt_text: Luhlaka Lwe-LSC lutawushicilelwa kuGazethi yahulumende emalanga lange-60 kute kutsi sive sitfole sikhatsi sekuphawula..     Imibiko yenchubekelembili yekusebenta leyetfulwa kabili ngemnyaka.
Ikhabhinethi iyivumile imibiko yenchubekelembili yekusebenta leyetfulwa kabili yangeMphala 2021 kuya kuNdlovulenkhulu.

src_text: Seboka sena se tla ka mora tlhomamiso ya Marangrang Thekiso Matjhabeng ke mmuso bakeng sa Boradiindasteri ba Batsho ka maikemisetso ho ba thusa ho kena mmarakeng meng, le ho fumana ditsela tsa ho fumana ditshehetso tsa ditjhelete le mekgwa ya ho bapatsa     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Lemibiko yenta incenye yeLuhlakamsebenti Lwelisubuciko Lwethemu Lesemkhatsini (lwe-MTSF) 2019-.

src_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Sehlopha sa Springboks, ka tlholo ya sona papading ya sona le naha ya Wales papading ya sona ya pele ya tse tharo tsa diteko Lebaleng la Loftus Versveld, Tshwane, ka Moqebelo wa la 2 Phupu.
tgt_text: Le-MTSF 2019-2024 luhlelo lwekuphumelelisa kanye neluhlakamsebenti lwekulandzelela lwekuzuza Luhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Lwavelonkhe: Bomabekwembili beMbononchanti 2030 belulawulo lwahulumende lwesitfupha.

src_text: Banyana Banyana, ka tlholo ya bona ya 2-1 ka Montaha wa la 4 Phupu 2022 kgahlano le naha ya Nigeria papading ya bona ya pele Tonamenteng ya Basadi ya Dinaha tsa Afrika tshwaretsweng naheng ya Morokho     Khiro    Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.
tgt_text: Lemibiko igcile kubomabekwembili bahulumende labasikhombisa, lekungulaba (1) Kugucula temnotfo nekwakha imisebenti; (2) Temfundvo, emakhono netemphilo; (3) Kuhlanganiswa kwemholombasha wetenhlalo ngekusebentisa tinsita letetsembekile naletisezingeni lelingulonalona; (4) Kuhlanganiswa kwendzawo, kuhlaliswa kwebantfu nahulumende wasekhaya; (5) Lubumbano lwetenhlalo nemimango lephephile; (6) umbuso lokhonako, lonesimilo nalotfutfukisako; kanye (7) ne-Afrika lencono kanye nemhlaba, kanye netingenelelo letiphatselene naloko telulawulo lwesitfupha..     Ikhabhinethi itemukele tindzawo letisadzinga inchubekelembili kulemigomo lencunyiwe yesikhatsi lesibuyeketwako.

src_text: Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana kgethetswe ho ba Modulasetulo wa Komeshene ya Naha ya Diloto..     Moatevokate Rory Voller kgethetswe ho ba Mokomeshenara wa Komeshene ya Ngodiso ya Dikhamphani le Dihlahiswa tsa Mahlale.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yabona tindzawo letidzinga lungenelelo kute kutsi kulungiswe kubambeleleka, leto letatfola umtselela lomubi impela wekubakhona kwelubhubhane i-COVID-.

src_text: Motlase.
tgt_text: Temandla.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse taba ya ho kenella ha mmuso mathateng motlakase naheng ena.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokungenelela lokwentiwe nguhulumende lokutawubukana nalenhlekelele yagezi walelive.

src_text: Mehato ena betla tsela yang boitekong ba ho fedisa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase ka maikemisetso ho baballa, ho fetolwa ha lekala la motlakase le ho ba le tharollo ya nako telele tabeng ya motlakase..   Ho kenya letsoho ho fokotseng mathata phepelo ya motlakase naheng ena, re tlameha ho fokotsa tshebediso ya ona ka megawatts tse 600 naheng ka bophara dikgweding tsena tse tharo tse tlang..   Malapa le ona ka nka karolo ho fokotseng hona ha tshebediso ya motlakase ka ho tima mabone sa hlokahaleng le disebediswa tse jang motlakase haholo nakong ya tshebediso phahameng ya motlakase.
tgt_text: Letinyatselo letibanti titawuvula indlela letawucedza loluhlelo lwekucishwa kwagezi ngenhloso yekuwonga, titawugucula lomkhakha wetegezi futsi titawenta kutsi kuphumelele loluhlelo lwesikhatsi lesidze lwekutfolakala kwagezi.

src_text: Dikgwebo le tsona tlhahisong ya tsona di kgothaletswa ho sebedisa thekenoloji ya sejwale jwale ho leka ho fokotsa tshebediso matla ya motlakase..   Letsholo la Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Kute sisekele legridi yagezi nekusita live lakitsi kulokucindzeteleka kwekuphakela kwagezi, kufuneka sinciphise kusebentisa gezi wesive sakitsi ngema-megawatts la-600 kuletinyanga letitako letintsatfu.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelopele seng fihletswe tlasa Letsholo la Vulindlela ho leka ho fokotsa tshubuhlellano neng le teng lekaleng la motlakase, la tsa kgokahano, la metsi ha mmoho le la bohahlaudi ka maikemisetso ho aha moruo botjha..   Ho se ho tsoseleditswe botjha meralo ya motheo robong ho 26 mme 11 le yona bontsha kgatelopele.
tgt_text: Imindeni nayo ingadlala yayo indzima yekonga gezi ngekucisha onkhe emalambu langakabaluleki kanye netintfo tagezi letisebentisa gezi lomnengi ngetikhatsi gezi lasetjentiswa kakhulu ngato.

src_text: Hara dikatleho tse seng di fihletswe re ka bala le ho nyollwa ha tekanyetso ya tlhahiso ya motlakase ke bahlahisi ba ikemetseng, ntlafatso ya Taolo ya Naha ya Boemakepe ba ha Transnet, ho lekolwa botjha ha letoto la mesebetsi bohlokwahadi, ho sebediswa ha mokgwa wa inthanete wa ho kenya kopo tsa Visa dinaheng tse 14, ho kenyeletsa le dibaka tse ntjha tse kgolo tsa bohahlaudi tse kang Tjhaena, Indiya, Kenya le Nigeria..   Ditlhekefetso tsa Bonng le ho Bolawa ha Basadi (GBVF).
tgt_text: Emabhizinisi ayagcugcutelwa kutsi alandzelele bucwepheshe lobunendlela lekahle kakhulu yekukhicita gezi nekutsi afake sandla kumitamo yekunciphisa kusetjentiswa kakhulu kwagezi.

src_text: Kabinete halefisitswe ke ketso soto ya ho betwa ha basadi ba robedi mane Krugersdorp, Gauteng.
Ketso tsena tse sehloho ha mmoho le ho hlekefetswa ha basadi di kgella fatshe mosebetsi wa setjhaba.
tgt_text: I-Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Kabinete boetse thoholetsa Sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa ka ho potlaka ho tshwara babelaellwa diketsong tsena tsa bonokwane..   Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba ho sebedisana le mekgatlo qobellang molao ka ho fana ka lesedi kapa hona ho tlaleha diketso tse belaetsang.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela loko losekwentiwe ngaphasi kwaloluhlelo lwe-Operation Vulindlela lekucedza kusalela emuva kwemsebenti kulemikhakha yetegezi, yetekuchumana, neyetemanti netekuvakasha kute kuvuselelwe umnotfo..   Tiyimfica kuleti-26 tindlela tekuvuselela umnotfo lekuphunyelelwe kuto, leti-11 tikhomba inchubekela embili lenhle.

src_text: Ha re sebedisana re ka fetola setjhaba sa rona ho ba dibaka tse bolokehileng bakeng sa bana le basadi..   Moafrika Borwa mong le mong na le boikarabelo ba ho lwantsha diketso tsa dikgoka ka tsela tse molaong ka tlaleha diketso tsohle tsa GBVF sepoleseng se haufi kapa letsetse Nomoro ya Mahala ya ho Tlaleha Ditlolo tsa Molao: 08600 10111, kapa ya Naha ya ho Tlaleha Diketso tsa GBVF: 0800 428 428 kapa ya ho Tlaleha Diketso Tlhekefetso ya Bonng: 0800 150. .
tgt_text: Leti lekuphunyelelwe kuto tifaka ekhatsi kukhulisa umkhawulo lobekiwe wekukhishwa kwemalayisensi ekukhicita gezi, kugucula nekuhlela kabusha Luphiko Lwavelonkhe Lwemacweba aka-Transnet, kukhishwa kweluhlu lolusha lwemakhono labucayi  nekusebentisa luhlelo lwe-e-Visa emaveni la-14, lafaka ekhatsi timakethe letinsha tetekuvakasha letifana neChina, i-India, iKenya neNigeria.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.

Kgwedi ena ya Basadi Ketekwa selemo le selemo ho hlompha basadi bohle ba ileng ba lwanela tokoloho ya naha ena le basadi bohle setjhabeng sa rona..   Selemong sena Kgwedi ena ya Basadi ketekilwe tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Tshehetso le Ditokelo tsa Basadi Moruong le Setjhabeng: Kaho Botjha bakeng sa Ntlafatso le Matlafalo ya Basadi.”.
tgt_text: Budlova lobubhekiswe Kubulili lobutsite Nekubulawa kwalabasikati (i-GBVF).

src_text: Basadi ba fetang 20 000 ba ileng ba hwantela Union Buildings, Tshwane ka la 9 Phato 1956, ba ne ba netefatse hore tekatekano ya bonng ba ya bohlokwa ho demokrasi ya Afrika Borwa..   Sebete sa bona se ile sa kgothatsa basadi ka kakaretso ho bapala karolo ya bona Palamenteng, mmusong le setjhabeng, mme re tswelapele le moralo ona ho tloha re fumane tokoloho ka.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kukhatsateka kakhulu ngalokudlengulwa lokusandza kwenteka kulabasikati eKrugersdorp, eGauteng.
Letento letimbi nekuhlukunyetwa kwalabasikati tibukela phasi indlela lesiphilisana ngayo.

src_text: Sehopotso sa Marikana.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yancoma kakhulu Tembutfo Wetemisebenti Yetemaphoyisa AseNingizimu Afrika ngalokushesha abophe linani lelitsite lebasolwa labatsintsekako kulelicala lelisabekako.

src_text: Ka Labobedi la la 16 Phato 2022, mmuso le setjhaba ba ile ba kopana mmoho ho hopola koduwa neng etsahale Marikana, Leboya Bophirima ka.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi icela imimango kutsi isebentisane nema-ejensi etemtsetfo ngekutsi yabelane nganoma ngiluphi lwatiso noma ngekubika imikhuba lesolekekayo.

src_text: Bohloko ba basebetsi bao, ba malapa bona esitana le setjhaba ka kakaretso bo tla dula bo hopoleha nalaneng ya rona..   Ho thehilwe Lenaneo la Ntlafatso ya Marikana ho tlisa maemo tla dumella ho ntlafatswa ha maphelo setjhaba sa Marikana.
tgt_text: Ngekusebentisana, singenta kutsi imimango yakitsi ibe ngulephephile ebantfwaneni nakulabasikati..   Wonkhe umuntfu waseNingizimu Afrika unemsebenti wekulwa nalabo lababhebhetselisa budlova ngendlela lelandzela umtsetfo.

src_text: Ngwahola mmuso lefile tjhelete ya ditlhapiso kalo ka dimilione tse R176 ho malapa mahlatsipa mme nyewe ntseng tswelapele lekgotleng la dinyelwe yona tlameha ho fela pele ho mafelo Phato.
tgt_text: Bika ngato tonkhe tigameko letimayelana ne-GBVF esiteshini semaphoyisa sangakini noma ushayele lenombolo yamahhala Yekulwa Nebugebengu letsi: 0860 01 0111, kuSikhungo Savelonkhe Semiyalo nge-GBVF letsi: 0800 428 428 noma Inombolo Yekulwa Nebudlova Betebulili letsi: 0800 150. .
Inyanga Yabomake.

src_text: Ho na le matlo ntlafaditsweng le ahilweng botjha bakeng sa bahlolohadi ba marikana mme tse ding di tla qetelwa selemong sena.
tgt_text: Ingci yinyanga yemnyaka yabomake lapho khona kubungatwa bomake labadlala indzima kulomzabalazo wenkhululeko kanye nabo bonkhe bomake emangweni.

src_text: Ho na le projeke ya kaho ya matlo ya dimilione tse R700 tla etsa hore basebetsi ba merafong ba dule matlong maemong matle.
tgt_text: Inyanga Yabomake yalomnyaka itawubungatwa ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Emalungelo Abomake Kutenhlalo Netemnotfo Nekutfutfukiswa Kwabo: Kuphindza Sakhe Kancono Kute Sitfutfukise Bomake Bakhone Kumelane Nebumatima”.

src_text: Ho teng mehato seng nkilwe ho ntlafatsa maphelo batho ba sebetsang merafong.
Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Gauteng ya Lenaneo la Ntlafatso ya Ditereke (DDM).
tgt_text: Labomake labangetulu kwe-20 000 labamashela e-Union Buildings ePitori mhla ti-9 ngemnyaka we-1956 bafaka sandla ekucinisekiseni kutsi kulingana ngekwebulili nekutfutfukiswa kwabo kutawuhlala kuyintfo lemcoka lecaliswa embili kuNingizimu Afrika Yentsandvoyelinyenti.

src_text: Ka Labohlano la la 12 Phato 2022, Masepala wa Setereke wa Sedibeng mane Gauteng ne tshwere Imbizo ya bone neng eteletswe ke tse tharo tse neng di tshwaretse Leboya Bophirima, Foreisitata le Mpumalanga..   Tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Ho se be le ya salang”, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele kemedi ho tswa mmusong wa naha, wa profensi esitana le wa bommasepala.
tgt_text: Letento tabo tekungasabi tagcugcutela bomake jikelele kutsi batsatse indzawo yabo lefanelekile ePhalamende, kuhulumende kanye nakutinhlangano temmango, futsi sisachubeka njalo nekwakha kuloku losekwentiwe kusukela kwatfolakala inkhululeko ngemnyaka we-.

src_text: Ho ile ha etswa kgoeletso ho Maafrika Borwa ka ho fapana hore tshwarane ho lwantshana le bofuma hammoho le masisapelo bakwang ke maemo mabe moruo..   Setereke sa Sedibeng se se se hatetse pele Lenaneo la Ntlafatso ya Moruo la Noka ya Lekwa (SEZ) le nang le kgonahalo ya tsoseletso ya moruo wa sedika seo, profensi eo esitana le naha ka bophara.

Lenaneo lena la Noka ya Lekwa le ikemiseditse ho kenyeletsa makala latelang bohlokwa: Sitsi se Setjha sa Thekenoloji sa Noka ya Lekwa; Thekenoloji ya Tlhahiso ya Motlakase wa Metsi; thekiso ya dihlahiswa tsa matekwane; tsamaiso ya dihlahiswa tsa tsa temo; kaho ya boemafofane ba difofane tse kgolo le tse nyane; tsamaiso ya thepa ka difofane le ntlafatso ya tlhahiso ya tshepe..   Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Lekala la Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Sikhumbuto SaseMarikana.

src_text: Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Lekala la Setjhaba se ne se tshwaretswe Ekurhuleni mane Gauteng ka la 4 le la 5 Phato 2022 mme lepetjo la teng le ne le re “Tshehetso ya Tshebedisano ya Setjhaba ho Thusa Setjhaba ho Nka Karolo Moruong le Tabeng tsa Setjhaba.” Seboka sena se ile sa kopanya batho ho tswa makaleng fapaneng ho tla sebetsa mmoho le mmuso ho tobana le mathata setjhaba ha mmoho le moruo, esitana le ho sebedisa dihlahiswa tsohle tse teng molemong wa setjhaba..   Seboka sena se nkilwe le seboka sa ditlaleho ho tswa diprofensing kaofela mathateng ao di nang le ona ho kenyeletsa tshehetso ya ditjhelete, mathata mabapi le taolo, ntlafatso ya lekala lena la setjhaba ka maikemisetso ho sebedisana le setjhaba ho ka rarolla mathata kang bofuma, ho se lekalekane ha mmoho le leqeme la mesebetsi..   Kabinete etsa kgoeletso ho mekgatlo ya setjhaba ho nka karolo ka maikemisetso ho aha bokamoso bo betere ho latela Morero wa Ntshetsopele ya Naha: la Tjhebelopele ya   Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: NgaLesibili, mhla ti-16 Ingci 2022, hulumende uhlanganyele naso sonkhe sive sakitsi kukhumbula ingoti leyenteka eMarikana eNyakatfo Nshonalanga ngemnyaka we-.

src_text: Moralo wa Diindasteri tsa Setso le Bonono.
tgt_text: Buhlungu lebaviwa basebenti, imindeni yabo kanye naso sonkhe sive sakitsi butawuhlala bugcilile emlandvweni wetfu.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Diindasteri tsa Setso le Bonono.
tgt_text: Loluhlelo Lwekuvuselela iMarikana lusetjentisiwe ekwakheni kabusha nasekusunguleni simondzawo lesivumako kutsi kutfutfukiswe timphilo temmango waseMarikana.

src_text: Moralo ona tobane haholoholo le taba ya tlhahiso ya bonono ba ditshwantsho; mesebetsi ya matsoho le ho rala; ditshwantsho le mmino; mesebetsi ya meralo le bonono; dipapadi le menyanyako, ho kenyeletsa mmino, diphatlalatso le kgatiso..   Moralo ona tla kenella makaleng ana ho thusa ho tlisa diphetoho lekaleng la bonono hore le kgone ho tsebisahala boemong ba matjhaba.
tgt_text: Lomnyaka lowengcile hulumende ubhadale imali lesincepheteliso letigidzi leti-R176 kuncephetelisa imindeni yalabo labatsintseka kantsi emacala lasilele lasenkantolo kulindzeleke kutsi aphotfulwe ngasekupheleni kwenyanga yeNgci.

src_text: Sena se tla etsa hore lekala lena le kgone ho sebetsa kwano le matjhabeng.

tgt_text: Kunetindlu letinengi letivuselelwe naletisha letakhiwe taniketwa kubafelokati baseMarikana kantsi letinye titawuphotfulwa kulomnyaka.

src_text: Tokomane Lekotsweng Botjha ya Kadimo ya Ditjhelete tsa Tshohanyetso ke Bommasepala.
tgt_text: Kunemklamo wetindlu wetigidzi leti-R700 lotawenta kutsi basebenti basetimayini babonelelwe ngetindlu letisezingeni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwane dintlafatso tse entsweng Tokomaneng ya Kadimo ya Ditjhelete tsa Tshohanyetso ke Bommasepala.
tgt_text: Sakhiwonchanti lesimcoka setenhlalo siyaphakelwa kute kutfutfukiswe simo imimango yasetimayini lephila kuso..   Imbizo YaMengameli YaseGauteng Lemayelana Neluhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Tigodzi (i-DDM).

src_text: Dintlafatso tsena di entswe karolong ya dikadimo feela.
tgt_text: Kulandzela lemphumelelo lebe khona yaletiMbizo TaMengameli letintsatfu te-DDM letenteke eNyakatfo Nshonalanga, eFree State naseMpumalanga ngekwehlukahlukana, Masipala Wesigodzi SaseSedibeng eGauteng ubambe imbizo yesine ngaLesihlanu, mhla ti-12 Ingci.

src_text: Tse ding tsa dintlafatso ke tsa ho lelefatsa nako ya lefa tjhelete ya kadimo ho tsamaisana le boleng ba thepa rekilweng.

Dintlafatso tsena di boetse di hlakisa karolo ya dibanka tsa thuso ya ditjhelete ho kadimeng bommasepala ditjhelete..   Karolo ya bo 230 ya Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa 1996 dumella bommasepala ho kadima ditjhelete bakeng sa ho reka thepa kapa ho lefa dikoloto.
tgt_text: Ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Ungashiyi muntfu emuva”, Mengameli Cyril Ramaphosa bekahola licembu lakhe letikhulu tahulumende letisetulu letibuya kuhulumende wavelonkhe, wesifundza newendzawo.

src_text: Tokomane ya pele ne tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka selemo sa 2000 le ho tataisa Kgaolo ya bo 6 le ya bo 13 ya Molao wa Kadimo ya Ditjhelete ke Bommasepala wa 2003, (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).
tgt_text: Bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika ngekwehlukahlukana kwabo nangekwemikhakha yabo bahlanganiswa kute basebentisane balwe nekukhula kwemazinga ebuphuya nekuswela kakhulu lokubangwa ngulenseyeya yesimo setemnotfo.

src_text: Dintlafatso tsena di tlisa merokotso itseng ho dikhamphane tse kadimang bommasepala tjhelete, empa sa kgeloha maikemisetsong tokomane ena sethatho leng dikadimo.
