tgt_text: Sigodzi sase-Sedibeng sichubekile ekwenteni kutsi isebente i-Vaal River Special Economic Zone (i-SEZ), lenemandla ekwenta kutsi kwakhiwe kabusha timboni kulendzawo, kulesifundza nakulelive.

src_text: Ho Phatlalatswa Pele ho Nako ha Tokomane ya Dipalopalo tsa Ditlolo tsa Molao tsa Kotara tsa Selemo sa Ditjhelete sa 2022/.
tgt_text: Le-Vaal River SEZ ihlele kutsi kube nalemikhakha lemcoka lelandzelako: Indzawo yesimanje lelidolobhakati lenato tonkhe tinsita tekuhlalisa bantfu (i-Smart City) lebitwa ngekutsi yi-Vaal River Smart City; ihabhu yekusungula ihayidrojini lehlantekile, ihabhu yemikhicito yensango; luhlelo lwekuhanjiswa kwemikhicito yetekulima; lidolobhakati lelitawuba nesikhumulo setindiza; sikhumulo setindiza lesincane; tekutfutswa kwemphahla ngetindiza kanye nekuvuselela umkhakha wekuchicita insimbi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tshisinyo ya ho phatlalatswa pele ho nako ha tokomane ya dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara tsa selemo sa ditjhelete sa 2022/.
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara tse sa tswa phatlalatswa.
tgt_text: Umhlangano waMengameli Wemkhakha Wetenhlalo.

src_text: Sena se etseditswe ho fetola nako ya ho phatlalatswa ha dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa naha..   Dinako tse sisintsweng tsa phatlalatso ya dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara ke Phato 2022 bakeng sa kotara ya pele le Pudungwana 2022 bakeng sa kotara ya bobedi.
tgt_text: Umhlangano waMengameli wemkhakha wetenhlalo bewubanjwe Ekurhuleni, eGauteng kusuka mhla ti-4 kuya kumhla ti-5 Ingci 2022 ngaphasi kwesihloko lesitsi: “Kukhutsata Kubumbana Esiveni Kute Imimango Ihlanganyele Kutemnotfo Nakutenhlalo”, wahlanganisa balingani labavela emimangweni lehlukahlukene kute basebente nahulumende kubukana netinseyeya tetemnotfo netenhlalo nekuta netindlela tekutfola tinsita letitawusetjentiswa tinhlangano temmango, kulokunye kwaletinhloso.

src_text: Tsa kotara ya boraro le ya bone tsona di tla phatlalatswa ka ho latellana ka Hlakola le Motshehanong.
tgt_text: Lomhlangano ubuke imibiko yekucocisana levela kuletifundza letiyimfica lemayelana netinseyeya tato, lebetifaka ekhatsi indlela yekutfola imali, tindzaba tekulawula, kugucula umkhakha wetetimali kute ukhutsate budlelwane emkhatsini kwetinhlangano temmango nahulumende kute ukhone kubukana netinseyeya letimayelana nebuphuya, kungalingani nekuswelakala kwemisebenti.

IKhabhinethi icele tinhlangano temmango netakhamuti kutsi tidlale indzima yato kucinisekisa kutsi sakha likusasa lelincono, njengoba kucatjangwa kuLuhlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwentfutfuko: Umbono Wemnyaka We-    Tincumo teKhabhinethi.

src_text: Ho Fediswa ha Maemo Koduwa Naheng.
tgt_text: Luhlelo Lolukhulu Lwetemasiko Nelwebuciko.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho fediswa ha Maemo Koduwa Naheng ho latela dikgohola tse neng di le Kapa Botjhabela le KwaZulu-Natal..   Maemo ana fedisitswe ka la 18 Phato ho latela ho eketswa ha nako ya teng ka la 18 Phupu.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumelene kutsi Loluhlelo Lolukhulu Lwetemasiko Nelwebuciko lusetjentiswe.

src_text: Ho eketswa hona ha nako ne le ho fana ha nako ho makala mmuso neng shebane le tshenyo neng bakilwe ke maemo lehodimo diprofensing tsena tse amehileng..   Kabinete dumellane hore maemo renang ha jwale ha sa hloka mehato matlafetseng jwalo ka ha makala mmuso ikemetseng le mekgatlo ya setjhaba di tla tswela pele ho fana ka thuso le kaho botjha   Tshisinyo tsa Melao.
tgt_text: Loluhlelo Lolukhulu lugcile kakhulu kutebuciko lobubonakalako, kumisebenti yetetandla neyekudizayina, yekubona nekulalela, neyekucocisana; yetemisebenti yekudizayina nekuticambela; yekulingisa nekubungata, lefaka ekhatsi umculo, kushicilela netemaphephandzaba.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa ho Ngodisa Ditsha wa Selemo sa.
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Ngodiso ya Ditsha wa Selemo sa 2020 ho tla sekasekwa ho ya pele.
tgt_text: Loluhlelo Lolukhulu lutawungenelela kulemikhakha kute kwakhiwe umkhakha lomusha webuciko lotawatiwa emhlabeni wonkhe futsi ube sezingeni laloko.

src_text: Kabinete ne tjhaele Tshisinyo ena monwana ka Phuptjane 2020 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..   Dintlafatso tse tshisinyong ena di tla thusa ho netefatsa taba ya ho ba le mobu ngotsweng Karolong ya bo 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Lutawusebenta kwenta kutsi imboni yebuciko yaseNingizimu Afrika ikhone kufinyelela kutimakethe tendzawo netemave emhlaba.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena fana ka dipalopalo ho ya ka merabe, bonng, bodudi le boahi ba naha ho batho ba nang le ditokelo tsa ho ba le mobu Afrika Borwa.

tgt_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lwemtsetfomgomo Lobuyeketiwe Wekuboleka Timali Kwabomasipala Newetimo Letiphutfumako Tetemali.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao Shebaneng le Mokgatlo wa Meralo ya Motheo ya Metsi wa Selemo sa 2022 (NWRIA).
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi itivumile letichibiyelo letikuLuhlakamsebenti Lwemtsetfomgomo Wekuboleka Timali Kwabomasipala Newetimo Letiphutfumako Tetimali lokhona nyalo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa NWRIA wa 2022 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba ho tla nka matsatsi   Tshisinyo ena ya molao ka yona ho ikemiseditswe ho tla le meralo, tshehetso ya ditjhelete le kaho ya meralo ya motheo ya metsi bakeng sa naha ena tla boele laola le taolo ya meralo ya motheo ya metsi teng ha jwale..   Mokgatlo ona tla netefatsa phepelo otlolohileng le tshepahetseng ya metsi ikamahantseng le Molaotheo wa naha.
tgt_text: Letichibiyelo tenteke kakhulu kulesigaba sekubolekwa saloluhlakamsebenti.

src_text: Mokgatlo ona tla thehwa le Lekala la Mmuso tlasa Shetjule ya bobedi ya Molao wa Tshebediso ya Ditjhelete tsa Setjhaba, wa 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Kulokunye kwaletichibiyelo letihlongotwako ngilokufaka kutsi kube nesikhatsi lesengetiwe sekuboleka kute sihambisane nesikhatsi sekusebenta kwalenye imphahla letsengwe ngalemali.

src_text: Mokgatlo ona tla etsa mosebetsi oo ha jwale etswang ke Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..   Tshisinyo ya Molao Dumellang Bommasepala ho Iketsetsa Lekgetho wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: Letichibiyelo tibuye futsi tichaze umsebenti wetikhungo tetimali tentfutfuko yalendzawo bomasipala lababolekela yona.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Dumellang Bommasepala ho Iketsetsa Lekgetho wa Selemo sa.
Tshisinyo ena etsa dintlafatso Molaong laolang Matla Bommasepala ho Iketsetsa Lekgetho wa Selemo sa 2007, (Molao wa bo 12 wa 2007).
tgt_text: Sigaba 230 Semtsetfosisekelo WaseNingizimu Afrika Semnyaka we-1996 sinika bomasipala emandla ekutsi baboleke imali yekwenta imiklamo yabo lemikhulu noma yekubukana netindleko tabo.

src_text: Dintlafatso tsena di tlo laola matla bommasepala ho lefisa lekgetho bakeng sa dintlafatso tsa mobu tse tliswang ho bona.
tgt_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lwekucala lavunywa yiKhabhinethi ngemnyaka we-2000 kute lukhombe indlela Sahluko se-6 nese-13 Semtsetfo Wetimali Tabomasipala, we-2003 (Umtsetfo wema-56 we-2003).

src_text: Dintlafatso tsena di tlo netefatsa hore bommasepala ba lefisa lekgetho ka nepo le ka tsela hlokang leeme.
tgt_text: Letichibiyelo letivunyiwe tihlose kukhutsata kutsi kwandze babolekisi betimali kuletimakethe tabomasipala kodvwa babe bachubeka kulandzela letimiso letingumgogodla letichaza ngekuboleka kwabomasipala.

src_text: Kabinete ne tjhaele Tshisinyo ena monwana ka 2020 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

tgt_text: Kukhishwa ngembi kwesikhatsi kwekhalenda yekushicilela lubalobalo lwemacala ekota yemnyakatimali we-2022/.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Ditaba tsa Ditjhelete wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi isivumile lesiphakamiso sekutsi kukhishwe ngembi kwesikhatsi ikhalenda yekushicilela lubalobalo lwemacala ekota yemnyakatimali we-2022/.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Ditaba tsa Ditjhelete wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kukhishwe lolubalobalo lwemacala ekota.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao ka yona ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa melao supileng leng (1) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Dikhamphane tsa Dipenshene, wa 1963 (Molao wa bo 41 wa 1963); (2) Molao Laolang Penshene ya Masole, wa 1976, (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao Laolang Penshene ya Basebeletsi ba Mmuso wa 1996; (4) Molao Laolang Komeshene Shebaneng le Lekgetho, wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 99 wa 1997; (5) Molao Laolang Banka ya tsa Temo le Mobu, wa 2002 (Molao wa bo 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Bahlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 26 wa 2005 le (7) Ntlafatso ya Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Bahlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete wa 2021 (Molao wa bo 5 wa 2021).
tgt_text: Loku kwentelwe kutsi kuguculwe kukhishwa kwelubalobalo lwemacala emnyaka aphambilini kulelive.

src_text: Ho Molao Laolang Dipenshene tsa Masole wa 1996 ho kenyeleditswe hore motho kenye molekane wa hae mme seo se nkuwa ka se etsahetse ho tloha ka la 27 Mmesa.

Dintlafatso molaong ona wa dipenshene tla thusa hore balekane ba masole ba kgone ho fumana karolo ya bona hang hang ha ba kgaola lenyalo..   Ho hong hape, dintlafatso tsena di tla hlakisa karolo ya Letona La Matlotlo mme lehlakoreng la mosebetsi wa ho hlahloba dibuka teng dintlafatso tsena di fetola hanyane matla komiti ya bahlahlobi ba dibuka ha ho etsahetse mohlahlobi wa dibuka fumanwa le molato.
tgt_text: Kuhlongotwa kutsi kukhishwa ngembi kwesikhatsi kwalekhalenda yelubalobalo lwemacala ekota yekucala kwenteke ngenyanga yeNgci 2022 bese lwemacala ekota yesibili lube ngenyanga yaLweti.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao ile ya phatlalatswa ka Hlakola 2022 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Lubalobalo lwemacala ekota yesitsatfu neyesine lutawukhishwa ngekwehlukana ngenyanga Yendlovana neyeNkwekhweti ngemnyaka we-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Akaretsang (Phapanyetsano seng molaong ya Ditjhelete le ho Thibela ho Tshehetsa Botshosetsi ka Ditjhelete) wa.
tgt_text: Kuphela kwesikhatsi Sesimo Senhlekelele Yavelonkhe (i-NSoD).

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Akaretsang (Phapanyetsano seng molaong ya Ditjhelete le ho Thibela ho Tshehetsa Botshosetsi ka Ditjhelete) wa 2022 ho ka sekasekwa ho ya pele.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi siphele lesikhatsi Sesimo Senhlekelele Yavelonkhe (i-NSoD) lesamemetelwa ngenca yaletikhukhula letinemandla letenteka eNyakatfo Kapa naKwaZulu-Natali..   Le-NSoD saphela mhla ti-18 Ingci 2022 emva kwekutsi kumenyetelwe mhla ti-18 Kholwane 2022 kutsi sikhatsi saso seluliwe.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao tlisa dintlafatso melaong latelang  Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Ditjhelete tsa Mautlwela, wa 2001 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Mekgatlo sa Etseng Phaello, wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao Laolang Thepa Laolwang ke Matlole, wa 1988 (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1988; (iv) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Dikhamphane, wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 2008) le  Molao Laolang Lekala la Ditjhelete, wa 2017 (Molao wa bo 9 wa 2017)..   Dintlafatso tsena di kgona ho rarolla mathata neng fumanwe ke Komiti Ikgethang neng Lekola Maemo Ditjhelete tsa Naha (FATF).
tgt_text: Lokwelulwa kwalesikhatsi kwentiwe ngenca yekubona kutsi kunesidzingo sekutsi kuchubeke kungetwe letindlela tesikhashana letitsetfwe tinhlaka tahulumende kute tingenelele futsi tibukane nalomtselela walesimo selitulu lesibi kakhulu kuletifundza letatsintseka.

src_text: Komiti ena ne etse dikgothaletso tse 40 tse tla thusa Afrika Borwa hore kgone ho sebetsa ka tsela ya matjhaba mabapi le ho lwantsha phapanyetsano seng molaong ya ditjhelete mmoho le tshehetso ya botshosetsi ka ditjhelete..   Ho ne ho fumanehe hore Afrika Borwa ne haella dikarolong tse.
Tshisinyo ena ya molao tla lokisa dikarolo tse 14 ho tsena tse badilweng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumelene kutsi lesimo lesikhona nyalo asisadzingi kutsi tindlela letingakatayeleki tichubeke njengoba tiphakelwa tinhlaka tahulumende, umkhakha lotimele kanye natinhlangano temmango kucinisekisa kutsi tiyachubeka kunika lusito, kululama nekwakha kabusha   Imitsetfosivivinywa.

src_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa FAFT ho tloha ka.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivnywa Wekuchibiyela Umtsetfo Wemnyaka we-2022 Wekubhaliswa Kwebunikati Bemhlaba.
Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile lokwetfula    ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Umtsetfo Wemnyaka we-2022 Wekubhaliswa Kwebunikati Bemhlaba kute ichubeke iwucubungule.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya Tsona seng Molaong wa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi yavuma ngenyanga yeNhlaba 2020 kutsi Lomtsetfosivivinywa uyotfola luvo lwemimango..   Lokuchibiyela lokuhlongotwako kutawenta kutsi kuphumelele lokubhalisa kwebunikati bemhlaba lobutfolakala ngalokusemtsetfweni kuSigaba 25(6) Semtsetfosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika wemnyaka we-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya tsona seng Molaong ya 2002 ho ka sekasekwa ho ya pele.
tgt_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa ubonelela kutsi kube nekugcogca lubalobalo ngekuya kwebuhlanga, kwebulili, kwebuve nangebusakhamuti balobo bunikati bemhlaba eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano seng Molaong ya tsona, wa 1992 (Molao wa bo 140 wa 1992) bolelang hore ke tlolo ya molao ho hlahisa dithethefatsi tse ngotsweng ho Shetjule ya Pele le ya Bobedi ya Molao ona..   Dintlafatso tsena di bolela ha Karolo ya bo 63 ya molao oo se molaong sa dumellane le molaotheo wa naha jwalo ka ha shetjule ya molao ona dumella Letona ho etsa diphetoho molaong ona ntle le ho latela tsela nepahetseng ya ketsa molao..    Ka 2020, Lekgotla la Molaotheo le ne le bolele ha Karolo ya bo 63 ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya Tsona seng Molaong wa 1992 mme lekgotla la neha Palamente ho fihlela ka la 17 Tshitwe 2022 ho lokisa phoso eo.
tgt_text: Lesibonelelo sitawenta kutsi kwandze kuba nemibiko lenembako yeluhlolomabhuku kanye nelucwaningo lwesikhatsi lesitako lolumayelana netingucuko tebunikati bemhlaba.

src_text: Ketsahalo Tlang.
Mohope wa Lefatshe wa Rugby Sevens wa.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinywa We-Ejensi Yavelonkhe Yesakhiwonchanti Setinsita Tetemanti (i-NWRIA) Yemnyaka We-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tlo tshwara Mohope wa Lefatshe wa Rugby Sevens wa 2022 mane Kapa ka la 9 le la 11 Lwetse.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kushicilelwe Umtsetfosivivinywa we-NWRIA Wemnyaka we-2022 kute utfole luvo lwemmango sikhatsi lesitinsuku letimashumi layimfica (90).

src_text: Mohope ona tla be tshwarelwa lekgetlo la pele kontinenteng ya Afrika moo dihlopha tsa banna ba 24 le sa basadi ba 16 di tla beng di qothisana lehlokwa   Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa uhlongota kutsi kusungulwe i-NWRIA kute isebente kuhlela, kunika imali, nekutfutfukisa sakhiwonchanti semanti kulelive.

src_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: ●  Banyana Banyana, ka ho etsa nalane ka ho hapela Afrika Borwa Mahope wa Pele wa Basadi wa Dinaha tsa Afrika (WAFCON), ka ho hlola naha ya Morokho papading ya makgaolakgang ka Moqebelo wa la 23 Phupu.
tgt_text: Itawuphindze futsi isebente kunakekela lesakhiwonchanti semanti lesikhona nyalo..   Le-ejensi utawucinisekisa kutsi kutawuphakelwa emanti ngendlela lesimeme, lelinganako naletsembekile ngekuhambisana netidzingo temtsetfosisekelo tekutfola emanti nekuba nesimondzawo lesihlantekile.

src_text: Tlholo ena ya bona ba kentse Mohopeng wa Lefatshe wa FIFA wa Basadi tla tshwarelwa naheng ya Australia le New Zealand ho tloha ka la 20 Phupu ho ya ho 20 Phato.
tgt_text: Le-ejensi itawakhiwa ibe Sikhungo Sahulumende lesingaphasi kweShejuli ye-2 Yemtsetfo Wekulawulwa Kwetimali Tahulumende, 1999 (Umtsetfo 1 we-1999).

src_text: ●  Sehlopha sa Afrika Borwa, ka ho hapa dimetale tse 27 dipapading tse fapafapaneng Dipapading tsa Commonwealth mane Birmingham, Englane ho tloha ka la 28 Phupu ho ya ho 8 Phato.
tgt_text: Le-ejensi itawutsatsa lemisebenti lenyalo yentiwa yi-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..   Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Emandla Emali Yamasipala Nekusebenta Kwayo Wemnyaka We-.

src_text: Sehlopha sena se ne se be maemong borobong ka metale tse supileng tsa kgauta, tse robong tsa silifera le tse 11 tsa bronze.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Emandla Emali Yamasipala Nekusebenta Kwayo Wemnyaka we-.

src_text: ●  Sehlopha sa Basadi sa Springbok, ka ho hlola naha ya Spain Letotong la Dipapadi tsa Basadi tsa Mariha tse neng di bapalla Lebaleng la Emirates Airline Park, Johannesburg.●  Mme Ndavi Nokeri (23), ka ho ba Mmabotle wa Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa uchibiyela Umtsetfo Wemandla Emali Yamasipala Nekusebenta Kwayo, Wemnyaka we-2007 (Umtsetfo 12 we-2007).

src_text: ●  Mme Ashleigh Buhai, ka ho hapa Dipapadi tsa 2022 tsa AIG Women’s Open mme ba mosadi wa boraro wa Afrika Borwa wa ho hapa kgau ya kgauta..   Matshidiso       Kabinete fetisetsa matshidiso yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya: ●   Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), sebini le sengodi sa dipina ya neng tumi nakong eo ba neng ba theha sehlopha sa TKZee ka 1996 le metswalle ya hae mmedi..  Kgiro.
Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.
tgt_text: tichibiyelo tilawula emandla abomasipala ekutsi bakhokhise tindleko tekutfutfukisa indzawo etintfweni letimayela neticelo tekutfutfukisa umhlaba letitfunyelwe kubo labomasipala.

src_text: Mme Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso (DDG): Karolong ya Dipatlisiso ka Melawana le Taolo Lefapheng la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba le Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: Letichibiyelo titawucinisekisa kutsi bomasipala basebentisa letindleko kahle nangendlela lecotfo, levulekele wonkhe wonkhe nalesebenta kahle.

src_text: Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jwalo ka DDG: Sitsing sa Nala sa Taolo ya Dikoduwa Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo..   Ntate Adam Mthombeni jwalo ka DDG: Dikamanong tsa Mafapha Mmuso Lefapheng la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba le Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi yavuma kutsi Lomtsetfosivivinywa uyotfola luvo lwemmango ngemnyaka we-.

src_text: Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang:.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Tintfo Letimayelana Netetimali Wemnyaka we-2022 .

src_text: Ngaka Zwanani Titus Mathe jwalo ka Motsamaiso ya ka Sehloohong Mokgatlong wa Ntshetsopele ya Eneji Afrika Borwa..   Ditho tsa nakwana tsa Mokgatlo wa Naha Laolang Taba tsa Motlakase Afrika Borwa: Ntate Thembani Bukula (Modulasetulo);Mme Zandile Mpungose (Motlatsi wa Modulasetulo); Mme Precious Sibiya;Mme Thembeka Semane; leNtate Fungai Sibanda kgethilwe hape)..   Modulasetulo le setho sa Moifo wa Boto ya Thekenoloji ya Dimenerale: Ngaka Thibedi Ramontja (Modulasetulo); leMoprofesara Lwazi Ngubevana..   Mme Cladie Thamo Hloniphile Mzobe jwalo ka Motsamaisi Moholo wa Sedika wa Mokgatlo wa Tshireletso wa Afrika Borwa wa KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumelene kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivnywa Wekuchibiyela Tintfo Letimayelana Netetimali, Wemnyaka we-.

src_text: Moruo.
tgt_text: Temnotfo.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse taba ya ho fokotseha hanyane ha palo ya batho ba sa sebetseng naheng ena ka persente tse.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kwehla kancane kwelizinga lekuswelakala kwemsebenti kwalelive, lokwehle nge-.

src_text: 6, ho tloha ho persente tse.
tgt_text: 6%, kusukela ku-.

src_text: 5 ho ya ho tse.
tgt_text: 5% ngekota yekucala kwaba ngu-.

src_text: 9 ka kotara ya bobedi ya selemo sa.
tgt_text: 9% ngekota yesibili ya-.

src_text: Ho ya ka dipalopalo tse phatlaladitsweng Tokomaneng ya Kotara ya Dipalopalo tsa Ditaba tsa Kgiro phatlaladitsweng ke Lefapha la Dipalopalo la Afrika Borwa, mesebetsi mengata fumanehile lekaleng la Ditshebeletso tsa Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba (276 000), la tsa Kgwebo (169 000), la Ditjhelete (128 000) le la Kaho (104 000).
tgt_text: Letinombolo tishicilelwe kuLuklayo Ngelinani Lalabasebentako Nalabangasebenti Ngekota lolwentiwe Lubalobalo lwaseNingizimu Afrika lukhomba kutsi imisebenti leminyenti ivele kuMisebenti Yemmango Netenhlalakahle (276 000), Tekuhweba (169 000), Tetimali (128 000) kanye nakuTekwakha (104 000)..     Linani lonkhe selilonkhe lebantfu labacashiwe libe tigidzi leti-.

src_text: Palo ya batho ba sebetsang ha jwale ke dimilione tse 15,6 kotareng ya bobedi ya selemo sa 2022 mme palo ya ba sa sebetseng yona eketsehile ka batho ba 132 000 ho ya ho ba dimilione di 8,0 ka kotara ya bobedi ya selemo sa 2022 ha ho bapiswa le kotara fetileng.
tgt_text: 6 kukota yesibili yanga-2022, kantsi linani lebantfu labangasebenti lenyuka nge-132 000 laya kutigidzi le-.

src_text: Keketseho ena le ha le nyane, empa bontsha kgatelo pele boitekong ba mmuso le mahlahana ona ba ho aha moruo botjha esitana le ho theha menyetla hlokahalang ya mesebetsi.
tgt_text: 0 ngekota yesibili yanga-2022 nakucatsaniswa nekota yaphambilini.

src_text: Sena ke bopaki ba hore ha re tshwarisane, mme re sebetsa mmoho re ka hlola diphephetso tse shebaneng le moruo wa rona.
tgt_text: Letinzuzo lesingeke sitikhukhumete ngato kodvwa letijabulisako tikhombisa kutsi imitamo leyentiwe nguhulumende nekuhlanganyela kanye nebalingani betenhlalakahle ekukhuliseni umnotfo  kanye nekudala imisebenti ledzingeka kakhulu seyicala kutsela titselo nyalo..     Lesi sitatimende lesikhombisa liciniso lelitsi nangabe sonkhe singasebenta ngekuhlanganyela ngekwemandla etfu, singatincoba letinsayeya letibukene nemnotfo wetfu.

src_text: Kabinete utlwisisa hantle pherekano maikutlong Maafrika Borwa jwalo ka ha hula ka thata ka lebaka la leqeme la mesebetsi le ditjeho tse hodimo tsa ho phela.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakucondza kukhungatseka kwebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika njengoba bashikashikeka ngekuphila kwabo kwemalanga onkhe ngenca yetindleko tekuphila kanye nelizinga lelisetulu lekuswelakala kwemisebenti.

src_text: Jwalo ka mmuso hlokomelang, re ikemiseditse ka hohlehohle ho sebedisana le mahlahana rona ho aha bokamoso bo betere bakeng sa batho bohle.
tgt_text: Njengahulumende lonakekelako, sihlala sitimisele futsi sitibophelele ekusebenteni ngekubambisana nebalingani betfu betenhlalakahle kuze kutsi sakhe likusasa lelincono lawo wonkhe umuntfu.

src_text: Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho tshehetsa dikgwebo tsa lapeng ka ho reka le ho sebedisa ditshebeletso tsa lapeng.
tgt_text: Uhulumende usatibophelele ekwesekeni emabhizinisi endzawo ngekutsenga timphahla netinsita tendzawo.

src_text: Disebediswa tsa Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Takhiwonchanti Semphakatsi.

src_text: Kabinete hanyetsana haholo le taba ya tshenyo ya disebediswa tsa setjhaba ke baahi ba Tongaat mane KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya boipelaetso ba bona ka lebaka la ho kgaoha ha phepelo ya metsi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikugcekile kulinyatwa kwesakhiwonchanti lokwentiwa takhamiti taseThongathi KwaZulu-Natal ngalesikhatsi kunembhikisho wekutfola emanti.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se be le mamello jwalo ka ha mosebetsi se qadile wa ho lokisa Sitsi se Hlwekisang Metsi sa moo Tongaat..  Kabinete utlwisisa hantle pherekano ya baahi jwalo ka ha ba tlameha ho sebedisa metsi tliswang ka dilori ka lebaka la tshenyo neng bakwe ke dikgohola botjheng ba selemo sena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi icele kutsi kube nekwehlisa umoya nekubeketela njengoba kuchubeka umsebenti wekubuyisela iMisebenzi Yekuhlanta Emanti eThongathi..     IKhabhinethi iyakucondza kukhungatseka kwetakhamiti lokuze kwadzingeka kutsi tisebentise emathangi emanti sikhatsi lesidze kusukela kwaba netikhukhula ekucaleni kwalomnyaka.

src_text: Leha ho le jwalo, meruso le ho senya disebediswa tsa setjhaba ha se tharollo, empa le ho eketsa mathata setjhabeng.
tgt_text: Kodvwa-ke, ludlame nekutitsetsela umtsetfo akusiso sisombululo, futsi kulinyatwa kwesakhiwonchanti semphakatsi kulimata kuphela imiphakatsi yaleyondzawo.

src_text: Dintlafatso Molaong Laolang Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Bommasepala wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: UMtsetfo Lochibiyelwe Wetinhlelo Tabomasipala Bahulumende Wasekhaya wa-.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho saenelwa ha Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Laolang Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Bommasepala wa Selemo sa 2022, (Molao wa bo 3 wa Selemo sa 2022) ho ba molao ka botlalo ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yemukele kusayinwa kweMtsetfo wekuChibiyela Tinhlelo taboMasipala beNdzawo wa-2022 (uMtsetfo Nombolo 3 wa-2022) nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Ka molao ona, ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa maemo le boleng ba tshebetso ya bommasepala.
tgt_text: Lomtsetfo uhlose kwenta ncono emandla kanye nemazinga ekutiphatsa lokwamukelekako kwabohulumende basekhaya.

src_text: Molao ona, ke karolo ya matsapa mmuso ho ntlafatsa maemo Phano ya Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba leng tokelo ya sona ngotsweng ho Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa Selemo sa..  Molao ona hlakisa hantle le tsela tlamehang ho latelwa ha ho hirwa basebeletsi maemong hodimo boetse hape thibela basebeletsi ba mmuso ho ba ketapeleng ya mekga ya dipolotiki.
tgt_text: Lomtsetfo uyincenye yemitamo yahulumende yekwenta uMkhakha Wetemisebenti Yahulumende ube nebuchwepheshe kanye nekucinisekisa kuphakelwa kwetinsita kubantfu, njengelilungelo lelisisekelo lelicuketfwe nguMtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wa-..     LoMtsetfo ucacisa tinchubo lekufanele tilandzelwe uma kucashwa etikhundleni letisetulu.

src_text: Molao ona hape dumella hore dikgeo tsa batsamaisi ba bommasepala di phatlalatswe boemong ba naha ho bebofatsa taba ya ho fumana batho ba nang le bokgoni bo hlokahalang.
tgt_text: Manje uvimbela tikhulu tahulumende letisetulu kutsi tibe netikhundla tembangave emacenjini etembangave.

src_text: Kabinete na le boitshepo ba hore diphetoho tsena di tla netefatsa hore ba kgethelwang kapa ba hirelwang dikgeong tseo, ba sebetsa ka tsela lebelletsweng le ho netefatsa hore re ntlafatsa maphelo batho bohle.
tgt_text: Futsi njengoba sewukhona loMtsetfo, tikhala tebumenenja tabomasipala letingakagcwaliswa kulindzeleke kutsi tikhangiswe kuvelonkhe kuze kuhehe incumbi yebantfu labafanelekile.

src_text: Bonokwane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inelitsemba lekutsi letingucuko titocinisekisa kutsi labo labacashiwe kumbe labakhetselwe kuletikhundla batokwati kufeza titsembiso tabo kuze kufinyeleleke emphilweni lencono yawo wonkhe umuntfu.

src_text: Kabinete thoholetsa ba Ditshebeletso tsa Lekgetho Afrika Borwa ka ho kgona ho fumana sethethefatsi sa crystal meth sa boima ba 785kg, se ka bitsang dimilione tse   Sethethefatsi sena, se fumanwe mane Boemafofaneng ba Matjhaba ba OR Tambo ka Sontaha sa la 28 Phato.
tgt_text: Bugebengu.

src_text: Ho fumaneha ha sethethefatsi sena, ho tla romela molaetsa ho dinokwane hore madiboho rona sebetsa ka thata ho lwantsha ditlolo tsa molao  Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ituse tikhulu teLuphiko Lolugcogca Umtselo eNingizimu Afrika ngekushaca emakhilogremu lange-785 e-crystal meth lenelinani lasemgwacweni letigidzi leti-R236 esikhumulweni i-OR Tambo International Airport ngeliSontfo, mhla tinge-28 iNgci.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Moifo wa Thuto Phahameng Mabapi le Dipatlisiso ka Meputso ya Baokamedi ba Diyunivesithi (CHE) le Basebeletsi ba Boemong ba Botsamaisi ho tsona Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Lokubanjwa kwetidzakamiva kutotfumela umlayeto locacile kutigilamkhuba tebugebengu kutsi tikhungo tetfu tekungena nekuphuma tivikelwe kahle futsi tikhulu tetfu tisebenta kamatima kucedza noma ngubuphi bugebengu     Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya hlajwa malotsana ka sephetho sa dipatlisiso ka CHE, tse neng di thakgolwe ke Letona la Thuto Phahameng, Saense le Mahlale, Ngaka, Blade Nzimande, ho hlahloba taba ya meputso le tsela ya tshebetso ya batsamaisi ba ka sehloohong diyunivesithing dilemong tse 15 tse fetileng, ho tloha ka selemo sa 2005 ho isa ho sa..  Dipatlisiso tsena, di ne di lekola taba ya tshebetso, katleho le ntshetsopele diyunivesithing kapa lekaleng la thuto phahameng naheng ena.
tgt_text: Umbiko weMkhandlu WeTemfundvo Lephakeme (i-CHE) Uphenya Ngekukhokhelwa Kwemasekela aboShansela Bemanyuvesi kanye Nebaphatsi Labasetulu eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Tlaleho ena le dikateng tsa yona di kenyeletsa le dikgothaletso tsa teng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibikelwe ngemiphumela yeluphenyo lwe-CHE lolwagunyatwa nga-2020 nguNgcongcoshe Wetemfundo Lephakeme, Isayensi Nekusungula, Dkt.

src_text: Tse ding tsa dikgothaletso di kenyeletsa ho matlafatswa esitana le ho sebetsa ka tsela hlakileng mabapi le ditaba tsa meputso.
tgt_text: Blade Nzimande, kuhlola emazinga emaholo kanye netinkhambiso tebaphatsi bemanyuvesi esikhatsini lesiminyaka lengu-15 kusukela nga-2005 kuze kube ngu-..     Loluphenyo belilekukutfola kusimama, kusebenta kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwemanyuvesi noma umkhakha wetemfundvo lephakeme eveni.

src_text: Tse ding dikgothaletso di eletsa ho thehwa ha komiti ikemetseng tla shebana le taba ya meputso.
tgt_text: Lombiko uveta lokutfolakele lokubalulekile kanye netincomo tekulungisa letihlongotwako..     Letincomo tiphakamisa, phakatsi kwalokunye, inchubo yemaholo lecinisiwe nalesebaleni.

src_text: Dikgothaletso tsena, di boetse di sisinya le hore ho be le ho matlafatswa mmoho le ho lekolwa ha tshebetso  ditsing tsa thuto phahameng.
tgt_text: Kusungulwa kwemtimba wekubukisisa lotimele lotokwengamela inchubo yekutsatsa tincumo ngemaholo.

src_text: Dipatlisiso tsena, di boetsa tsa lekola le ho fetana ha boholo ba ditsi tsena mme tsa boela tsa bapiswa le maemo matjhaba.
tgt_text: Iphindze iphakamise kuciniswa kwetinhlelo tekuhlola kusebenta etikhungweni.

src_text: Letona la Thuto Phahameng, Saense le Mahlale ho lebeletswe hore le buisane le ketapele ya diyunivesithi ka maikemisetso ho di ntshetsa pele.
tgt_text: Lolu cwaningo luphindze lwabuka bukhulu lobuhlukahlukene baletikhungo lwaphinde lwenta nekulinganiswa ngekwemave ngemave.

src_text: Ka morao ho moo, tlaleho ena tla phatlalatswa ho websaete ya Lefapha la Thuto Phahameng le Thupello: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Indvuna Yetemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi Nekusungula  Lokusha ilindzeleke kutsi icocisane nebuholi benyuvesi ngalombiko njengesinyatselo sekucinisa letikhungo temfundvo lephakeme.

src_text: Ho Potlakiswa ha Diphetoho Dipatlisisong le Mokgweng wa ho Ruta Lekaleng la Thuto Phahameng.
tgt_text: Ngemuva kwaloko umbiko utoshicilelwa kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko Letemfundvo Lephakeme Nekucecesha: www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: Kabinete tshehetsa dikgothaletso tsa dipatlisiso tse pedi tse neng di etswe ho ka eletsa ka tsela le mekgwa ka sebediswang ho potlakisa diphetoho dipatlisisong le mokgweng wa ho ruta ditsing tsa thuto phahameng.
Tlaleho ya pele ne etswe ke Komiti Ikgethileng ya Matona neng fuputsa ka thibelo ya kgiro, tshebediso le katleho ya barutehi ba batho ba batsho Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Ingucuko lephutfumako yeLucwaningo neLikhono Lekufundzisa eMkhakheni weTemfundvo Lephakeme.

src_text: Tlaleho ya bobedi – neng ntshitswe ke Lefapha la Saense le Mahlale mmoho le Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Dipatlisiso – yona ne etswe ke Mokgatlo wa Diyunivesithi tsa Afrika Borwa leng mokgatlo emetseng diyunivesithi tse 26 tsa setjhaba naheng ena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isekele tincomo tetifundvo letimbili letajutjwa ngekweluleka ngetinyatselo lekufanele tibe khona kuze kusheshiswe kuguculwa kwemandla ekucwaninga newekufundzisa etikhungweni temfundvo lephakeme.

src_text: Ka bobedi ditlaleho tsena di kgothaletsa taba ya ho potlakiswa ha diphetoho dikarolong tse hlano leng tshebediso ya dirutehi; ho nka karolo ha basebeletsi ba diyunivesithi; mokgwa le tshebetso ya diyunivesithi; melawana le maano tshebetso, le kgaello ya disebediswa.
tgt_text: Umbiko wekucala wentiwe liTsimba Langcongcoshe Lelijutjwe kutsi liphenye ngezitsiyo letivimbela kucashwa, kugcinwa kanye nekuchubekela phambili kwetifundziswa letimnyama taseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Tumellano ya Matjhaba ho Tshebediso ya Dimela le Diphoofolo Tlhahisong ya Dijo le tsa Temo (the Treaty).
tgt_text: Umbiko wesibili – lojutjwe Litiko leteSayensi nekuSungula kanye neSisekelo Selucwaningo Lwesive lolwentiwa yi-Universities South Africa, lokuyinhlangano lemele emanyuvesi emphakatsi lange-26 eveni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha the Treaty Palamenteng bakeng sa tekolo.
tgt_text: Yomibili lemibiko iphakamisa tindlelasu tekungenelela kuze kusheshiswe ingucuko emikhakheni lebanti lesihlanu, lowasebaneticu; kutibandzakanya kwebasebenti; lisiko nekusebenta kwesikhungo; inchubomgomo nendlelasu, kanye netinsita letinganelanga.

src_text: Sena se tla etsa hore Afrika Borwa be karolo ya Tumellano ena fanang ka tataiso ho dinaha tseo leng ditho mabapi le paballo le tshebediso ya nako telele ya dihlahiswa tsa dimela le diphoofolo dijong le ho tsa temo.
tgt_text: Sivumelwano Semave Ngemave Ngemitfombo yeLufutotitjalo Lwekudla Netekulima.

src_text: Ho amohelwa ha Tumellano ena, ho tla matlafatsa boitlamo ba naha ena mabapi le paballo le tshebediso ya nako telele ya dihlahiswa tsa dimela le diphoofolo, mme ho tshehetswe le batho ba mahaeng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePhalamende.

src_text: Moralo wa Leano la Diphetoho Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Loku kutokwenta kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ibe yincenye yemacembu kuleSivumelwano, lesicondzisa emave langemalunga ekongeni nasekucinisekiseni kusetjentiswa lokusimeme kwemitfombo yelufuto lwetitjalo ekudleni nasekulimeni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Leano la Diphetoho.
tgt_text: Kwemukela leSivumelwano kutophindze kucinise kutibophelela kwelive ekongeni nasekusetjentisweni ngendlela lesimeme kwemitfombo yelufuto lwetitjalo, futsi kunikete kwesekwa emiphakatsini yasemaphandleni.

src_text: Moralo ona hlakisa ponelopele ka Afrika Borwa nang le Maemo Lehodimo Tsitsitseng.
tgt_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lweluntjintjo Lolulungile lweNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Moralo ona hlalosa tsela le mekgwa ya ho fihlela sena.
Moralo ona tla ama motho ohle Afrika Borwa fane le ka menyetla ya ho lokisa ho se lekalekane ha nako fetileng le ho aha moruo tla tswela bohle molemo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphasise luHlaka Lwengucuko Lolufanele lokutsi lusetjentiswe.

src_text: Komeshene ya Mopresidente ya Maemo Lehodimo buisane le mahlahana yona mme ya fumana tshehetso kgolo ka moralo ona.
tgt_text: Loluhlaka lwetfula umbono wekwabelana, weNingizimu Afrika, lekwati kumelana ngalokulinganako nesimo selitulu.

src_text: Kabinete ka netefatsa taba ya hore moralo ona wa ho fihlela tikoloho moya hlwekileng ka selemo sa 2050 tlameha ho tshehetsa moruo le ntshetsopele ya naha ho kenyeletsa menyetla ya mesebetsi ho bohle, tshebedisano le setjhaba le phediso ya bofuma.
tgt_text: Luchaza imigomo netindzawo tenchubomgomo kuze kuphunyelelwe kuloku.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho mahlahana yona ohle hore tshehetse moralo ona.
tgt_text: Luhlaka lwengucuko lutotsintsa wonkhe umuntfu eNingizimu Afrika, futsi luniketa litfuba lokubukana nekungalingani ngekwemlandvo futsi ludale umnotfo lozuzisa wonkhe umuntfu.

src_text: Ho tla ralwa tsela eo moralo ona tlang ho kengwa tshebetsong ka yona mme tla kenyelletswa moralong wa maano le kabo ya ditjhelete tsa mmuso.
tgt_text: IKhomishana yaMengameli Yesimo Selitulu yente inchubo yekubonisana lebanti nebalingani betenhlalakahle futsi yatfola kwesekwa lokubanti kweluhlaka.

src_text: Mofuta Motjha wa Lengolo la Afrika Borwa la ho Kganna.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikucinisekisile kutsi kuntjintjela emnotfweni wekhabhoni lekuziro lekhicitwako nga-2050 kufanele kusekele tifiso tentfutfuko yavelonkhe, lokufaka umsebenti lohloniphekile wabo bonkhe bantfu, kufakwa kwenhlalakahle nekucedvwa kwebuphuya.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho fetolwa ha mofuta sebetsang ha jwale wa lengolo la ho kganna ho ya ho le nang le dikarolo tse ntjha tsa tshireletso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yenta lubito kubo bonkhe lababambisene kutenhlalo kutsi basekele futsi balwemukele loluhlaka.

src_text: Mofuta ona sebediswang ha jwale, haesale le tshebetsong ho tloha ka selemo sa.
tgt_text: Kutotfutfukiswa luhlelo lolunemininingwane yekusetjentiswa kwaloluhlaka, futsi lutodidiyelwa neluhlelo lwahulumende lwekuhlela kanye nelwesabelomali.

src_text: Maemo thekenoloji fetohile haholo matsatsing ana mme ho bitsa tjhelete ngata ho tswela pele le mofuta ona.
tgt_text: Likhadi Lelisha Lelayisensi Yekushayela laseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Mofuta motjha wa karete tsamaisana le Maemo Matjhaba Mangolo ho Kganna le Thekenoloji ya Poloko ya Dintlha tsa Batho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kuntjintjwa kweliKhadi Lelayisensi Yekushayela lamanje kufakwe lelinemidvwebo yetimphawu tekuphepha letengetiwe.
Luhlelo lolukhona kwamanje belusebenta kusukela nga-.

src_text: Melawana ya Leano la Mmuso la Tshehetso ya Setjhaba (EPWP).
tgt_text: Bucwepheshe sebusombulukile futsi sekuya ngekubita kugcina sakhiwonchanti lesikhona njengamanje.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha moralo wa EPWP bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Likhadi lelisha lelihlongotwako litokwenta kutsi ilayisensi yekushayela yalelive ihambisane nobucwepheshe be-International Information Technology Personal Identification Driving Licence (i-ISO18013).

src_text: Leano lena la EPWP, ke leo ka lona mmuso thusang setjhaba ho leleka bofuma ka ho theha mesebetsi ya nakwana, haholo bakeng sa basadi le batjha.
tgt_text: Inchubomgomo Yeluhlelo Lolunwetjiwe Lwetemisebenti Yahulumende (i-EPWP).

src_text: Moralo ona motjha tla hlakisa dintho tse ngata tse kang meputso, tshehetso tsa ditjhelete, tshireletso ya setjhaba le hore leano lena le ipapise le melao ya tsa kgiro.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphasise kushicilelwa kweluhlaka lwenchubomgomo ye-EPWP kuze kuboniswane nemphakatsi.

src_text: Le tla boela le kgothaletsa le tshebedisano mmoho pakeng tsa mmuso le lekala le ikemetseng ho ka netefatsa hore lenaneo lena la EPWP le thusa ho theha mesebetsi ya moshwelella le ho leleka bofuma.
tgt_text: I-EPWP ingulolunye lwetinhlelo tahulumende letibalulekile letihlose kuniketa lusito lokukhululeka kubuphuya nekungena kwemali ngekudala ematfuba emisebenti esikhashana, ikakhulukati kulusha nakulabasikati..     Luhlaka lwesikhashana lwenchubomgomo lensha lutocinisa loluhlelo futsi lunikete kucaciseleka ngetinhlangotsi letifana nemiholo, imodeli yekuchasa ngetimali nekuvikelwa kutenhlalo, futsi lucondzanise i-EPWP nekutayetisa kwesimanje kutemisebenti.

src_text: Moralo ona tla hlaha ka mahlale ho kenya lenaneo lena la mesebetsi ya setjhaba tshebetsong naheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Itogcugcuzela budlelwane emkhatsini wahulumende nemikhakha letimele ekucinisekiseni kutsi i-EPWP ifaka sandla kakhulu ekwakhiweni kwemisebenti lehloniphekile kanye nekucedza buphuya.

src_text: Diphetoho Mofuteng wa Bone wa Tjhelete ya Tshepe Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo itophindze ikhutsate kusungulwa kwekusetjentiswa kwetinhlelo temisebenti yemphakatsi eveni lonkhe..     Tichibelo Teluchungechunge Lesine Lwetinhlavumali lwaseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlhahisong ya Mofuta Motjha wa Tjhelete ya Tshepe Afrika Borwa ho tloha ka selemo sa tjhaetse monwana ho tjhentjhisana ha tshebediso ya dipuo tse molao tjheleteng ena jwalo ka selemo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate bungako, idizayini kanye nekugcogcwa kweLuchungechunge Lesine Lwetinhlavumali lwaseNingizimu Afrika lwemnyaka wa-.

src_text: Lentswe lena “Afrika Borwa” le tla hlahella lehlakoreng le le leng la tjhelete mme ho tjhentjhanywe dipuo tsohle tse molaong.
tgt_text: Igunyate luhlelo lwekujikeleta lwaminyaka yonkhe lekusetjentiswa kwetilimi letisemtsetfweni eluchungachungeni Lwenhlavumali Yesine.

src_text: Ho R5, ho tla sebediswa puo tse tharo; ho R2; 50c, 20c le 10c ho sebediswe puo tse pedi mme ho R1 ho sebediswe puo le nngwe.
tgt_text: Ligama “iNingizimu Afrika” litofakwa eluhlangotsini lunye lwetinhlavumali bese libhalwa ngato tonkhe tilwimi letisemtsetfweni.

src_text: Dipuo tsena di tla nne di tjhentjhane jwalo ka selemo dilemong tsena tse leshome tse tlang.
tgt_text: Tilwimi letintsatfu titosetjentiswa kuluhlavu lwemali lwa-R5; Tilwimi letimbili R2; Tinhlavumali letingu-50c, 20c no-10c kanye na-R1 titoba ngelulwimi lunye.

src_text: Moralo wa Molawana wa Tlhwekiso ya Metsi (IWQM) wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: Tonkhe letilwimi titosetjentiswa ngekutjintjana njalo ngemnyaka eminyakeni leli-10 letako.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa IWQM bukaneng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Ledidiyelwe Yekulawula Lizinga Lemanti (i-IWQM) ya-.

src_text: Moralo ona tla kena sebakeng sa wa kgale wa WQM wa selemo sa 1991 neng kengwe tshebetsong ka selemo sa..  Molawana ona hlakisa dintlha tsa bohlokwa tsamaisong ya tlhwekiso ya metsi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphasise kufakwa kugazethi kweLuhlaka lwenchubomgomo ye-IWQM kuze kuboniswane nemphakatsi.

src_text: Moralo ona tsamaisana le melao yohle ya naha laolang metsi mme ntse ikamahantse le boinehelo ba naha ba ho nka metsi jwalo ka sehlahiswa se sa atang.
tgt_text: Inchubomgomo lehlongotwako itongena esikhundleni seNchubomgomo ya-1991 ye-WQM lephelelwe sikhatsi kanye nendlelasu yayo leyacalwa nga-..     Lenchubomgomo iveta isethi yemigomo letoba sisekelo sekulawulwa kwelizinga lemanti.

src_text: Moralo wa Molawana Laolang Maqhubu Diyalemoya Bakeng sa Nako Tlang.
tgt_text: Iniketa ngekucondzisana nayo yonkhe imitsetfo lefanele lephatselene nemanti kanye nekutibophelela kwelive emhlabeni wonkhe ekuniketweni nekongiwa kwemanti njengemtfombo loyindlala.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa Molawana Laolang Maqhubu Diyalemoya bakeng sa Nako Tlang bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo yeSitukulwane Lesitako Sekusakata Ngeligagasi Lemoya.

src_text: Maqhubu kgaso ya diyalemoya, ke bohlokwa ho tsa kgokahano le tshebedisong ya dijithale Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kushicilelwa kweluhlaka lweNchubomgomo Yesitukulwane Lesilandzelako yeTekusakata Kwemsakato kuze kutsi umphakatsi uphawule ngawo.

src_text: Molawana ona tla hlakisa taba ya ho fana ka dilaesense bakeng sa diselefounu; kgaso; tshebeletso tsa difofane le tsa dikepe; tsa dipatlisiso le ntshetsopele; tshebedisano le setjhaba ha mmoho le diindasteri tse ding tse amehang.
tgt_text: Kusakata Ngemagagasi Emoya kuyinsita yemvelo lenemkhawulo lebalulekile ekukhuleni kwemnotfo wedijithali waseNingizimu Afrika nesakhiwoncanti yetekuchumana.

src_text: Molawana ona tla netefatsa tshebetso hlokang leemo kabong ya dilaesense lekaleng lena ha mmoho le ho netefatsa hore bohle ba fumana kgokahano ntle ka mokgwa wa dijithale le dibakeng tse dikoting naheng ena.
tgt_text: Inchubomgomo lehlongozwako ihlose kwesekela kwabiwa kwemagagasi emoya kanye nekuniketwa kwelayisensi yemaselula langantjintji; kusakata; tetindiza netetilwandle; lucwaningo nentfutfuko; kufinyelela kwemphakatsi, naletinye timboni letifanele.

src_text: Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ho Boto ya Matjhaba ya Moifo wa Taolo ho tsa Kgokahano ya Diyalemoya (ITU).
tgt_text: Inchubomgomo iphindze ifune kuchubekisa kulingana nekwabiwa lokulungile kuze kufakwe sandla ekuguculeni umkhakha kanye nekufinyelela kwekuchumana kwedijithali ngisho nasetindzaweni letisemaphetselweni elive.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kgethwa ha Ntate Mandla Samuel Mchunu ho ya emela Afrika Borwa ho ITU (Region .
tgt_text: Kukhetfwa kwalomele iNingizimu Afrika eMkhandlwini Wenyonyana Yemave Ngemave Yetekuchumana (i-ITU) kanye neBhodi Yetimiso Temsakato.

src_text: Ha jwale Ntate Mchunu ke setho sa boto ena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kukhetfwa kwaMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu lomele iNingizimu Afrika kuleliBhodi le-ITU Letimiso Temsakato (isiFundza .

src_text: Ho sisintswe hore boele kgethelwe ho sebetsa teng hape ho tloha ka semo sa 2023 ho isa ho sa..  Dikgetho di tla tshwarelwa Sebokeng sa ITU sa Kemedi tsa Dinaha se tla ba mane Bucharest, Romania ho tloha ka la 26 Lwetse ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Mnu.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ikemiseditse ho ikamahanya le dipehelo tsa ITU ho netefatsa hore kgokahanyo finyella diqoleng tsohle tsa lefatshe ka mokgwa wa dijithale .
tgt_text: Mchunu ulilunga lelisebentako lebhodi kwamanje.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Botjhaba.
tgt_text: Kuhlongotwa kutsi aphindze akhetselwe esikhundleni seMkhandlu we-ITU kusukela nga-2023 kuya ku-.

src_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ya Botjhaba leng ya Lwetse re tla keteka tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa”.
Kabinete ipiletsa ho Maafrika Borwa kaofela ho keteka Botjhaba ba rona ka ho fapana ha rona empa re ntse re le setjhaba se le seng se bopahaneng.
tgt_text: Lukhetfo lutokwenteka ngesikhatsi seNgcungcutsela Yemancusa e-ITU letoba e-Bucharest, e-Romania kusukela mhla tinge-26 iNyoni kuya kumhla ti-14 iMphala.

src_text: Re tlameha ho sebetsa mmoho re tshwarane ho fedisa dikarohano le dipherekano tsa nako  fetileng mme re be setjhaba se le seng se motlotlo ka Afrika Borwa  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika isatibophelele etinjongweni nasemigomeni ye-ITU tekucedza kwehlukana ngekwedijithali nekuchumanisa bonkhe bantfu bemhlaba     Imicimbi Letako.

src_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho:Bahlodi bohle, ba fumaneng dimetale le bohle ba nkileng karolo lebelong la bo 95 la Comrades tummeng ka hore ke “Lebelo Botho la ho Hlola Kaofela”, le neng le mathwa ka la 28 Phato.
tgt_text: Inyanga Yemagugu.

src_text: Mokgahlelong wa banna mohlodi bile Tete Dijana (ka nako ya dihora tse 5, metsotso 30 le metsotswana 38).
tgt_text: Inyanga Yemagugu ngeNyoni kulomnyaka itokhunjulwa ngaphansi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Sibungata Umshiyandvuku Wa-Solomon Linda Nemculo Wemdzabu waseNingizimu Afrika”.

src_text: Mohlodi enwa tswa Mahikeng profensing ya Leboya Bophirima.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhutsata bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi basebentise Inyanga Yemagugu kugubha lisiko lemagugu etfu lanotsile kanye nekwehlukahlukana lokunemandla ekuhlanganisa sive setfu.

src_text: Mokgahlelong wa basadi teng mohlodi bile Alexandra Morozova ho tswa naheng ya Rashia (ka nako ya dihora tse 6, metsotso 17 le metsotswana 47).
tgt_text: Kufanele kutsi sonkhe  sitibophelele ekusebenteni ngekubambisana kucedza kwehlukana nekungabi nebulungiswa kwesikhatsi lesedlulile futsi sikhutsate kutiva sitigcabha ngekuba waseNingizimu Afrika     Imilayeto.

src_text: MatshidisoKabinete lebisa matshidiso yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya:Mme Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), eo neng le molwanedi wa tsa tokoloho le ditokelo tsa basebetsi ya neng fumane Kgau ya National Order of Luthuli ka selemo sa 2004 ka “Kabelo ya hae ho lwaneleng ditokelo tsa basebetsi le tsa Afrika Borwa sa kgetholleng ka morabe le bonng.”Ditho tse hlano tsa Sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa (SAPS) tse ileng tsa swahlamana le sefofane Boemafofaneng ba Rand, Germiston, ka Labobedi la la 30 Phato.
tgt_text: Kuhalalisela       IKhabhinethi ivakalisa kuhalalisa kwayo kanye netilokotfo letinhle ku:Kubo bonkhe labaphumelele, labatfole tindondo nebachudzelani labatimbandzakanye kumncintiswano Wekugijima i-95th Comrade Marathon, lodvume ngekwatiwa ngekutsi “yi-Ultimate Human Race”, ngeLisontfo, mhla tinge-28 Ingci.

src_text: SAPS ntse fuputsa sesosa sa kotsi ena.
tgt_text: Umncitiswano wekugijima walabadvuna wanconywa nguTete Dijana (ngekugijima ema-awa la-5, imizuzu lenge-30, nemizuzwana lenge-38) odzabuka eMahikeng eNyakatfo Nshonalanga kwatsi umsubatsi waseRashiya Alexandra Morozova (ngekugijima ema-awa la-6, imizuzu lenge-47, nemizuzwana lenge-47 ) loncobe umncintiswano wekugijima wabomake.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletsa mofofisi wa teng ya lemetseng haholo ho fola ka potlako  Kgiro.

Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang  Mme Gugulethu Abigail Thimane jwalo ka Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso (DDG): ba keng sa Tekolo le Ntshetsopele Lefapheng la Meralo, Tekolo le Tekolobotjha  Mme Kwena Komape jwalo ka DDG: Ntshetsopele ya Moruo, tsa Kgwebo le Dipapatso Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ditaba tsa Mobu le Ntshetsopele ya Dibaka tsa Mahaeng  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jwalo ka DDG: Ofising ya Naha ya Taolo ya Dikoduwa Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo.
tgt_text: Emavi Ekudvudvuta            IKhabhinethi idlulise emavi endvudvuto emndenini nakubangani:baMake Rita Alice Ndzanga (88),  makadzebona eMzabalazweni futsi alivulandlela lwenyonyana yebasebenti lowaphindze wahlonishwa ngendondo i-National Order of Luthuli nga-2004 “ngesandla lasifakile imphilo yakhe yonkhe ngemshikashika wemalungelo ebasebenti kanye nasekufezekiseni.

src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: TemandlaIKhabhinethi yatiswe nguNgcongcoshe Wetemabhizinisi aHulumende Pravin Gordhan mayelana nemandla a-Eskom ekunciphisa lokucisha-kongiwa kwagezi ngetikhatsi letitsite yaphindze yatfola nembiko wenchubekela phambili lobuya eKomidini Lelithekhnikhali   leliKomidi Lavelonkhe Letinkhinga Temandla.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya fumana tlaleho ho tswa ho Letona la Dikgwebo tsa Mmuso Pravin Gordhan ka mekgwa eo Eskom tlang ho sebedisa ho lwantshana le ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa.
tgt_text: Letinye timemetelo titokwentiwa nasekucedvwe lokucocisana kabanti ngalemibiko.

src_text: Kabinete boetse hape ya fumana le tlaleho ya kgatelo pele mosebetsing wa Komiti ya Naha Shebaneng le Mathata Motlakase..     Ha ditlaleho tsena ka bobedi di se di sekasekilwe ho tla ba teng phatlalatso tla etswa..     Kabinete ikwahlaya haholo ka ditshitiso tse bakwang ke ho tingwa hona ha motlakase dikgwebong le malapeng, haholoholo nakong eo mmuso kenyang tshebetsong matsapa neng phatlalatswe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phupu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise kudvumala ngalokutsikameteka nekungaphatseki kahle lokubangwe ngulokucisha-kongiwa kwagezi kumabhizinisi nakutakhamiti phaca, leyenteka ikakhulukati ngalesikhatsi hulumende abukene netinhlelo tekungenelela letimenyetelwe nguMengameli ngaKholwane.
Lutjalomali.

src_text: Matsete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwemukele kwetfulwa kweNdzawo Lensha Yekukhicita I-Sandvik Khomanani e-Kempton Park, lebeyiyincenye yelutjalomali lwetigidzi letinge-R350 leyatsenjiswa eNgcungcutseleni yesine Yelutjalomali yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAIC) lebeyibanjelwe eSandton Convention Centre eJozi mhla ka-24 iNdlovulenkhulu..  Lesikhungo lesisha lesingemamitha lasikwele lange-62 000 sihlanganisa imisebenti leyayentiwe ngaphambilini etindzaweni letisihlanu letahlukene futsi sihlalisa basebenti lababalelwa ku-.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho thakgolwa ha Sitsi se setjha sa Tlhahiso sa Sandvik Khomanani mane Kempton Park, seo bileng karolo ya ditshepiso tse neng di etswe Sebokeng sa bone sa Matsete sa Afrika Borwa (SAIC) se neng se tshwaretswe Sandton Convention Centre ka la 24 Tlhakubele 2022 sa dimilione tse  .
tgt_text: Ingulesinye setikhungo teSandvik letinkhulu futsi letitfutfuke kakhulu emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele, futsi sinemandla ekukhicita emaloli ekutfwala ematfunjini emhlaba.

src_text: Sitsi sena se setjha se bobatsi ba 62 000m², se kopantse tshebetso ya ditsi tse hlano tse neng di sebeletsa mona nakong fetileng mme se hirile batho ba ka bang.
tgt_text: Tinsimbi tekwakha lemaloli letingetulu kwema-60% titawukhicitwa yiNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Sena ke se seng sa ditsi tse kgolo le tse tswetseng pele tsa Sandvik lefatsheng ka bophara mme se kgona ho hlahisa dipersente tse fetang tse 60 tsa tlhahiso Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yakwamukela kuvakasha kwaMengameli Ramaphosa KwaZulu-Natali ngesikhatsi kwetfulwa sikhungo sekukhicita i-Hesto Harnesses e-Stanger, KwaDukuza mhla ka-13 iNyoni.

src_text: Kabinite boetse ya amohela ho etela ha Mopresidente ho thakgolweng ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa Hesto Harnesses mane Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la 13 Loetse.
tgt_text: Lesikhungo singuleminye yemiklamo lesihlanu yekutjalwa kwetimali lesiyincenye yetigidzigidzi letinge-R.  lkutibophelela kwe-Metair Investments Limited kuze kusekelwe kunwetjwa nekwentiwa kwasekhaya kweFord Ranger lensha.

src_text: Sitsi sena ke se seng sa diprojeke tse hlano tsa matsete tseo leng karolo ya matsete Metair Investments Limited dibilione tse  4 tlo tshehetsa katoloso ya tlhahiso ya mofuta motjha wa koloi ya Ford Ranger.
tgt_text: Mengameli uphindze wahambela kuvulwa kwephrojekthi yekutfutfukisa nekunwetjwa kweSappi Saiccor Mill lebita emabhiliyoni langema-R7,7 eMkomaas, lokuhloswe ngayo kukhulisa emandla kanye nekuncintisana kwenkampani emhlabeni wonkhe kungulapho idala nematfuba emisebenti esikhatsi lesifishane nalesidze.

src_text: Mopresidente ile boela etela le ho bulweng ha khamphane atolotsweng ya ha Sappi Saiccor Mill bitsang dibilione tse R7,7 mane Umkomaas ikemiseditseng ho atolla tlhodisano ya tshebetso ya yona maemong matjhaba ha mmoho le ho eketsa menyetla ya mosebetsi bakeng sa nako kgutshwane le telele..     Matsete ana ke mang ditshepiso tse neng di etswe ke diindasteri tsena ho SAIC.
tgt_text: Lokutjalwa kwetimali kuyincenye yetitsembiso letentiwa bosotimboni e-SAIC.

src_text: Matsete mang le mang matjha naheng ena thusa letsholong la kahobotjha le tsoseletso ya moruo, mme hape tswela pele ho etsa Afrika Borwa sebaka se setle sa ho etsa matsete..     Ntshetsopele ya Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: Lonkhe lutjalomali lolusha lolungena eveni letfu lusita ekwakhiweni kabusha nasekuvuseleleni umnotfo wetfu, futsi luyachubeka nekubeka iNingizimu Afrika njengendzawo yekutjalwa kwetimali lengakhetfwa.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho bulwa ha karolo ntjha ya Mmila wa Ring Road wa Musina mane Limpopo tla bebofatsa kgwebelano ha mmoho le ho tsamaya ha batho Musina le dinaheng tsa boahisane tse ka borwa ho Afrika.
tgt_text: Kutfutfukiswa kwesakhiwonchanti.

src_text: Projeke ena ya dimilione tse R640 thehile mesebetsi ya moshwelella fetang 275 mme ya thehela le dikgwebo tse nyane, tse bohareng le tse kgolo menyetla..     Ho ahwa ha mmila ona wa Musina Ring Road ke karolo ya leano la mmuso la meralo ya motheo tlasa lenaneo la ERRP, leo ka lona ho ikemiseditsweng ho theha le hona ho hodisa menyetla ya mesebetsi setjhabeng ho tswa makaleng fapafapaneng..     Koduwa ya Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kuvulwa kwencenye lensha yeMusina Ring Road eLimpopo lotokwenta kube lula kutsi bantfu bazulazule eMusina, iphindze futsi ivumele nekwandza kwekuhwebelana nemnotfo phakatsi kweNingizimu Afrika kanye nemave Enhlangano Yentfutfuko YaseNingizimu ne-Afrika (i-SADC).

src_text: Kabinete lebisa kutlwelo bohloko ya yona ho malapa ohle lahlehetsweng ke beng ka ona ka lebaka la ho phatloha ha letamo la morafo neng se sa sebediswe wa Jagersfontein mane Foreisitata ka Sontaha sa la 11 Loetse.
tgt_text: Lomklamo lobita tigidzi letingema-R640 udale ematfuba emisebenti esikhatsi lesigcwele langetulu kwema-275 kubantfu bendzawo futsi waniketa ematfuba emiphakatsini yendzawo kanye nakumabhizinisi lamancane, laphakatsi nendzawo nalamancane kakhulu (ema-SMME).

src_text: Koduwa ena sentse meralo mengata ya motheo esitana le matlo le dikoloi tsa batho..     Ketelong ya hae sebakeng sena sa koduwa ka Mantaha wa la 12 Loetse 2022, Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile thoholetsa matsapa neng se entswe ho leka ho thusa sebakeng seo ile ba ikana hore mmuso tla fana ka tshehetso hlokahalang setjhabeng seo sa Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Kwakhiwa kwemgwaco i-Musina Ring Road kuyincenye yeluhlelo lwahulumende lwesakhiwonchanti, ngekusebentisa i-ERRP, lekuhloswe ngayo kudala kukhula lokubandzakanya wonkhe umuntfu nematfuba emisebenti emikhakheni nasemiphakatsini leyehlukene.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ya kgothatswa ke taba ya hore beng ba morafo ona ba ikemiseditse ho tshehetsa mmuso ka tshehetso ya setekginiki haeba ka kotjwa ke Moifo okametseng Dimenerale Afrika Borwa..     Indasteri ya merafo ke le leng la makala nang le seabo se seholo kgolong ya moruo wa naha ena ka ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi, ho romelwa ha thepa dinaheng tsa kantle ha mmoho le ho etsa matsete dinaheng tsa kantle, tseo tsohle tse tswelang batho ba dibaka tsa merafong molemo..     Mmuso le mekgatlo ikemetseng ba ile ba phallela ho thusa mahlatsipa ka dintho tse kang mepheme ya nakwana, ditshebeletso tsa ho thojwa maikutlo le ditlhoko tsa sethatho tse kang dikobo, mealo ha mmoho le dijo.
tgt_text: Inhlekelele yaseJagersfontein.

src_text: Metsi le motlakase le tsona di boetse setlwaeding sebakeng sena..     Ha ho se ho hlwekisitswe sebakeng seo sa koduwa, boratekginiki ba tla hlahloba maemo matlo moo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ayo endvudvuto emindenini yalabo labalahlekelwe timphilo tabo ngemuva kwekuchuma kwelidami leludzaka lelingcolile lemayini yendzawo leshiywe banikati e-Jagersfontein eFreyistati futsi yachitsa ludzaka lolubi ngetitfuba tasekuseni ngeliSontfo, ti-11 INyoni.

src_text: Kabinete leboha ba ditshebeletso tsa tshohanyetso, mekgatlo ya setjhaba le setjhaba ka kakaretso ka ho phallela ka thuso..     Moruo.
tgt_text: Lenhlekelele ishiye sakhiwonchanti salendzawo, timphahla tebantfu njengetimoti kanye nemiti leminingana yonakele kakhulu.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya sekaseka maemo moruo naha ena ho latela dipalopalo tse sa tswa lokollwa ke Lefapha la Dipalopalo (Stats SA) la naha ena tse bontshang ha tlhahiso ya thepa kotareng ya bobedi ya selemo sena theohile ka persente tse 0,7%.
tgt_text: Ngalesikhatsi avakashele lendzawo yenhlekelele ngeMsombuluko, mhla ti-12 INyoni 2022, Mengameli Ramaphosa uvakalise kubonga ngemitamo yekuhlenga nekulungisa leyenteka kulendzawo.

src_text: Hara dintlha tse bakileng phokotseho ena re ka bala ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa, ntwa ya Rashiya le Ukraine ha mmoho le ho nyoloha ha ditjeho tsa bophelo ka kakaretso..     Matsapa ileng etswa ka Lenaneo la Kahobotjha le Tsoseletso ya Moruo ile thusa haholo ho thibella ho lahleha ho hong ha mesebetsi ha mmoho le kgahlamelo mpe ya maemo matjhaba moruong wa rona.
tgt_text: Uphindze watsembisa kutsi hulumende utoniketa ngelusito loludzingekako kubahlali labatsintsekile baseJagersfontein.

src_text: Matsapa ana mmuso bontsha katleho kgolo, mme bopaki ba teng bo bonahetse dipalopalong tsa Kotara tsa Stats SA tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Batho ba Sebetsang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhutsatekile ngekutsi banikati bemayini batsi bakulungele kuniketa lusito loluthekhnikhali kanye nekweseka hulumende uma loko kucelwa nguMkhandlu Wetimbiwa eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Dipalopalo tsena di bontsha ha le batho ba 648 000 ba fumaneng mesebetsi pakeng tsa kotara ya pele le ya bobedi ya selemo sa     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Imboni yetimayini solo ifaka ligalelo lelikhulu emnotfweni ngekucasha ngalokuphelele nekwesikhashana, emaholo laphuma kulamanye emave, kanye nekutjalwa kwetimali lokucondzile kwakulamanye emave, futsi idlala indzima lebalulekile ekwenteni ncono timphilo tebantfu emiphakatsini yetimayini.

src_text: Ho Behwa Leihlo le ho Lekolwa Botjha (M&E) ha Moralo wa Leano la Naha la Batjha (NYP).
tgt_text: Hulumende naletinye tinhlangano letingekho ngaphansi kwahulumende bangenelela ngekusheshisa ngekuniketa indzawo yekuhlala ngekuphutfuma, kwelulekwa kwalabahlukumetekile kanye netidzingo letisisekelo njengetingubo tekulala, bomatilasi nemaphasela ekudla.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana moralo wa M&E mme tla matlafatsa ho behwa leihlo ha ditshiya tsa NYP 2020-.
tgt_text: Kuniketwa kwemanti nagezi kulendzawo sekubuyiselwe.

src_text: Moralo ona na le dipontsho tse hlano tse tsamaisanang le ditshiya tsa NYP.
tgt_text: Nasekususwe lokungcola kulendzawo yenhlekelele bosochwepheshe kulindzeleke kutsi bahlole kwakheka kwetindlu.

src_text: Dipontsho tsena di ile tsa thehwa ka tshebedisano mmoho le bankakarolo ba nang le thahasello tshehetsong le ntshetsopeleng ya batjha naheng ena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge betimo letiphutfumako, tinhlangano temphakatsi kanye nemalunga emphakatsi ngekufaka sandla nelusito lwabo lolukhulu.

src_text: Dintlha tsa teng di tla arolwa ho ya ka dilemo, bonng, maemo ho itekanela, morabe ha mmoho le dibaka..     Ho behwa leihlo hona ho tla etsuwa maemong ohle mmuso ha mmoho le lekaleng le ikemetseng.
tgt_text: Temnotfo.

src_text: Tlaleho ya teng tla bokeletswa jwalo ka kotara mme phatlalatswe habedi ka selemo..     Moralo wa Leano bakeng sa Moralo wa Kopanelo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi idzingidze ngesimo semnotfo welive ngemuva kwekuba tibalo takamuva teLihhovisi Lelubalobalo laseNingizimu Afrika (i-Stats SA) tivete kutsi samba semkhicito wasekhaya (i-GDP) wekota yesibili ya-2022 yehle nga-0,7%.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Moralo wa Leano bakeng sa Moralo wa Kopanelo mmusong oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng ho hlwaya dikgeo tse teng moralong wa ha jwale..     Matsapa ana rerilweng, ka ona ho ikemiseditswe ho shebana le ho hloleha ho etsa meralo maemong ka boraro mmuso.
tgt_text: Tintfo letibe nemtselela kulokwehla tihlanganisa kucisha-kongiwa kwagezi, kungcubutana kweRussia ne-Ukraine, netindleko letisetulu tekuphila nekwehla kwemandla emali.

src_text: Matsapa ana tla tla ka lenaneo le bontshang bopaki le tla beha tshebetso leihlo.
tgt_text: Kungenelela lokwentiwa luHlelo Lwekwakha Kabusha Umnotfo kanye Nekuvuselela (i-ERRP) kuvikela kakhulu lelive etivunguvungwini temave ngemave, futsi kuvikele nemisebenti kanye netindlela tekutiphilisa.

src_text: Leano lena le boetse le tla le leano la tjhebelopele la nako telele bohareng le kgutshwane maemong ohle mmuso..     Sena se tla thusa ho tla le diphetoho melaong ka maikemisetso ho ntlafatsa tshebedisano meralong le tjhebelong pele..     Ho Amohelwa ha Tumellano ya ho Thehwa ha Akgente ya Meriana ya Seafrika (AMA).
tgt_text: Kungenelela kwahulumende lokucinile kutemnotfo sekucala kutsela titselo, njengoba kubonakaliswa miphumela yakamuva yeLuhlololuvo lweKota Lwetisebenti lwe-Stats SA, lolubonise kutsi ingetulu kwema-648 000 imisebenti letfolakele phakatsi kwekota yekucala neyesibili ya-  Tincumo teKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tekenwa ha Tumellano ya ho Thehwa ha AMA le ho tliswa ha yona Palamenteng bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.
tgt_text: Luhlaka Lwekucaphela Nekuhlola (M&E) Lwenchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yelusha (i-NYP).

src_text: Sena se tla thusa ho theha tumellano eo ho neng ho dumellanwe ka yona Palamente ya Dinaha tsa Afrika ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate luhlaka lwe-M&E lolutokwenta kutsi kube nekucaphela ngemphumelelo kanye nekuhlolwa kwemtselela wetinsika te-NYP 2020-.

src_text: Ka tumellano ena, ho tla thehwa AMA bakeng sa kontinente ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Luhlaka luniketa ngetinkhomba letisihlanu letisezingeni lelisetulu letihambisana netinsika te-NYP.

src_text: Akgente ena tla laola meriana yohle ya kontinente ena mme ntlafatse le polokeho le tshebediso ya yona..     Ho tekenwa ha tumellano ena ho tla ntshetsa pele boinehelo ba Afrika Borwa matjhabeng ba ho ntlafatsa ho laolwa ha meriana kontinenteng ena..     Tlaleho Tshebetsong ya Dipatlisiso le Ntshetsong Pele (R&D) ya Lenaneo la Merokotso ya Lekgetho – 2019/20 le 2020/.
tgt_text: Letinkomba tentiwa nalabatsintsekako labafanele labanenshisekelo ekutfutfukisweni nasekuniketeni kwelusha emandla eveni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Lenaneo la R&D la Merokotso ya Lekgetho la dilemo tse pedi tse fetileng (2019/20 le 2020/21).
tgt_text: Kugcogcwa kwemininingwane kutohlukaniswa ngekweminyaka yebudzala, bulili, kukhubateka, ngekwemacembu ebuhlanga kanye nesimo sendzawo salokungenelela.

src_text: Sena se tsamaisana le karoloya bo 11D (17) ya Molao wa Lekgetho, wa 1962 (Molao wa bo 58 wa 1962) bolelang tlhokeho ya ho tliswa ha ditlaleho tsena Palamenteng..     Lenaneo lena la merokotso ya lekgetho le kgothaletsa dikhamphane tse ikemetseng ho tsetela ho R&D le ho tshehetsa kgolo ya matsete.
tgt_text: Lokucaphela kutokwentiwa kuto tonkhe tinhlaka tahulumende, mikhakha kanye netinkampani letitimele.

src_text: Lenaneo lena le tshehetsa ntlafatso ya saense le mahlale kgolong ya moruo le matlafatsong ya tlhodisano..     Kabinete kgotsofetse ka tlaleho ena bontshang dikhamphane tse ntjha tse kentseng dikopo tsa merokotso ya lekgetho.
tgt_text: Imibiko itokhicitwa njalo ngekota futsi ishicilelwe kabili ngemnyaka.

src_text: Sena se kgothaletsa dikhamphane tse ngata ho nka karolo ka maikemisetso ho hodisa matsete tsona le ho matlafatsa kgolo ya moruo..     Dikhamphane tse nne tse ka pele lenaneong lena la merokotso ya lekgetho ke tsa lekala la tlhahiso ya tsa temo, tsa merafo, tsa dikhemikhale, ditlolo, meriana, setekginiki le tsa thekenoloji ya dikhomputara mme Kabinete nkile makala ana la ona ka Sehloohong Leanong la Meralo ya Diindasteri.
tgt_text: Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Yekuhlela Lokudidiyelwe.

src_text: Tlaleho feletseng ka fumaneha ho websaete ya Lefapha la Saense le Mahlale: www.dst.gov.za..     Foramo ya Afrika ya Menyetla ya Kgolo (AGOA) –.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilugunyatile Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Yekuhlela Lokudidiyelwe kuhulumende, loluhlose kubukana namagebe labonakele ekuhleleni incubomgomo eluhlelweni lolukhona manje lwekuhlela.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Foramo ya AGOA ya.
tgt_text: Kungenelela lokuhlongotwako phakatsi kwalokunye kubukana nekubate kwekuhlelwa kwekucondziswa ngekhatsi kwetinhlaka letintsatfu tahulumende.

src_text: AGOA ne thakgolwe ke naha ya Amerika ka selemo sa 2000 ho fana ka tshebedisano ya tsa kgwebo dinaheng tse ka tlase ho lehwatata la Sahara..     Thumello ya thepa ya Afrika Borwa ka tlasa lenaneo la AGOA kenyeletsa ditholwana, matokomane, dikoloi, dikarolwana tsa dikoloi, menerale ya ho etsa tshepe, tshepe le dihlahiswa tsa dikhemikhale.
tgt_text: Kungenelela kutokwetfula indlela yekucaphela lesekelwe ebufakazini.

src_text: Sebaka le letsatsi la seboka seo di tla phatlalatswa ha nako ntse tsamaya..     Seboka sa Matona sa Tlhahlobo ya Lefatshe (GEO) –.
tgt_text: Luhlaka lwenchubomgomo luphindze lwetfule kusho ngembili lokulula ngekuhlela sikhatsi lesidze kuya kulesisemkhatsini nesikhatsi lesifishane kuhulumende wonkhe.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha Seboka sa Matona sa GEO mane Kapa ka.
tgt_text: Itosebentela kwetfula tingucuko temtsetfo kuze kutsi kwentiwe ncono kuhambisana nekusho ngembili ekuhleleni nekucaphela kwahulumende.

src_text: GEO ke mokgatlo wa kopanelo wa mmuso neng thehwe ka selemo sa 2003 ka mora Seboka sa Matjhaba sa Ntshetsopele se neng se tshwarwe ka.
tgt_text: Kugunyatwa KweSivumelwane Sekusungulwa Kwenhlangano Yemitsi Yase-Afrika (i-AMA).

src_text: Lena ke lepatlelo leo dinaha tse fapafapaneng di fanang ka kabelo ya tsona molemong le mong wa ho aha tshebeletso ya GEO..     Ha jwale GEO na le ditho tsa mebuso ya dinaha tse fetang tse 113, mme tse 30 tsa tsona ke tsa mona Afrika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusayinwa kweSivumelwane Sekusungulwa kwe-AMA kanye nekwetfulwa kwaso ePhalamende kuze sigunyatwe.

src_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho se ka sehloohong ho tloha ka selemo sa 2005 mme borasaense ba rona ke karolo ya dipatlisiso tse ngata tse etswang ke GEO..     Mphalane Kgwedi ya Dipalangwang (OTM) –.
tgt_text: Loku kutokwenta kutsi kusebente sivumelwane lesamukelwa yi-African Union Assembly nga-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho thakgolwa ha letsholo la OTM ka Moqebelo wa la 1 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmoho re aha moralo wa motheo wa dipalangwang ntlafatsang maphelo batho.”.
tgt_text: Lesivumelwane sisungula ngalokusemtsetfweni i-AMA yalelivekati.

src_text: Lenaneo la selemo la OTM ke leo ka lona ho hlokomediswang setjhaba ka bohlokwa ba dipalangwang jwalo ka karolo ya kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo.
tgt_text: I-ejensi itolawula imikhicito yetekwelapha, futsi itfutfukise kuphepha nekusebenta ngemphumelelo kwemikhicito yetekwelapha yalelivekati.

src_text: Ho tla ba le diketsahalo tse fapafapaneng mefuteng yohle ya dipalangwang jwalo ka difofane, dikepe, dipalangwang tsa setjhaba ha mmoho le tsa mebila.
tgt_text: Kusayinwa nekucinisekiswa kwalesivumelwane kukhombisa kutibophelela kweNingizimu Afrika kutivumelwane temhlaba jikelele netalelivekati letimayelana nekucinisa imitsetfo yalelivekati lelawula imikhicito yalo yetemphilo.

src_text: Diketsahalo tsena di tla hlokomedisa ka tshireletso le polokeho dipalangweng.
tgt_text: Umbiko Ngekusebenta Kweluhlelo Lwekucwaninga Nekutfutfukisa (i-R&D) Luhlelo Lwekuhlomulisa Intsela - 2019/20 kanye na-2020/.

src_text: Bankakarolo ba tla bontshana le ka diphephetso tse tobaneng le lekala la dipalangwang..     Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho ntlafatsa meralo ya motheo ya dipalangwang, mahaeng le ditoropong ka sepheo sa ho bebofatsa ho thothwa ha batho le thepa..     Kopano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Lenaneo la ho Dudiswa ha Batho.
tgt_text: IKhabinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweluHlelo lwekuhlomulisa intsela ye-R&D eminyakeni lemibili leyengcile (nga-2019/20 na-2020/21).

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha kopano ya UN-HABITAT Johannesburg ka la 16 le la 17 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Loku kuhambisana nesigaba 11D (17) seMtsetfo Wentsela Yemalingena, 1962 (uMtsetfo 58 1962), lodzinga kutsi lemibiko yetfulwe ePhalamende.
Loluhlelo lwekuhlomulisa intsela luhlose kugcugcutela tinkampani letitimele kutsi titjale ku-R&D kuze kugcugcuteleke kukhula kwelutjalomali.

src_text: Lefapha la ho Dudiswa ha Setjhaba ke lona le tla tsamaisa seboka sena sa matsatsi mabedi seo ho sona ho tla tla boradipolotiki, basebeletsi le boradipatlisiso lekaleng lena ho kenyeletsa ditho tsa bohlokwa tseo tla beng le Kemedi ya UN-HABITAT ho tswa Nairobi, Kenya.
tgt_text: Kusita kuchubeka kwesayensi nekucamba lokutokhulisa umnotfo, kuchubekise nekuncintisana.

src_text: Taba tla ba ka sehloohong mona tla ba ho nkuwa ha mehato mabapi le dibaka tsa baipehi le ba mekhukhung..     Sephetho sa dipuisano tsena tla ba ona mokotaba tla theha Moralo wa Matjhaba tla tliswa ho Kopano ya UN-HABITAT ho tla pasiswa ka     Ditshisinyo tsa Melao.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi inetisekile kutsi lombiko ukhombisa kutsi tinkampani letinsha tifake ticelo tekuhlomuliswa ngentsela.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le Tlhekefetso tsa Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) wa.
tgt_text: Loku kugcugcutela letinye tinkampani kufikelela kulesikimu njengencenye lekhulisa lutjalomali igcugcutele kukhula kwemnotfo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa 2021 wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le GBVF bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.
tgt_text: Tinkampani letine letisetulu letifinyelele kulokuhlomula tikumkhakha wekusetjentwa kwemikhicito yetekulima; timayini, emakhemikhali, tekutimonyonga, temakhemisi nete-elekhtrothekhnikhali nemikhakha yethekhnoloji yelwatiso iKhabinethi lekubeke njengalokuphambili KuluHlelo lweNchubomgomo Yekusebenta kuTetimboni.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena tla le moralo wa molao tla thusa ho theha komiti ya molao tla shebana le taba ya GBVF boetse dumella ho thehwa ha Boto tla tla le maano le ho kenya tshebetsong ha Leano la Moralo wa Naha shebaneng le GBVF le neng le tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Mphalane.
tgt_text: Umbiko lophelele uyatfolakala kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko leSayensi nekuCamba letsi: www.dst.gov.za..  Iforamu yeMtsetfo Wekukhula Nematfuba E-Afrika (i-AGOA) –.

src_text: Boto ena tla ba le kemedi ya persente tse 51 ho tswa setjhabeng le tse 49 ho tswa mmusong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusingatfwa kweForamu ye-AGOA nga-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao se phatlaladitswe bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..     Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa.
tgt_text: I-AGOA yagunyatwa yi-United States of America (USA) nga-2000 kuze kutsi inikete litfuba lekuhwebelana emaveni lamanyenti e-sub-Saharan Afrika kanye ne-USA.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa 2018 Palamenteng oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng hore kene sebakeng sa Molao Laolang Kwae wa 1993 (Molao wa bo 83 wa 1993) jwalo ka ha ntlafaditswe..     Ka tshisinyo ena ho ikemiseditswe ho tiisa melawana ya dipetlele tsa mmuso hore ikamahanye le ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle Laolang Kwae nngwe ya dintho tse bolelwang ke tshisinyo ena ke dibaka tseo ho sa tsubelweng ho tsona kantle le ka hara meaho; ho kwalwa ha ho rekiswa ha kwae metjhining ya ho rekisa, le hore kwae be le letshwao la tlhokomediso pakaneng ya yona..     Tshisinyo ena sekasikilwe ke bankakarolo bohle ho kenyeletsa indasteri ya kwae, mekgatlo ya setjhaba ha mmoho le mafapha amehang mmuso     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Kweluhwebo lokutfunyelwako kwaseNingizimu Afrika ngaphansi kwe-AGOA kuhlanganisa titselo letidliwako, emantongomane, timoti, tincenye talokuhanjiswako, insimbi, lokuyinsimbi kanye nemikhicito yemakhemikhali.

src_text: Kopano Tlwaelehileng ya bo 77 ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UNGA77).
tgt_text: Lilanga lelingulonalona nendzawo kusatomenyetelwa.

src_text: Afrika Borwa nka karolo ho UNGA77 tswelang pele ntlokgolo ya Matjhaba Kopaneng mane New York City, USA ho tloha ka la 20 ho isa ho la 27 Loetse 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Nako ya bohlokwa: Tharollo ya diphetoho mathateng rarahaneng”.
tgt_text: INgcungcutsela YaboNgcongcoshe ye-Group on Earth Observations (i-GEO).

src_text: Kgahlamelo ya sewa sa Khorona (COVID-19) dinaheng tseo moruo le bodulo ba teng bo seng maemong bile kgolo ha bapiswa le ya dinaha tse setletseng mme dinaha tsena ha di tlameha ho tlohelwa di sale morao ha re tla tabeng ya kahobotjha le tsoseletso..     Pele ho Ngangisano ya Kopanong eo ya UN, Mongodi Moholo wa UN, Ntate António Guterres tla kopanya seboka se mabapi le “Diphetoho ho tsa Thuto” mme bitse le kopano ya bohlokwa ya Maano Ntshetsopele (di-SDG).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kutsi iNingizimu Afrika isingatse Ingcungcutsela Yabongcongcoshe be-GEO eKapa nga-.

src_text: Dikopano tsena tsa di-SDG ho lebeletswe hore di tle le ditsela tsa ho potlakisa ho kengwa tshebebetsong ha maano..     Letsatsi la Botjhaba.
tgt_text: I-GEO iyinhlangano yabohulumende bemave leyasungulwa nga-2003 ngemuva kweNgcungcutsela Yemhlaba Yentfutfuko Lechubekako yanga-.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya bohlokwa moketeng wa ho keteka Letsatsi la Botjhaba la 2022 mane Union Buildings ka Moqebelo wa la 24 Loetse.
tgt_text: Isebenta njengenkhundla yetive ngetive lapho emave afaka khona sandla ngekutitsandzela emgomweni lofanako wekwakha tinchubo te-GEO.

src_text: Lepetjo la mokete ona ke le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda re Thabela le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa.”.
tgt_text: I-GEO kwanyalo inabohulumende bavelonkhe labangetulu kwema-113, labange-30 kubo babuya e-Afrika kanye netinhlangano letitibandzakanyako letingaba ngema-140, leti-11 tato tibuya e-Afrika.

src_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ena ya Botjhaba tla tsepamisa maikutlo mminong wa setso sa Afrika Borwa haholoholo wa Isicathamiya ha mmoho le kabelo ya ona dipapading, tsa bonono, tsa setso le botjhaba.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibe lilunga lelisebentako leliKomidi Leliphetse kusukela nga-2005 futsi bososayensi betfu njengamanje batibandzakanya etinhlelweni letinyentana telucwaningo letiholwa yi-GEO.

src_text: Ka lepetjo lena ho ikemiseditswe ho keteka dilemo tse 60 sebini le moqapi wa dipina Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962) hlokahetse mme boela tsebisahale ka la Solomon Ntsele, eo leng moqapi wa pina ya, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Imphala Inyanga Yetekutfutsa (i-OTM) –.

src_text: Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kwetfulwa kwemkhankhaso we-OTM ngeMgcibelo, mhla lu-1 Imphala 2022, ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Sishov’ingolovane: ndzawonye sakha sakhiwonchanti kutekutfutsa lesakha siphindze simamise timphilo”.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle mane Thekong ho tloha ka la 12 ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.
tgt_text: I-OTM yeminyaka yonkhe isetjentiselwa kucaphelisa ngetekutfutsa njengalenye yetintfo letibalulekile ekukhuleni kwemnotfo kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwendzawo.

src_text: Mokete ona tla tshwarwa nakong ya OTM moo ka lona ho tlang ho etswa tlhokomediso ka dikepe jwalo ka lekala la dipalangwang.
tgt_text: Kutokwentiwa imisebenti leminyentana kukhombisa imikhakha leyehlukene yesakhiwonchanti setekutfutsa kutekundiza, taselwandle, tekutfutsa umphakatsi kanye nemigwaco.

src_text: Moketeng ona ho tla ba teng le kemedi ho tswa dinaheng tse fapafapaneng ho tla iponela tsa indasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Lemisebenti itophindze icaphelise mayelana netekuphepha netekuvikeleka kutekutfutsa.

src_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Dikepe ho tloha ka selemo sa.
tgt_text: Kutophindze kubanjwe tinkhulumiswano nalabatsintsekako kuze kucociswane ngetinsayeya letehlukene emkhakheni wetekutfutsa.

src_text: Mokgatlo ona ke lekala le laolang tshebetso ya dikepe ho Matjhaba Kopaneng..     Kgwedi ya Bohahlaudi.
tgt_text: Hulumende usatibophelele ekwenteni ncono sakhiwonchanti setekutfutsa selive, etindzaweni tasemaphandleni netasemadolobheni, kuze kube lula kutfutfwa kwetimphahla nebantfu ngendlela lesebentako nalenelisako.

src_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Bohahlaudi (27 Loetse) Kgweding ena ya Bohahlaudi re tlo le keteka ka lepetjo le reng, “Re Nahana Botjha ka Bohahlaudi”.
tgt_text: Umhlangano Wenhlangano Yetive Letihlangene (UN) WeluHlelo Lekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu (UN-HABITAT).

src_text: Tsa bohahlaudi kwano lapeng di bohlokwa bakeng sa kahobotjha ya lekala lena la bohahlaudi le karolo kgolo ya Lekeno la Afrika Borwa ha mmoho le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..     Kabinete thabetse ho ntlafala ha lekala la kamohelo ya baeti le ntlafetseng ka mora sewa sa COVID-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusingatfwa kwemhlangano wemalunga e-UN-HABITAT eJozi mhla ti-16 namhla ti-17 Imphala.

src_text: Halofong ya pele ya 2022, ho bile le maeto lehae dimilione di.
2 leng keketseho ya persente tse 114 ha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang selemong sa.
tgt_text: Litiko Letekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu litocondzanisa lomhlangano wemalanga lamabili lotohanjelwa tingcweti tetembusave, bongoti kanye nebacwaningi, lokufaka emalunga labalulekile eliKomidi Lebameleli Ngalokugcwele Be-UN-HABITAT lelitinte eNairobi, eKenya.

src_text: Sena se bontsha keketseho leha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang ka selemo sa 2019 moo ho bileng le maeto lehae dimilione di.
tgt_text: Tindzaba letibalulekile lokutocociswana ngato tifaka kufuna kungenelela kwetingucuko emikhukhwini kanye nasemijondolo.

src_text: Jwalo ka karolo ya ho keteka Kgwedi ya Bohlaudi, Kabinete kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa hore etele diprofensi tsa bona ka ho fapana..     Kabinete amohetse qeto ya Bofofise ba Belgium ba ho ba le difofane tse tlang Afrika Borwa ka ho otloloha ho qalang kgweding ena (Loetse) leng se tla matlafatsa lekala lena le ho netefatsa taba ya hore Afrika Borwa ke sebaka se setle sa bohahlaudi.
tgt_text: Imiphumela yalokucocisana itoholela ekwetfulweni kweluHlaka Lwekusebenta Lwemhlaba Wonkhe, lolutokwetfulwa eMhlanganweni We-UN-HABITAT kuze kutsi lugunyatwe nga-  IMitsetfosivivinyo.

src_text: Sena se tla kenyeletsa difofane tse tla ya Kapa le Johannesburg jwalo ka beke     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: UMtsetfosivivinyo weMkhandlu Wavelonkhe Wekuhlukunyetwa Ngekwebulili Nekubulawa Kwalabasikati (i-GBVF) wa-.

src_text: Diteboho    Kabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Kenya, ya neng behwa semmuso ka Labobedi la la 13 Loetse 2022, ho latela dikgetho tse se nang morusu tse neng di tshwerwe ka la 9 Phato.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMkhandlu Wavelonkhe WeMtsetfosivivinyo we-GBVF wa-2021 kuze ucutjungulwe.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente, Ntate David Mabuza ne le teng moketeng oo ho emela Mopresidente Ramaphosa, mmuso le setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uniketa luhlaka lwemtsetfo kuze kusungulwe sigungu lesisemtsetfweni lesitoniketa kungenelela lokucondzene ngco nekubukana ne-GBVF.
