src_text: Puo ya Boemo ba Naha (SoNA).
tgt_text: Inkhulumo yaMengameli Yebunjalo BaleLive (i-SoNA).

src_text: Kabinete tobokeditse mantsweng Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa a buileng Puong ya hae ya Boemo ba Naha ya selemo sa 2023 hore Maafrika Borwa kaofela sebedisane, ho se be le ya sallang morao twantshanong le diphephetso tseo naha ena tobaneng le tsona..  Dinthong tseo Mopresidente buileng ha batsi ka tsona boletse hore mmuso behileng mathata motlakase sehlohlolong sa meralo ya ona le ho qeta ho tingwa ha motlakase ke sepheo sa ho baballa le hore ho tle ho be le phepelo tsitsitseng ya motlakase..  Kabinete etsa kgoeletso ho dikarolo tsohle tsa setjhaba ho tshehetsa maano tshetlehilweng ke Mopresidente ho SoNA kenyeletsang haholoholo ho fokotsa leqeme la mesebetsi, bofuma, ditjeho tse hodimo tsa ho phela ha mmoho le botlokotsebe le bobodu..  Mmuso ikemiseditse ho potlakisa mosebetsi oo seng qadilwe wa ho eketsa phepelo ya motlakase mme sa rona ke ho tlosa ditshita tse ka phatsamisang mosebetsi ona..  Dibekeng tse mmalwa tse tlang, makala fapaneng mmuso tla fana ka maano tshebetso selemo sena jwalo ka ha Mopresidente Ramaphosa boletse ho SoNA.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi icinisekise simemo lesikhulu Mengameli President Cyril Ramaphosa lasente eNkhulumeni yakhe yeBunjalo Belive yanga-2023 kutsi bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika basebente ngekubambisana bangashiyi muntfu ngemuva lapho sibukana netinsayeya tentfu letisicindzetelako.

src_text: Puo ya Kabo ya Matlotlo tla tshetlehwa ka Laboraro la la 22 Hlakola 2023, yona tla fana ka dintlha tse eketsehileng maanong ao tshebetso.
tgt_text: Tinyatselo taMengameli letibalulekile tekubeka ludzaba lwagezi embili eluhlelweni lwahulumende lwekusebenta lwemnyaka kutsi kubukwane futsi kuncotjwe cimicimi bese kucinisekiswa kuba khona kwagezi losimeme..   Ikhabhinethi icele yonkhe imikhakha yemmango kutsi yesekele lemitamo levetwe ku-SoNA nguMengameli, indlala kanye nekukhuphuka kwetindleko tekuphila kanye nekulwa nebugebengu nenkhohlakalo.

src_text: Mining Indaba ya Afrika ya Selemo sa.
tgt_text: Hulumende utimisele kuphutfumisa umsebenti lesewuvele wentiwa wekukhulisa umtsamo wagezi kugridi yavelonkhe futsi umsebenti kususa nanoma ngusiphi sihibe senchubelembili.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse sephetho sa Mining Indaba ya Afrika neng tshwaretswe Cape Town International Convention Centre ho tloha ka la 6 ho isa ka la 9 Hlakola 2023, tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Tokollo ya Matsete Afrika Merafo: Botsitso, Tshireletso le Phepelo”.
tgt_text: Kulamaviki letako, tingcoco teticheme titawuniketa lwatiso lolubanti mayelana neLuhlelo Lwekusebenta lwahulumende (i-PoA) yalomnyaka lotako, njengobe Mengameli Ramaphosa akugcamisile ku-SoNA.

src_text: Mining Indaba ena ya Afrika ile ya kopanya bankakarolo ba fapafapaneng indastering ena kontinenteng ena esitana le matjhabeng, mme ya ipabola ka ho ba seboka se pele sa matsete ho tsa merafo kontinenteng ena.
tgt_text: Sabelomali Savelonkhe lesitawetfulwa ngaLesitsatfu, mhla tinge-22 Indlovana 2023 sitawuniketa lolunye lwatiso mayelana ne-PoA.

src_text: Merafo ntse tswelapele ho bapala karolo pele ho tsa ntshetsopele le diindasteri ho phatlalla le kontinente ena.
tgt_text: Ingcungcutsela Yetimayini Evenikati i-Afrika yanga-.

src_text: Merafo bapala karolo kgolo paballong le ho theheng menyetla ya mesebetsi eo re ka balang palo batlang finyella ho halofo ya milione fumanweng lekaleng lena ka ho otloloha le batlang finyella ho milione amanang feela le lekala lena mona Afrika Borwa..  Tlhahiso ya lekala la merafo ngwahola mona Afrika Borwa eketsehile ya fihla tjheleteng ballwang ho  18 trilione leng se ileng sa tshehetsa tlhahiso ya thepa ya naha ena, thepa romelwang matjhabeng esitana le lekeno la naha.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyinakile imiphumela yeNgcungcutsela Yetimayini Evenikati i-Afrika lebeyibanjelwe e-International Convention Centre eKapa kusukela mhla ti-6 kuya kumhla ti-9 Indlovana 2023 ngaphasi kwendzikimba letsi:“Kuvula Lutjalomali Lwetimayini Lwase-Afrika: Lutinto, Kuvikeleka kanye Nekuphakela”.

src_text: Kabinete etsa kgoeletso ho bankakarolo bohle indastering ena ho tswela pele ho sebedisana le mmuso ho tshehetsa indastering ena boemong ba matjhaba kgonang ho nyolla maemo moruo, ho theha mesebetsi le ho fana ka ntshetso pele tsitsitseng..  Dikgohola.
tgt_text: Ingcungcutsela Yetimayini Evenikati i-Afrika ihlanganise badlali betimboni labavela kulo lonkhe lelivekati kanye nakumhlaba wonkhe, yaphindze futsi yacinisa indzawo yayo njengengcungcutsela lehamba embili yekutjalwa kwetimali kutetimayini kulelivekati.

src_text: Kabinete fetisa matshidiso yona malapeng ohle lahlehetsweng ke ditho tsa ona ka lebaka la dikgohola tse etsahetseng dibakeng tse fapafapaneng naheng ena..  Re leboha lekala la rona la ditshebeletso tsa tshohanyetso le pholoso naheng ena ka bophara ka ho sebetsa ka thata ho pholosa maphelo.
tgt_text: Tetimayini tiyachubeka nekudlala indzima lebaluleke kakhulu ekutfutfukisweni nasekutfutfukisweni kwetimboni kulo lonkhe lelivekati.

src_text: Ha re kopaneng re le naha mme re thuseng bohle ba hlokang tshehetso le tlhokomelo..  Kabinete etsa boipiletso ho batho hore ba dule ka matlung ha pula na ka matla le ka sefefo, mme hape hopotsa ba dulang dibakeng tse dikoting hore ba dule ba ntshitse mahlo dinameng..  Batho ba hlokomediswa hore ba se tshele, ba se sese kapa hona ho tshedisa dikoloi metsing phallang ka matla, mebileng kwahetsweng ke metsi, dinokeng le marokgong tletseng metsi..  Tshebediso Bohlaswa ya Dithunya.
tgt_text: Tingumfakigalelo lobalulekile ekwakheni ematfuba emsebenti, takha ematfuba emisebenti-ngco lecishe ibe yihhafu yesigidzi nemisebenti lengakacondzi-ngco lecishe ibe sigidzi lapha eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete fetisetsa matshidiso yona lelapeng le metswalleng ya sebini sa mmino wa hip-hop Ntate Kiernan Forbes, ya neng tumme ka la AKA, mmoho le sephehi se tummeng Ntate Tebello Motsoane, ba sa tswa thunngwa mane Thekong..  Kabinete boetsa lebisa mantswe kutlwelobohloko lelapeng le metswalleng ya molwantshi wa botlokotsebe Ntate Ayob Mungalee, ya sa tswa thunngwa mane Eldorado Park, Johannesburg ne le molaodi wa mokgatlo bitswang People Seeking Justice Action Group leng mokgatlo wa setjhaba lwantshanang le maqulwana le thekiso ya dithethefatsi..  Kabinete lebisa matshidiso yona malapeng le metswalleng ya batho ba sa tswa thunngwa ka bongata Kapa Bophirima, KwaZulu-Natal le Kapa Botjhabela.
tgt_text: Umkhicito wetetimayini lapha eNingizimu Afrika kulomnyaka lophelile kulinani lelisetulu lemathriliyoni la-R. 18, lokukhulise samba semkhicito wasekhaya (i-GDP), imikhicito letsengiselwa lamanye emave kanye nemalingena.

src_text: Dipolao tsena tse sehloho tse ntseng di fuphutswa ke ba qobellang molao di bontsha ka moo tshebediso bohlaswa ya dithunya phahameng ka teng setjhabeng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi imema bonkhe badlalindzima kulemboni kutsi bachubeke nekusebentisana nahulumende kute kutsi kwakheke imboni yetetimayini lecudzelanako lefukula kukhula kwemnoto, yakhe ematfuba emisebenti kanye nekuchuba  intfutfuko lesimeme.

src_text: Kabinete rata ho netefaletsa Maafrika Borwa hore Sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa se matlafaditswe le ho tiisa twantsho ya bonokwane.
tgt_text: Tikhukhula.

src_text: Sena se kenyeletsa ho jalwa ha sepolesa diterateng le ho theha dihlopha tse tla tobana le mefuta itseng ya bonokwane.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ayo ekulilela imindeni leshonelwe tihlobo tayo kuletikhukhula letimbi letisandza kuba khona etincenyeni letinyenti talelive..   Sibonga betinsita tetfu tekuphalala bakulo lonkhe lelive labasebente ngekutikhandla kute basindzise bantfu.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla boela sebedisa le mekgwa meng ikgethileng tla thusa ho hlwaya le ho tobana le dibaka tseo bonokwane bo etsahalang haholo ho tsona..  Sepolesa sa rona se tiisa letsholo la sona la ho qeta dithunya le diqhomane tse seng molaong matsohong dinokwane.
tgt_text: Asibambisaneni sisive sisite laba labadzinga kakhulu kunakekelwa nekwesekelwa.

src_text: Dikgweding tse 12 tse fetileng, sepolesa se kgonne ho hapa dithunya tse ka bang 65 519 tse seng molaong..  Mmuso etsa kgoeletso ho setjhaba le mekgatlo yohle ya setjhaba ho sebedisana le sepolesa se haufi ho lwantsha botlokotsebe setjhabeng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi incuse bantfu kutsi bahlale ekhaya uma kuna timvula letinamandla nakanye uma kunesiphepho, iphindze yakhumbuta labo labahlala etindzaweni letiphasi kutsi bacaphelisise..   Bantfu bacasheliswa kutsi bangahambi ngetinyawo, bangabhukushi noma-ke bangahambi ngetimoto emantini etikhukhula lageleta ngemandla futsi bangayeweli imigwaco, emabhuloho kanye nemifula legcwele.

src_text: Haeba na le tsebo ya diketso tsa botlokotsebe ka tlalehela sepolesa nomorong ya 0800. .
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi incuse ummango kutsi ucinisekise kutsi bantfwana bahlala ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi baphephile ekuncwileni ngetikhatsi tetikhukhula..   Budlova betibhamu.

src_text: Mmasepala wa Lehae wa Enoch Mgijima (EMLM).
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ayo ekulilela umndeni nebangani beliciko le-hip-hop uMnu.

src_text: Letona la Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Marena, Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, le la Matlotlo, Enoch Godongwana, ba ile ba tlalehela Kabinete ka kopano ya bankakarolo ba bohlokwa ho EMLM.
tgt_text: Kiernan Forbes, lobekadvume ngelekutsi ngu-AKA, kanye nasowatiwako ongumpheki uMnu.

src_text: Ka Mmesa 2022, Kabinete ne tjhaele monwana taba ya ho kenella ho EMLM ho ya ka Karolo ya bo 139(7) ya Molaotheo wa Naha wa 1996 kopantswe le Karolo ya bo 150 ya Molao Laolang Matlotlo Bommasepala wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).
tgt_text: Tebello Motsoane, labasandza kudutjulwa bashona eThekwini..   Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yavakalisa kuvelana nemindeni nebangani besishikashiki lesilwa nebugebengu uMnu.

src_text: Mmasepala ona ne aparetswe ke mathata ditjhelete le phano ya ditshebeletso pele matona ana kenella..  Kabinete thabetse ho hlwauwa ha mathata teng ho mmasepala ona mme netefaletsa badudi ba mmasepaleng ona hore ba tla tsebiswa ka se tla etsahala haufinyane..  Polokeho Dikolong.
tgt_text: Ayob Mungalee, losandza kudutjulwa washona e-Eldorado Park eJozi.

src_text: Polokeho dikolong ke ntho ya bohlokwa mmusong wa Afrika Borwa mme taba ya merusu ya barutwana dikolong ke ngongorehisang haholo..  Leha Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le na le maano ho lwantsha mathata ana, batswadi le bahlokomedi le bona ba tlameha ho sebedisana le batsamaisi ba dikolo le baithuti ho netefatsa hore dikolo tsa rona ba dibaka tsa polokeho bakeng sa baithuti le ntshetso pele ya bona.
tgt_text: Bekangumcondzisi wavelonkhe we-People Seeking Justice Action Group, umbutfo lobuhlanganisa emalunga emmango kutsi alwe nebugebengu lobuchutjwa ngemacembu ebugebengu kanye nekusetjentiswa kwetidzakamiva..   Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ekulilela nekudvudvuta imindeni nebangani balabo labasandza kubulawa etigamekweni tekudubulana kwebantfu labanyenti eNyakatfo Kapa, eKwaZulu-Natal naseMphumalanga Kapa.

src_text: Polokeho ya matitjhere rona dikolong le yona ke taba ya bohlokwa haholo..  Polokeho Mebileng.
tgt_text: Lokuhlasela lokunelunya kangaka nalokungenaluvelo, lokuphenywa baphenyi betemtsetfo, kugcamisa kubhebhetseka kwebudlova betibhamu kanye nemtselela wako lomubi emimangweni yetfu.

src_text: Kabinete ngongorehiswa ke dikotsi tse nyarosang mebileng ya naha ena.

Mmuso lohotha melao metjha tla qeta dikotsi tsa dilori ho kenyeletsa ho tlosa ho thothwa ha thepa diloring ho iswa ditereneng ka kgopolo ya ho fokotsa tshubuhlellano mebileng..  Kabinete etsa boipiletso ho bakganni bohle ho ikobela melao ya tsela, ho ba sedi esitana le ho mamellana mebileng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi icinisekisa bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi Luphiko Lwetemisebenti Yemaphoyisa LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAPS) kungunyalo luyaciniswa kute luvikele bugebengu.

src_text: Dikotsi tse ngata mebileng ya rona di bakwa ke ba kgannang ba tahilwe, ba le tlasa tshusumetso ya dithethefatsi, ho kganna bohlaswa esitana le ho kganna ka lebelo le hodimo  Tshisinyo ya Melao.
tgt_text: Loku kufaka ekhatsi kubekwa kwemaphoyisa lamanengi emigwacweni nekusungula ematsimba lakhetsekile latawugcila etihlotjeni letitsite tebugebengu.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Taolo ya Madiboho (OSBP) ya.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika futsi itawusebentisa tindlela letisuselwe kulwati loluvela kulucwaningo kutfola nekucondza-ngco tindzawo letihamba embili ngekuba nebugebengu..   I-SAPS icinisa kusebenta kwayo kutfola nekwemuka tigebengu tibhamu netinhlavu tato letingekho emtsetfweni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa OSBP bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Kuletinyanga leti-12 letendlulile emaphoyisa atsatse ulomphela tibhamu letingekho emtsetfweni leti-65.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena latela ho tjhaelwa monwana ha leano la OSBP ha mmoho le ho kengwa ha lona tshebetsong ka Tlhakubele.

Maikemisetso lona ke ho kopanya taolo ya ho tshela ha batho le thepa madiboho Afrika Borwa le dinaha tsa boahisane..  Mohato ona tla fokotsa tshubuhlellano ya bahahlaudi le barekisi madibohong rona mmileng.
tgt_text: Hulumende umema tonkhe takhamuti netinhlangano temmango kutsi basebentisane ne-SAPS yabo yendzawo kucedza bugebengu emimangweni yabo.

src_text: Mehato ena ke ya bohlokwa matsapeng mmuso ho theha Tumellano ya ho Hwebisana ha Dikgwebo tsa Dinaha tsa Kontinenteng ya Afrika Ntle le Ditshita (AfCFTA)..  Ditumellano tse boletsweng Tshisinyong ena di tla thusa ho potlakisa ho laola ho feta ha thepa, batho le dikoloi madibohong.
tgt_text: Uma ngabe unelwatiso lolungasita ludzalule bantfu lababandzakanyeka etentweni tebugebengu, shayela inombolo ye-Crime Stop ku-0800.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena boetse ikamahantse le melao ya matjhaba laolang ho tsamaya ha batho le thepa bakeng sa kgwebo..  Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Boitsebiso le ho Ngodiswa ha Batho ya.
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Boitsebiso le ho Ngodiswa ha Batho ya 2022 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Masipala Wendzawo I-Enoch Mgijima (i-EMLM).

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya Molao dumella ho kengwa tshebetsong ha leano la Taolo ya Boitsebiso eo ka yona ho ikemiseditsweng ho ba le mokgwa le mong wa dijithale wa ho ngodisa batho ba dulang naheng ena kapa ba kileng ba dula ho yona..  Tshisinyo ena tla thusa ho tseba palo ya batho ba teng naheng ena le ba nang le boahi bo feletseng ba kwano tla boela hape thusa ho laola palo ya batho ba kopileng bodulo ba nakwana naheng ena tla boela dumella le ho sebediswa ha Mokgwa Ikgethileng wa ho Sebedisa Dikarolo tsa Mmele ya Batho ho Bona Boitsebiso ba Bona (NIS) tla thusa ho fumana dintlha tsa motho eo dintlha tsa hae di fanweng ka ho nehelana ka tsona lenaneong la ho boloka dintlha tsa baahi lenaneong la ho boloka dintlha tsa boitsebiso..  Mokgwa ona wa NIS tla tsamaisana le tsela ya boitsebiso sebediswang ke makala mmuso le ikemetseng..  Ka bobedi Tshisinyo ya OSBP ya 2022 le ya Boitsebiso le ho Ngodiswa ha Batho ya 2022, di tla phatlalatswa ho websaete ya Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Lehae: www.dha.gov.za.
tgt_text: Indvuna yeTekubusa Ngekubambisana Netendzabuko Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma akanye neNdvuna yeTetimali Enoch Godongwana batise Ikhabhinethi ngetingcoco letisandza kubanjwa nebadlalindzima nalabatsintsekako abakhulu e-EMLM.

src_text: Setjhaba se kgothaletswa ho romela maikutlo ngotsweng fatshe atereseng ena: The Director-General of Home Affairs, Private Bag X114, Pretoria,.
tgt_text: NgaMabasa 2022, Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungenelela e-EMLM ngekwembandzela weSigaba se-139(7) weMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yeNingizimu Afrika yanga-1996, lofundvwa kanye neSigaba se-150 seMtsetfo Wetekulawulwa Kwetimali Tamasipala, wanga-2003 (Umtsetfo we-56 wanga-2003).

src_text: Mohala: 012 406  Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Le-EMLM beyiloku ihlangabetana nekufadabala lokukhulu kwetetimali nekwetfulwa kwetinsita sikhatsi lesidze ngembi kwelungenelelo..   Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kubonga kwayo mayelana naletinkinga letinkhulu letikhonjwe badlalindzima futsi seyicinisekise bahlali base-EMLM masinyane-nje batawatiswa ngesincumo lesitsetfwe mayelana nekulungiswa kwaletinsayeya tamasipala letikhona kwanyalo..   Tekuphepha etikolweni.

src_text: Seboka sa Dinaha tsa Afrika (AU).
tgt_text: Tekuphepha etikolweni taseNingizimu Afrika kusachubeka nekubekwa embili kuhulumende futsi nemibiko yebudlova emkhatsini webafundzi nebafundzisi kuyintfo lebanga kukhatsateka lokukhulu.

src_text: Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa tla ya sebokeng sa bo 36 sa Dihlooho tsa Dinaha tsa Afrika se tla ba ka la 18 ho ya ho 19 Hlakola 2023 mane Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
tgt_text: Nanoma-nje Litiko Letemfundvo Lesisekelo limise ngemumo tindlela tekulwa nalesihlava, kusibopho sebatali nababheki bebantfwana kutsi basebentisane netiphatsimandla tetikolwa kanye nebafundzi kucinisekisa kutsi tikolwa tihlala titindzawo letiphephile lapho bafundzi betfu batitfutfukisa khona baphindze futsi babe takhamuti leticotfo.

src_text: Seboka sena sa AU se tla tshwarwa tlasa lepetjo le reng “Re potlakisa ho Kengwa Tshebetsong ha AfCFTA”, mme pele ho sona ho tla qalwa ka sa Lekgotla le Ikgethileng sa bo 42 ka la 15 le la 16 Hlakola.
tgt_text: Kuphepha kwabothishela betfu etikolweni nako kubaluleke kakhulu.

src_text: Baetapele ba dinaha ha mmoho le Mmuso wa AU ba tla sebedisa lepetjo lena ho itlama ho kenya leano lena la AfCFTA tshebetsong..  Ketelo ya Semmuso ya Mopresidente wa Uganda.
tgt_text: Kuphepha emigwacweni.

src_text: Mopresidente Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa Uganda tla etela Afrika Borwa semmuso ka Labobedi la la 28 Hlakola 2023 ho latela memo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyachubeka nekukhatsateka ngekukhuphuka kwelizinga lekufa kwebantfu emigwacweni yakulo lonkhe lelive.

src_text: Maikemisetso ketelo ena ke ho tiisa tshebedisano pakeng tsa dinaha tsena tse pedi..  Dikgau tsa Boqolotsi tsa Mokgatlo wa Ntshetsopele ya Dinaha tse ka Borwa ho Afrika (SADC) tsa.
tgt_text: Hulumende utawehlwaya imitsetfo lemisha yekucedza tingoti temaloli, munye wayo ufaka ekhatsi kususa kutsi imphahla itfutswe ngemaloli kodvwa itfutswe ngesitimela, ngelitsemba lekutsi loku kutawuhhamula incindzetelo yekuhambisa imphahla ngemgwaco.

src_text: Kabinete hopotsa baqolotsi bohle hore dikenelo tsa Dikgau tsa Boqolotsi tsa SADC tsa 2023 tse tla kwalwa ka Labobedi la la 28 Hlakola 2023, di buletswe baqolotsi bohle ba dinaha tsa SADC..  Dikgau tsena tsa Boqolotsi di na le dikarolo tsa ba dingolwa, ditshwantsho, theleveshene le diyalemoya.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi incusa bonkhe basebentisi bemigwaco kutsi batfobele imitsetfo yemgwaco ngekutsi bacilike, bacabangele baphindze futsi babeketelelane.

src_text: Ho tsona ho shebilwe haholo tsela eo ho tlalehwang ditaba tse mabapi le sedika sena sa SADC  Diteboho.
tgt_text: Bashayeli labashayela sebanatse tjwala noma tidzakamiva kanye nekushayela lokungakhatsali nalokunganakekeli, kufaka ekhatsi kushayela ngelitubane lelikhulu, ngiko lokubangela tingoti temgwaco letinyenti   Imitsetfosivivinyo.

src_text: Kabinete lebisa ditebo le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: • Nomcebo Zikode, Zakes Bantwini le Wouter Kellerman ka ho hapa kgau ya matjhaba ka pina ya bona, Bayethe, Dikgaung tsa bo 65 tsa Grammy tsa Selemo le Selemo  Matshidiso Kabinete fetisetsa matshediso yona ho malapa le metswalle ya: • Batho ba ileng ba hlokahala kotsing ya bese le koloi tsamaisang tjhelete mmileng moholo wa N1 mane Limpopo.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekusetjentiswa Kwemnyele Lowodvwa(i-OSBP) wanga-.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletsa mahlatsipa ho fola ka pele.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi ummango uphawule ngeMtsetfosivivinyo we-OSBP.

src_text: • John Moeti (56), sebapadi sa mehleng sa Bafana Bafana le Orlando Pirates eo neng le karolo ya sehlopha se neng se hape Mohope wa Dinaha tsa Afrika ka.
tgt_text: Lomtsetfosivivinyo ulandzela kuvunywa kweNchubomgomo ye-OSBP kanye nekucala kwayo kusetjentiswa ngeNdlovulenkhulu.

src_text: • Kabinete boetse lebisa matshidiso yona mmusong le setjhabeng sa naha ya Türkiye le ya Syria moo ho hlokahetseng batho ba bangata, ha lemala le meralo ya motheo ka lebaka la ho reketla ha lefatshe ho neng ho etsahale ka la 6 Hlakola 2023 ho ballwang ho.
tgt_text: Uhlose kutsi kube nekuhleleka kahle kuhamba kwebantfu nekuhanjiswa kwemphahla emkhatsini wematubuko ekungena eNingizimu Afrika kanye nasemaveni labomakhelwane bayo..   Loku kutawuhhamula lesiminyeminye lesikhona kwanyalo ematubukweni etfu ekungena nekuphuma bahambi nebahwebi.

src_text: 8 sekaleng sa Richter.
tgt_text: Letingenelelo tiphindze futsi tibe nguletibalulekile emitameni yalelive ekuchubekiseleni embili Sivumelwane Sendzawo Yeluhwebelana Ngalokukhulekile Kulelivekati Lase-Afrika (i-AfCFTA)..   Letivumelwane letilindzelwe kuloMtsetfosivivinyo titawucinisekisa kutsi kucutjungulwa kwemphahla, timoto kanye nebantfu kute tihibe kantsi futsi kuyashesha.

src_text: Re utlwela bohloko bohle ba lahlehetsweng ke beng ka bona le ba ntseng ba batlana le bona.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uphendvula tindlela temtsetfo temave emhlaba letifanele letiphatselene tekuchutjwa kweluhwebo kanye nekuhamba kwebantfu nekuhanjiswa kwemphahla.

src_text: Kabinete leboha mekgatlo ya Afrika Borwa ya thuso ya setjhaba ka ho kenya letsoho koduweng ena.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekulawula Nekubhalisa Buwena Wavelonkhe wanga-.

src_text: Kabinete boetse thoholetsa le mong wa Sehlopha sa K-9 sa Mapolesa Afrika Borwa ka thuso ya hae entseng hore ho fumanehe nkgono ya dilemo di 80 ntse phela tlasa malwanglahla ao ka mora matsatsi robedi mane Türkiye  KgiroPele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekulawula Nekubhalisa Buwena Wavelonkhe wanga-2022 kute kutsi ummango uphawule ngawo.

src_text: Mme Azola Mayekiso Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong (CEO) wa Koporasi ya Naha ya Tshehetso ya Ditjhelete tsa ho Reka Matlo..  Ntate Lucas Thabiso Thiti Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso (DDG): Ntshetsopele le Tshehetso ya Lefapha Lefapheng la Toka le Ntshetsopele ya Molaotheo..  Mme Boitumelo Mosako Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong (CEO) wa Banka ya Ntshetsopele ya Afrika ka Borwa..  Ntate Kabelo Rikhotso Molaodi Moholo wa Boto ya Koporasi ya Matsete Mmuso..  Ntate Matsemela Moloi Motsamaisi wa Akgente ya Ditlolo tsa Molao Mebileng..  Moatevokate Sonwabile Mancotywa Molaodi le Modulasetulo wa Boto ya Dipalangwang tsa Maeto Parolang Madibohong.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo unika Inchubomgomo Yekulawula Buwena Ngekwemtsetfo emandla uphindze futsi uhlose kwenta kutsi kube nenchubo yinye, lefaka konkhe ekhatsi futsi lehlanganisiwe ledijithali yekutatisa kwavelonkhe..   LoMtsetfosivivinyo loluhlaka wenta kutsi kube nekuhlanganiswa nekugcinwa kwerejista yetakhamuti nebahlali balomphelo.

src_text: Issues In The Environment.
tgt_text: Issues In The Environment.

src_text: 2023 Budget Speech.
tgt_text: 2023 Budget Speech.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the 2023 National Budget giving effect to critical interventions outlined by President Cyril Ramaphosa’s State of the Nation Address.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the 2023 National Budget giving effect to critical interventions outlined by President Cyril Ramaphosa’s State of the Nation Address.

src_text: The Speech detailed plans to tackle the energy challenge, reduce unemployment, poverty and the rising cost of living, including combating crime and corruption.
tgt_text: The Speech detailed plans to tackle the energy challenge, reduce unemployment, poverty and the rising cost of living, including combating crime and corruption.

src_text: While balancing our commitments to fiscal discipline, the economic growth and investment and the social wage continues to receive the bulk of public resources, with R66 billion allocated to Social Development and R36 billion to fund the extension of the COVID-19 social relief of distress grant until 31 March..
tgt_text: While balancing our commitments to fiscal discipline, the economic growth and investment and the social wage continues to receive the bulk of public resources, with R66 billion allocated to Social Development and R36 billion to fund the extension of the COVID-19 social relief of distress grant until 31 March..

src_text: Furthermore, the increased allocations for all three spheres of government will help alleviate some of the financial pressures, particularly in health, education, and free basic services where the costs of providing services are rising.
tgt_text: Furthermore, the increased allocations for all three spheres of government will help alleviate some of the financial pressures, particularly in health, education, and free basic services where the costs of providing services are rising.

src_text: Quarterly Labour Force Survey.
tgt_text: Quarterly Labour Force Survey.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the Stats SA Quarterly Labour Force survey for fourth quarter of 2022, which showed slight but significant decrease in the rate of unemployment in the country.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the Stats SA Quarterly Labour Force survey for fourth quarter of 2022, which showed slight but significant decrease in the rate of unemployment in the country.

src_text: The official rate decreased by.
tgt_text: The official rate decreased by.

src_text: 2 per cent from.
tgt_text: 2 per cent from.

src_text: 9% to.
tgt_text: 9% to.

src_text: 7 per cent..  All sectors of society are called to drive job creation opportunities so that we can continue the downward trend in the unemployment rate as recorded over the last three quarters.
tgt_text: 7 per cent..  All sectors of society are called to drive job creation opportunities so that we can continue the downward trend in the unemployment rate as recorded over the last three quarters.

src_text: Through our collective effort, we can break the stubborn cycle of unemployment in our nation..  Government remains committed to the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP), which includes our mass public employment programme and efforts to support economic growth that bolsters employment after the devastation of COVID-.
tgt_text: Through our collective effort, we can break the stubborn cycle of unemployment in our nation..  Government remains committed to the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP), which includes our mass public employment programme and efforts to support economic growth that bolsters employment after the devastation of COVID-.

src_text: Deputy President.
tgt_text: Deputy President.

src_text: Cabinet confirms that Deputy President David Mabuza has resigned as Member of Parliament, ending his term as Deputy President of the country.
tgt_text: Cabinet confirms that Deputy President David Mabuza has resigned as Member of Parliament, ending his term as Deputy President of the country.

src_text: Cabinet joined President Cyril Ramaphosa in thanking him for his exceptional service to the country over the last five years.
tgt_text: Cabinet joined President Cyril Ramaphosa in thanking him for his exceptional service to the country over the last five years.

src_text: Deputy President Mabuza served with distinction and his contribution in building the country we want will forever be remembered by the people of South Africa.
tgt_text: Deputy President Mabuza served with distinction and his contribution in building the country we want will forever be remembered by the people of South Africa.

src_text: Energy.
tgt_text: Energy.

src_text: Cabinet understands the frustration of citizens and businesses over the inconvenience and disruptions caused by persistent load shedding.
tgt_text: Cabinet understands the frustration of citizens and businesses over the inconvenience and disruptions caused by persistent load shedding.

src_text: The commitments from the State of Nation Address and the Budget allocations strengthen the capability of the state to fast track interventions outlined in the Energy Action Plan.
tgt_text: The commitments from the State of Nation Address and the Budget allocations strengthen the capability of the state to fast track interventions outlined in the Energy Action Plan.

src_text: The recently published National State of Disaster regulations by the Minister of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs allows government to respond more effectively and with the necessary pace to deal with the severe electricity supply constraints.
tgt_text: The recently published National State of Disaster regulations by the Minister of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs allows government to respond more effectively and with the necessary pace to deal with the severe electricity supply constraints.

src_text: Moreover, it ensures transparency and accountability by enabling departments to guide their sectors.
tgt_text: Moreover, it ensures transparency and accountability by enabling departments to guide their sectors.

src_text: Regular progress updates will be provided.
tgt_text: Regular progress updates will be provided.

src_text: The debt relief of R254 billion, subject to strict conditions will relieve extreme pressure on Eskom and enable it to undertake necessary investment and maintenance.
tgt_text: The debt relief of R254 billion, subject to strict conditions will relieve extreme pressure on Eskom and enable it to undertake necessary investment and maintenance.

src_text: Tax incentives to rollout rooftop solar panels, not only assist households and businesses in generating electricity for their own use but also supports the national grid.
tgt_text: Tax incentives to rollout rooftop solar panels, not only assist households and businesses in generating electricity for their own use but also supports the national grid.

src_text: Under the expanded incentives for businesses, investments in renewable energy will allow businesses to claim 125 per cent deduction in the first year for all renewable energy projects, with no thresholds on generation capacity.
tgt_text: Under the expanded incentives for businesses, investments in renewable energy will allow businesses to claim 125 per cent deduction in the first year for all renewable energy projects, with no thresholds on generation capacity.

src_text: Wage Negotiations.
tgt_text: Wage Negotiations.

src_text: Cabinet calls upon all parties to remain committed to the process of the Public Service Co-Ordinating Bargaining Council Collective Agreement, and to arrive at solution that serves the best interests of the country..
tgt_text: Cabinet calls upon all parties to remain committed to the process of the Public Service Co-Ordinating Bargaining Council Collective Agreement, and to arrive at solution that serves the best interests of the country..

src_text: It is vitally important that we all work together for the good of our nation and her people.
tgt_text: It is vitally important that we all work together for the good of our nation and her people.

src_text: While the right to strike is protected, it must be done in responsible manner that upholds our democracy and rule of law.
tgt_text: While the right to strike is protected, it must be done in responsible manner that upholds our democracy and rule of law.

src_text: Cabinet reminds everyone that those who are planning to strike must do so in peaceful manner, and should refrain from any form of intimidation and destruction of infrastructure and properties..  Anti-Corruption.
tgt_text: Cabinet reminds everyone that those who are planning to strike must do so in peaceful manner, and should refrain from any form of intimidation and destruction of infrastructure and properties..  Anti-Corruption.

src_text: Cabinet joins President Cyril Ramaphosa in his call to the former Eskom CEO Andre de Ruyter to report allegations of corruption at Eskom to the police.
tgt_text: Cabinet joins President Cyril Ramaphosa in his call to the former Eskom CEO Andre de Ruyter to report allegations of corruption at Eskom to the police.

src_text: Our crime fighting institutions stand ready to arrest, and prosecute those who break the law.
tgt_text: Our crime fighting institutions stand ready to arrest, and prosecute those who break the law.

src_text: We call on anyone with information related to crime and corruption to report what they know to the relevant law enforcement authorities.
tgt_text: We call on anyone with information related to crime and corruption to report what they know to the relevant law enforcement authorities.

src_text: All of us are duty bound to fight corruption and to the prescripts of the Prevention and Combating of Corrupt Activities Act, which requires people in “positions of authority” in the public and private sectors to report, all corrupt activities.
tgt_text: All of us are duty bound to fight corruption and to the prescripts of the Prevention and Combating of Corrupt Activities Act, which requires people in “positions of authority” in the public and private sectors to report, all corrupt activities.

src_text: Financial Action Task Force (FATF).
tgt_text: Financial Action Task Force (FATF).

src_text: Cabinet noted the decision by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) to list South Africa as jurisdiction under increased monitoring or more commonly referred to as FATF’s “grey list”.
tgt_text: Cabinet noted the decision by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) to list South Africa as jurisdiction under increased monitoring or more commonly referred to as FATF’s “grey list”.

src_text: While the FATF recognised the significant progress made by the country in addressing the shortcomings highlighted in its mutual evaluation report (MER), it assessed that there is more needed to be done.
tgt_text: While the FATF recognised the significant progress made by the country in addressing the shortcomings highlighted in its mutual evaluation report (MER), it assessed that there is more needed to be done.

src_text: Cabinet is cognisant that addressing the identified shortcomings will be in the best interest of South Africa.
tgt_text: Cabinet is cognisant that addressing the identified shortcomings will be in the best interest of South Africa.

src_text: Government is committed to work swiftly to strengthen the effectiveness of its anti-money laundering and counter-terrorist financing regime.
tgt_text: Government is committed to work swiftly to strengthen the effectiveness of its anti-money laundering and counter-terrorist financing regime.

src_text: Ugandan State Visit.
tgt_text: Ugandan State Visit.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful State Visit by President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni of the Republic of Uganda to South Africa on 28 February..  During the visit, the two Heads of State addressed Business Forum, and explored trade and investment opportunities.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful State Visit by President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni of the Republic of Uganda to South Africa on 28 February..  During the visit, the two Heads of State addressed Business Forum, and explored trade and investment opportunities.

src_text: They also witnessed the signing of Memorandums of Understanding (MoU) on number of areas, which included: Industrial Development Cooperation, Tourism; Transport; Communication Technologies; Correctional Services; and Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: They also witnessed the signing of Memorandums of Understanding (MoU) on number of areas, which included: Industrial Development Cooperation, Tourism; Transport; Communication Technologies; Correctional Services; and Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: The Republic of Uganda is South Africa’s 15th largest trading partner on the Continent and the second largest in East Africa.
tgt_text: The Republic of Uganda is South Africa’s 15th largest trading partner on the Continent and the second largest in East Africa.

src_text: Between 2017 and 2021, total trade between the two countries reached R3 billion.
tgt_text: Between 2017 and 2021, total trade between the two countries reached R3 billion.

src_text: African Union (AU) Summit.
tgt_text: African Union (AU) Summit.

src_text: President Cyril Ramaphosa led the South African delegation at the African Union Summit in Ethiopia under the theme “Acceleration of Africa Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) Implementation”.
tgt_text: President Cyril Ramaphosa led the South African delegation at the African Union Summit in Ethiopia under the theme “Acceleration of Africa Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) Implementation”.

src_text: South Africa provided updates on the implementation of the African Continental Free Trade Area.
tgt_text: South Africa provided updates on the implementation of the African Continental Free Trade Area.

src_text: As Chair of the AU Peace and Security Council, the country also provided an update on progress towards Silencing the Guns in Africa by..  As AU COVID-19 Champion, President Ramaphosa presented proposals on how the Africa Centres for Disease Control (CDC) can be strengthened and measures adopted to better prepare the continent for pandemics.
tgt_text: As Chair of the AU Peace and Security Council, the country also provided an update on progress towards Silencing the Guns in Africa by..  As AU COVID-19 Champion, President Ramaphosa presented proposals on how the Africa Centres for Disease Control (CDC) can be strengthened and measures adopted to better prepare the continent for pandemics.

src_text: Under the leadership of President Ramaphosa, the COVID-19 African Vaccine Acquisition Task Team was established in support of the Africa Vaccine Strategy.
tgt_text: Under the leadership of President Ramaphosa, the COVID-19 African Vaccine Acquisition Task Team was established in support of the Africa Vaccine Strategy.

src_text: South Africa also secured over 500 million COVID-19 vaccine doses for the continent.
tgt_text: South Africa also secured over 500 million COVID-19 vaccine doses for the continent.

src_text: Further, the African Pandemic Response Fund was established, which mobilised $137 million for local production of vaccines, diagnostics, personal protective equipment, oxygen and critical medicines.
tgt_text: Further, the African Pandemic Response Fund was established, which mobilised $137 million for local production of vaccines, diagnostics, personal protective equipment, oxygen and critical medicines.

src_text: The Africa Medical Supplies Platform was also launched, to ensure access to vital medical supplies for all African countries.
tgt_text: The Africa Medical Supplies Platform was also launched, to ensure access to vital medical supplies for all African countries.

src_text: Gender-Based Violence and Femicide.
tgt_text: Gender-Based Violence and Femicide.

src_text: Government condemns the persistent cases of gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF) and continues to intensify its fight through several interventions.
tgt_text: Government condemns the persistent cases of gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF) and continues to intensify its fight through several interventions.

src_text: These include extensive legal reform, the establishment of GBVF Response Fund, and support for Thuthuzela and Khuseleka Care Centres, which provide vital services for GBV survivors..
tgt_text: These include extensive legal reform, the establishment of GBVF Response Fund, and support for Thuthuzela and Khuseleka Care Centres, which provide vital services for GBV survivors..

src_text: Furthermore, partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF, remain critical.
tgt_text: Furthermore, partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF, remain critical.

src_text: Health.
tgt_text: Health.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the deliberations of the historic International Medical Countermeasures Meeting that the country co-hosted under the theme “Building consensus for an equitable and sustainable medical countermeasures platform for the next pandemic.”.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the deliberations of the historic International Medical Countermeasures Meeting that the country co-hosted under the theme “Building consensus for an equitable and sustainable medical countermeasures platform for the next pandemic.”.

src_text: The meeting explored options to secure equitable access to lifesaving vaccines, diagnostics and therapeutics for future pandemics based on need and not on wealth.
tgt_text: The meeting explored options to secure equitable access to lifesaving vaccines, diagnostics and therapeutics for future pandemics based on need and not on wealth.

src_text: This began consensus building exercise ahead of the High Level Meeting on Pandemic Prevention, Preparedness and Response at the 78th United Nations General Assembly this year.
tgt_text: This began consensus building exercise ahead of the High Level Meeting on Pandemic Prevention, Preparedness and Response at the 78th United Nations General Assembly this year.

src_text: In separate but related development, the recent Traditional Medicine Summit hosted by the Department of Health is part of the resolutions taken at the World Health Organisation (WHO), African Union as well as Southern Africa Development Community (SADC) to integrate traditional medicine into health systems.
tgt_text: In separate but related development, the recent Traditional Medicine Summit hosted by the Department of Health is part of the resolutions taken at the World Health Organisation (WHO), African Union as well as Southern Africa Development Community (SADC) to integrate traditional medicine into health systems.

src_text: Child Immunisation and Cholera.
tgt_text: Child Immunisation and Cholera.

src_text: The measles outbreak poses risk to children who are not immunised.
tgt_text: The measles outbreak poses risk to children who are not immunised.

src_text: Parents and legal guardians are urged to ensure that their children are immunised as part of the nationwide child immunisation campaign.
tgt_text: Parents and legal guardians are urged to ensure that their children are immunised as part of the nationwide child immunisation campaign.

src_text: Measles symptoms include fever, red eyes, runny nose and cough, typically appearing before the characteristic rash.
tgt_text: Measles symptoms include fever, red eyes, runny nose and cough, typically appearing before the characteristic rash.

src_text: Following the recent rise in cholera cases, Cabinet urged citizens to be vigilant of any symptoms, which include diarrhoea dehydration, vomiting and body weakness.
tgt_text: Following the recent rise in cholera cases, Cabinet urged citizens to be vigilant of any symptoms, which include diarrhoea dehydration, vomiting and body weakness.

src_text: Spread mainly through polluted water or contaminated food, the public is reminded to boil water, cook food thoroughly, and practice basic hygiene of washing hands with soap and water to prevent transmission.
tgt_text: Spread mainly through polluted water or contaminated food, the public is reminded to boil water, cook food thoroughly, and practice basic hygiene of washing hands with soap and water to prevent transmission.

src_text: All people who experience cholera-like symptoms, with or without local or international travel history, must immediately visit their nearest health facility.
tgt_text: All people who experience cholera-like symptoms, with or without local or international travel history, must immediately visit their nearest health facility.

src_text: Water security.
tgt_text: Water security.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the launch of the country’s largest reservoir, the Vlakfontein Reservoir in Gauteng, which can store up to 210 million-litres of water equivalent to 24 hours of water demand, and is expected to be completed in April.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the launch of the country’s largest reservoir, the Vlakfontein Reservoir in Gauteng, which can store up to 210 million-litres of water equivalent to 24 hours of water demand, and is expected to be completed in April.

src_text: The project has created about 220 job opportunities for the local communities and 110 jobs in the Ekurhuleni Local Municipality.
tgt_text: The project has created about 220 job opportunities for the local communities and 110 jobs in the Ekurhuleni Local Municipality.

src_text: Cabinet called on South Africans to protect our water infrastructure by reporting vandalism to the police on 0800 10111 and water leaks to your local municipality.
tgt_text: Cabinet called on South Africans to protect our water infrastructure by reporting vandalism to the police on 0800 10111 and water leaks to your local municipality.

src_text: Citizens can also play their part in using water sparingly.
tgt_text: Citizens can also play their part in using water sparingly.

src_text: Severe weather.
tgt_text: Severe weather.

src_text: The preparedness of Disaster Management teams, limited the impact of heavy rains, exacerbated by cyclone Freddy that affected the north-eastern parts of South Africa.
tgt_text: The preparedness of Disaster Management teams, limited the impact of heavy rains, exacerbated by cyclone Freddy that affected the north-eastern parts of South Africa.

src_text: Government continues to mobilise all available resources as part of the national state of disaster to support recovery efforts in areas impacted by flooding.
tgt_text: Government continues to mobilise all available resources as part of the national state of disaster to support recovery efforts in areas impacted by flooding.

src_text: The spirit of Ubuntu was shown by the many NGOs, community, business and relief organisations who have assisted those in need.
tgt_text: The spirit of Ubuntu was shown by the many NGOs, community, business and relief organisations who have assisted those in need.

src_text: Our recovery is going to take massive effort, drawing on the resources and capabilities of our entire nation.
tgt_text: Our recovery is going to take massive effort, drawing on the resources and capabilities of our entire nation.

src_text: Residents are urged to stay indoors during stormy weather, never try to walk, swim or drive through fast-moving floodwater or rivers, and people living in low-lying areas should be aware of weather warnings and take the necessary precautions.
tgt_text: Residents are urged to stay indoors during stormy weather, never try to walk, swim or drive through fast-moving floodwater or rivers, and people living in low-lying areas should be aware of weather warnings and take the necessary precautions.

src_text: National Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).
tgt_text: National Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).

src_text: NSFAS represents progressive programme by government to systematically break the legacies of inter-generational social inequality of post school education and training.
tgt_text: NSFAS represents progressive programme by government to systematically break the legacies of inter-generational social inequality of post school education and training.

src_text: Despite the challenges, NSFAS has made significant improvements, funding more than one million students with projected budget of R47 billion.
tgt_text: Despite the challenges, NSFAS has made significant improvements, funding more than one million students with projected budget of R47 billion.

src_text: Students, with declined applications for funding, can lodge appeals online with the Independent Appeals Tribunal via the myNSFAS Portal (https://my.nsfas.org.za/).
tgt_text: Students, with declined applications for funding, can lodge appeals online with the Independent Appeals Tribunal via the myNSFAS Portal (https://my.nsfas.org.za/).

src_text: Online Voter Registration.
tgt_text: Online Voter Registration.

src_text: Cabinet called on all eligible voters to register online at https://registertovote.elections.org.za for the 2024 National and Provincial Elections.
tgt_text: Cabinet called on all eligible voters to register online at https://registertovote.elections.org.za for the 2024 National and Provincial Elections.

src_text: The Electoral Commission launched an online voter registration campaign on 20 February 2023, and appealed to the youth who are eligible to vote to register so that they can exercise their democratic right to vote.
tgt_text: The Electoral Commission launched an online voter registration campaign on 20 February 2023, and appealed to the youth who are eligible to vote to register so that they can exercise their democratic right to vote.

src_text: Citizens already registered to vote are also encouraged to check their voters’ roll address, and update their address if they have moved since the last general elections.
tgt_text: Citizens already registered to vote are also encouraged to check their voters’ roll address, and update their address if they have moved since the last general elections.

src_text: Voters must register where they reside, and vote where they are registered.
tgt_text: Voters must register where they reside, and vote where they are registered.

src_text: You are eligible to register to vote if you are South African citizen;At least 16 years and older (you can only vote from age 18); andIn possession of green bar-coded ID book, smart ID card or valid temporary identity certificate.
tgt_text: You are eligible to register to vote if you are South African citizen;At least 16 years and older (you can only vote from age 18); andIn possession of green bar-coded ID book, smart ID card or valid temporary identity certificate.

src_text: United States (US) Alert.
tgt_text: United States (US) Alert.

src_text: Cabinet noted the alert issued by the US Embassy as part of the US government’s standard communication to its citizens travelling and living in the country.
tgt_text: Cabinet noted the alert issued by the US Embassy as part of the US government’s standard communication to its citizens travelling and living in the country.

src_text: It indicated Level 2 travel advisory was in effect, advising them to exercise increased caution due to crime and civil unrest as well as to stockpile three days’ worth of supplies, medicines and first aid supplies.
tgt_text: It indicated Level 2 travel advisory was in effect, advising them to exercise increased caution due to crime and civil unrest as well as to stockpile three days’ worth of supplies, medicines and first aid supplies.

src_text: Government continuously monitors all areas that impact on our nation, any concern is acted upon swiftly to ensure the safety of everyone in the country.
tgt_text: Government continuously monitors all areas that impact on our nation, any concern is acted upon swiftly to ensure the safety of everyone in the country.

src_text: Should there be any risks detected, the government will be the first to inform the public.
tgt_text: Should there be any risks detected, the government will be the first to inform the public.

src_text: SAPS.
tgt_text: SAPS.

src_text: Cabinet is pleased that the South African police service has nearly cleared the DNA testing backlog at its forensic service laboratories.
tgt_text: Cabinet is pleased that the South African police service has nearly cleared the DNA testing backlog at its forensic service laboratories.

src_text: This breakthrough will ensure that gender-based violence-related cases are speedily resolved..
tgt_text: This breakthrough will ensure that gender-based violence-related cases are speedily resolved..

src_text: The SAPS has also added additional DNA testing capacity with the completion of forensic laboratory in Gqeberha in the Eastern Cape, which will ease pressure on the existing laboratory in the Western Cape  Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: The SAPS has also added additional DNA testing capacity with the completion of forensic laboratory in Gqeberha in the Eastern Cape, which will ease pressure on the existing laboratory in the Western Cape  Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: National Strategic Plan (NSP) for HIV, TB and STIs 2023-..
tgt_text: National Strategic Plan (NSP) for HIV, TB and STIs 2023-..

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) for Human Immunodeficiency Virus, Tuberculosis and Sexually Transmitted Infections 2023-..
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) for Human Immunodeficiency Virus, Tuberculosis and Sexually Transmitted Infections 2023-..

src_text: The full version of the NSP 2023-2028 will be released to the public on World TB Day on the 24 March 2023 in Rustenburg in the North West.
tgt_text: The full version of the NSP 2023-2028 will be released to the public on World TB Day on the 24 March 2023 in Rustenburg in the North West.

src_text: The NSP proposes to deal with HIV, sexually transmitted infections and tuberculosis through holistic approach that includes preventative and therapeutic measures.
tgt_text: The NSP proposes to deal with HIV, sexually transmitted infections and tuberculosis through holistic approach that includes preventative and therapeutic measures.

src_text: This is the 5th NSP for HIV, TB and STIs and it outlines the progress South Africa has made to deal with the three diseases thus far.
tgt_text: This is the 5th NSP for HIV, TB and STIs and it outlines the progress South Africa has made to deal with the three diseases thus far.

src_text: The five-year plan provides strategic framework for multi-sectoral approach that is people-centred to eliminate HIV, TB and STIs as public health threats by..
tgt_text: The five-year plan provides strategic framework for multi-sectoral approach that is people-centred to eliminate HIV, TB and STIs as public health threats by..

src_text: The drafting of the NSP was coordinated by the South African National AIDS Council (SANAC) which brings together government, civil society, and other social partners to build consensus and drive well-coordinated, unified response to three epidemics over five-year period.
tgt_text: The drafting of the NSP was coordinated by the South African National AIDS Council (SANAC) which brings together government, civil society, and other social partners to build consensus and drive well-coordinated, unified response to three epidemics over five-year period.

src_text: The process to develop this 5th iteration of our national plan was extensively consulted across society to secure the widest range of views and ideas, and building on the lessons learnt from our previous plans.
tgt_text: The process to develop this 5th iteration of our national plan was extensively consulted across society to secure the widest range of views and ideas, and building on the lessons learnt from our previous plans.

src_text: The NSP emphasises the need to break down barriers and maximise equitable and equal access to services through resilient and integrated health systems.
tgt_text: The NSP emphasises the need to break down barriers and maximise equitable and equal access to services through resilient and integrated health systems.

src_text: The inclusion of mental health services and social support is based on the strong association between HIV, TB, STIs with gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF), human rights violations and inequalities.
tgt_text: The inclusion of mental health services and social support is based on the strong association between HIV, TB, STIs with gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF), human rights violations and inequalities.

src_text: The new plan features an expanded scope for the management of STIs, including viral hepatitis and Human Papilloma Virus, which are common coinfections in HIV infected individuals.
tgt_text: The new plan features an expanded scope for the management of STIs, including viral hepatitis and Human Papilloma Virus, which are common coinfections in HIV infected individuals.

src_text: Report on the outcomes of United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC COP 27).
tgt_text: Report on the outcomes of United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC COP 27).

src_text: Cabinet received report on the outcomes of United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC COP 27) which was held in Sharm El Sheik in Egypt in November.
tgt_text: Cabinet received report on the outcomes of United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC COP 27) which was held in Sharm El Sheik in Egypt in November.

src_text: While South Africa acknowledges the challenges remaining in fighting climate change, the gains various parties are making to address the issue are welcomed.
tgt_text: While South Africa acknowledges the challenges remaining in fighting climate change, the gains various parties are making to address the issue are welcomed.

src_text: COP 27 negotiations contributed to the historic decision to establish Fund to assist developing countries to respond to Loss and Damage caused by climate change.
tgt_text: COP 27 negotiations contributed to the historic decision to establish Fund to assist developing countries to respond to Loss and Damage caused by climate change.

src_text: It established Transitional Committee to work on the modalities of this fund with view of taking decision at COP28 in..  COP27 also emphasised the need for increased momentum to reform the Multilateral Development Banks and International Financial Institutions and called on the shareholders of these institutions to take decisive action to scale-up climate finance in 2023 and make their institutional arrangements fit for purpose.
tgt_text: It established Transitional Committee to work on the modalities of this fund with view of taking decision at COP28 in..  COP27 also emphasised the need for increased momentum to reform the Multilateral Development Banks and International Financial Institutions and called on the shareholders of these institutions to take decisive action to scale-up climate finance in 2023 and make their institutional arrangements fit for purpose.

src_text: The final COP27 outcome reflects the urgency of the climate crisis, and the need to keep the.
tgt_text: The final COP27 outcome reflects the urgency of the climate crisis, and the need to keep the.

src_text: 5-degree temperature target alive during what the International Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) calls the “Critical Decade”, including by providing clear programme to advance the mitigation agenda from now to.
tgt_text: 5-degree temperature target alive during what the International Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) calls the “Critical Decade”, including by providing clear programme to advance the mitigation agenda from now to.

src_text: Hosting of the World Waste Congress.
tgt_text: Hosting of the World Waste Congress.

src_text: Cabinet approved for South Africa to host the World Waste Congress in Cape Town from 15 to 18 September.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved for South Africa to host the World Waste Congress in Cape Town from 15 to 18 September.

src_text: The event is being organised by the International Solid Waste Association, an international network of waste professionals and expert from across the world.
tgt_text: The event is being organised by the International Solid Waste Association, an international network of waste professionals and expert from across the world.

src_text: The congress will benefit South Africa, as delegates will share current trends and best practices in waste management.
tgt_text: The congress will benefit South Africa, as delegates will share current trends and best practices in waste management.

src_text: The congress will attract international experts and technology providers and South Africa’s informal waste sector and small business will benefit.
tgt_text: The congress will attract international experts and technology providers and South Africa’s informal waste sector and small business will benefit.

src_text: In 2011, Cabinet approved the National Waste Management Strategy (NWMS) for implementation.
tgt_text: In 2011, Cabinet approved the National Waste Management Strategy (NWMS) for implementation.

src_text: The NWMS has eight key goals including promoting waste minimisation, re-use, recycling and recovery of waste.
tgt_text: The NWMS has eight key goals including promoting waste minimisation, re-use, recycling and recovery of waste.

src_text: It also helps the country deliver effective and efficient waste services and grows the contribution of the waste sector to the green economy.
tgt_text: It also helps the country deliver effective and efficient waste services and grows the contribution of the waste sector to the green economy.

src_text: South Africa is also party to international agreements that relate to waste management issues.
tgt_text: South Africa is also party to international agreements that relate to waste management issues.

src_text: Selection of the Host City for the 15th BRICS Summit.
tgt_text: Selection of the Host City for the 15th BRICS Summit.

src_text: Cabinet approved that Gauteng would host the 15th BRICS Summit to be held in South Africa from 22 to 24 August.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved that Gauteng would host the 15th BRICS Summit to be held in South Africa from 22 to 24 August.

src_text: South Africa assumed the rotational Chairship of the BIRICS Forum from 1 January 2023 under the theme “BRICS and Africa Partnership for Accelerated Growth, Sustainable Development and Inclusive Multilateralism”.
tgt_text: South Africa assumed the rotational Chairship of the BIRICS Forum from 1 January 2023 under the theme “BRICS and Africa Partnership for Accelerated Growth, Sustainable Development and Inclusive Multilateralism”.

src_text: South Africa’s membership of BRICS has grown substantially since the country joined this group of emerging economies 12 years ago.
tgt_text: South Africa’s membership of BRICS has grown substantially since the country joined this group of emerging economies 12 years ago.

src_text: In 2021, over 17 percent of South Africa’s exports were destined for other BRICS countries while over 29 percent of our total imports came from these countries/C.
tgt_text: In 2021, over 17 percent of South Africa’s exports were destined for other BRICS countries while over 29 percent of our total imports came from these countries/C.

tgt_text: The country commemorates Human Rights Month under the theme “Consolidating and Sustaining Human Rights culture into the future”.

src_text: Cabinet encourages South Africans to celebrate our rich cultural heritage and diversity that has the power to unite our nation.
tgt_text: Cabinet encourages South Africans to celebrate our rich cultural heritage and diversity that has the power to unite our nation.

src_text: CondolencesCabinet expressed condolences to the family and friends of:• Peter Cyril Jones, liberation activist and leader of the Black People’s Convention.• Her Royal Highness Princess Alice, the daughter of King Solomon kaDinuzulu.• Paul Herbst, Director of Medi-Response, respected and dedicated leader in the field of emergency medical services who recently assisted in the country’s rescue mission in Türkiye and Seria.• Rafiq Rohan noted journalist and former South African political prisoner jailed in Robben Island who once served as the founding Editor of the government newspaper Vuk’uzenzele, news editor and later political editor at “The Sowetan”, executive editor of “The Star” newspaper, and more recently as senior editor at Al Jazeera  AppointmentsAll appointments are subject to the verification of qualifications and the relevant security clearance.
