src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: Gezi.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho thakgolwa ha Letlole la Tlhokomelo ya Mehlodi (RMF) ke Letona la Motlakase Kantorong ya Mopresidente, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi yemukele kwetfulwa kwesikhwamamali i-Resource Mobilisation Fund (i-RMF) yiNdvuna yeTagezi letinte Ehhovisi LaMengameli, Dkt.

src_text: Tshebedisano-mmoho ena pakeng tsa mmuso le Business Unity South Africa batla ho fana ka disebediswa le boitsebelo ho thusa mmuso ho kenya tshebetsong ka nepo Leano la Tshebetso ya Motlakase le neng le phatlalatswe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phupu 2022, le Puong ya Maemo Naha (SoNA) ya 2023 le mohlala wa tshebedisano ntle ya setjhaba se sebetsang hantle le ho tiisa boitshepo ba Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.

src_text: RMF tla matlafatsa mosebetsi wa Komiti ya Naha ya Mathata Motlakase ho fihlella maikemisetso yona ho fedisa ho tingwa ha motlakase ka maikemisetso ho baballa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Lolubanjiswano lolusemkhatsini wahulumende ne-Business Unity South Africa luhlose kuniketa tinsita nabocwepheshe kute kutsi uhulumende akwati kuphumelelisa Luhlelo Lwekusebenta Kwetemandla Agezi ngemphumelelo, lolumenyetelwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngaKholwane 2022 kanye neNkhululumo yaMengameli Yebunjalo Belive (i-SoNA) yanga-2023, kwenta sibonelo, sekwenta sivumelwane nemmango ngalokuyimphumelelo kanye nekutetsemba eNingizimu Afrika lokuchubekako..     Le-RMF itawufukula umsebenti weLikomidi Letetinhlekelele Yavelonkhe Yetemandla Agezi lizuze umgomo walo wekucedza locimicimi lesibukene nawo lapha eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho bankakarolo bohle ho kenya letsoho ho kengweng tshebetsong ha Leano la Tshebetso ya Motlakase bakeng sa ho sebetsana le mathata bakwang ke ho kgaolwa hona ha motlakase moruong.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi  icele bonkhe badlalindzima kutsi bafake ligalelo ekuphunyelelisweni kweLuhlelo Lwekusebenta Lwetemandla Agezi kute kutsi kubukwane nekulahlekelwa lokukhulu lokwenteka kutemnotfo ngenca yalocimicimi..     Ikhabhinethi yemukele kukhatsateka lokusandza kuvetwa yi-S&P Global Ratings kwekutsi kukhula kwemnotfo waseNingizimu Afrika ubukene nekucindzeteleka lokukhulako lokuvela etinkingeni tesakhiwonchanti, ikakhulukati kushoda lokukhulu kwagezi.

src_text: Kabinete lemohile dingongoreho tse sa tswa hlahiswa ke S&P Global Ratings tsa hore kgolo ya moruo wa Afrika Borwa tobane le kgatello ntseng eketseha bakang mathata meralo ya motheo, haholoholo kgaello matla ya motlakase.
tgt_text: Kute kulungiswe lensayeya, hulumende ucale luchungechunge lwetinyatselo letingujucu, letifaka ekhatsi kuciniswa kwetimali, tingucuko letisheshako kutemnotfo kanye netinyatselo letiphutfumako lokuhloswe ngato kunciphisa locimicimi ngesikhatsi lesincane kanye nekugucula lomkhakha ngetingucuko tetimakethe kute kutsi babe nagezi sikhatsi lesidze.

src_text: Ho sebetsana le phephetso ena, mmuso tlile le mehato fapafapaneng kenyeletsang ho matlafatsa matlotlo mmuso, diphetoho tse potlakileng tsa moruo le mehato potlakileng ya nako kgutshwane ya ho fokotsa ho tingwa hona ha motlakase le ho fetola lekala lena ka ho tlisa diphetoho mebarakeng ka sepheo sa ho fihlela tharollo ya nako telele ya motlakase.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela kuvulwa kwekufakwa kweticelo tekuniketela ngagezi lomamegawatsi (ema-MW) lange-513 lolondvolotwa ngemabhethri njengencenye yekucinisa kuphendvula kwetfu kuletinsayeya temandla agezi.

src_text: Kabinete hape amohetse ho bulwa ha nako ya dikopo tsa boiketo ba tlhahiso ya motlakase dimekawate tse 513 (MW) ka kgonang ho bolokwang ho dibetri jwalo ka karolo ya ho matlafatsa karabello ya rona ho phephetso ya motlakase.
tgt_text: Lusuku lwekuvalwa kungeniswa kweticelo ngumhla ti-5 Kholwane 2023 ngensimbi ye-17:00 entsambama futsi bonkhe bantfu labanenshisekelo  bangagcwalisa lifomu lekubhalisa leliku-inthanethi ku: www.ipp-storage.co.za.

src_text: Letsatsi la ho qetela la ho kenya dikopo ke la 5 Phupu 2023 ka 17:00 mme bohle ba nang le thahasello ba ka tlatsa foromo ya ngodiso ya elektroniki fumanehang ho: www.ipp-storage.co.za .
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela sincumo lesentiwe Litiko Letemahlatsi, Tekudweba Netemvelo, Mk.

src_text: Kabinete hape amohetse qeto ya Letona la Meru, Ditlhapi le Tikoloho, Barbara Creecy, ya ho dumella Eskom ho fetisa tekanyetso dumeletsweng ho Laesene ya yona ya mosi tswang metjhining ya yona fehlang motlakase.
tgt_text: Barbara Creecy, kutsi anike i-Eskom umkhumulasibopho kulenchubo lendze ledzingekako kute kuchitjelwe Ilayisensi yayo yeKubhunyiselwa Kwemhlaba.

src_text: Ho ya ka Eskom, tumello ena tla thusa ho kenya tshebetsong tharollo ya nakwana ya ho lokisa Seteishene sa Motlakase sa Kusile ka Pudungwana 2023 mme sena se tla thusa hore seteishene sena se fehle dimekawate tse 2 100 (MW) tse tla fokotsa ho tingwa hona ha motlakase ka dikgato tse pedi.
tgt_text: Ngekuya kwe-Eskom, lomkhumulasibopho utawuyenta ikhone kuphumelelisa sisombululo sesikhashana sekumosheka kweSiphehligezi Ikusile ngeLweti 2023 futsi loko-ke kutawenta lesiphehligezi kutsi sale sicala kuphehla umtsamo wemamegawatsi (ema-MW) lange-2 100 lokutawunciphisa kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ibe setfubeni lelibi lekungena esigabeni sesibili sacimicimi..     Siteleka Senhlangano yeTebasebenti Labahlangane beTemfundvo, Tetemphilo (i-NEHAWU).

src_text: National Education, Health and Allied Workers' Union (NEHAWU).
tgt_text: Kulesiteleka se-NEHAWU, Ikhabhinethi ikwemukele kusayinwa kweSivumelwano Sekusombulula eMkhandlwini Wetekucocisana Ngetemiholo Yebasebenti Bahulumende (i-PSCBC) lesisombulula tingcoco tetemiholo temnyakatimali we-2022/23 nekucedza siteleka kanye nekubuyisela tonkhe tinhlangotsi eMkhandlwini Wekucocisana nekubonisana ngemiholo yemnyaka 2023/..     Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yavakalisa kubonga kwayo kuletinhlangano tebasebenti letisele ku-PSCBC kutsi tichubeke naletingcoco tekubonisana.

src_text: Ka seteraeke sa NEHAWU, Kabinete amohetse ho tekenwa ha Tumellano ya Tharollo Lekgotleng la Ditherisano tsa Basebeletsi ba Mmuso (PSCBC) le rarollang ditherisano tsa meputso tsa selemo sa 2022/23 le ho fedisa seteraeke ha mmoho le ho kgutlisetsa mekga kaofela Lekgotleng la Ditherisano bakeng sa ditherisano tsa meputso tsa selemo sa 2023/..     Kabinete tswetse pele ho leboha mekga ileng ya tswelapele le ditherisano ho PSCBC.
tgt_text: Iphindze futsi yakhonkhosela kutinikela kwahulumende kulenchubo yetingcoco nekubonisana, kanye nekusebentisana nabobonkhe badlalindzima kucinisekisa kubaluleka kwekucocisana ngekuhlanganyela kuyavikelwa futsi kuyahlonishwa..     Sifanele sikusho kutsi lomtsetfomgomo wekutsi AKUSETJENTWA, AKUHOLWA utawusebenta ngekushesha futsi kuncutfwa kwemiholo kutawentiwa kuletinyanga letine letitako, njengencenye yeSivumelwane Sekusombulula.

src_text: Sena se bontsha boitlamo ba mmuso tshebetsong ya ditherisano, le ho sebetsa le balekane bohle ba amehang ho netefatsa hore boholo ba ditherisano tse kopanetsweng bo sireletswa le ho hlomphuwa.
tgt_text: Litiko Letemisebenti Yahulumende Nekuphatsa litawulandzelela ngalokuphelele kuphunyeleliswa kwaletincumo.

src_text: Re rata ho netefatsa hore molao reng HA SA SEBETSA HA LEFUWE tla sebetsa hang-hang mme tjhelete tla hulwa ka dikgwedi tse nne tse tlang jwalo ka ha ho dumellano.
tgt_text: Kwengeta, ema-ejensi ekucinisekisa kutfotjelwa kwemtsetfo atawulandzelela tento tebugebengu letentiwe ngesikhatsi salesiteleka, baphatsi labatsintsekako bona batawubukana netento letinyatsele Inkhambo Lenhle Yekutiphatsa yeBasebenti baHulumende.

src_text: Lefapha la Basebeletsi ba Mmuso le Tsamaiso le tla beha leihlo ho kenngwa tshebetsong ka botlalo ha tumellano tsena.

Ho feta moo, makala qobello ya molao tla sala morao diketso tsa botlokotsebe tse entsweng nakong ya seteraeke, mme baokamedi ka ho fapana ba tla shebana le diketso tsena tsa tlolo ya molao ho latela Melao ya Boitshwaro ya Basebeletsi ba Mmuso.
tgt_text: Kuvalwa kwavelonkhe.

src_text: Ho Kwalwa ha Naha.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kukhatsateka ngetimemo tembhikisho letihlelwe kwentiwa ngeMsombuluko, mhla tinge-20 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 futsi itsatsa timemo letinjalo ngekutsi tite sibopho kantsi futsi tibudlabha..     Iklasta yeBulungiswa, Tekuvikela Bugebengu Netekuvikeleka (i-JCPS) ibukene nemsebenti wekucinisekisa kutsi lwephulomtsetfo alubeketelelwa.

src_text: Kabinete hlahisitse matshwenyeho ka boipiletso ba mohwanto reretsweng Mantaha wa la 20 Tlhakubele 2023 mme nka sena le ketso ya ho hloka boikarabelo le bohlaswa.
tgt_text: Lolufunomandla lokukhulunywa ngalo lwekucedza cimicimi, tindleko tekuphila letibita kakhulu kanye nelizinga lekweswelakala kwemisebenti leliphakeme Mengameli Ramaphosa wakhuluma ku-SoNA mhla ti-9 Indlovulencane.

src_text: Sehlopha sa Toka, Thibelo ya Botlokotsebe le Tshireletseho (JCPS) se sebetsana le mosebetsi wa ho netefatsa hore bohle ba ikobela molao.
tgt_text: Macondzana-ngco nekucedvwa kwacimicimi, Mengameli  ubeke Indvuna yeTagezi, Dkt.

src_text: Ditletlebo tseo ba llang ka tsona leng ho fedisa ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa, ditjeho tse phahameng tsa ho reka ntho tse batho ba iphedisang ka tsona, le leqeme la mesebetsi ke tseo Mopresidente Ramaphosa boletseng ka tsona ho SoNA ka la 9 Hlakola.
tgt_text: Ramokgopa, lobukene-ngco kuphela nekucedza locimicimi.

src_text: Mabapi le ho fedisa ho tingwa ha motlakase, Mopresidente hirile Letona la Motlakase Ngaka Ramokgopa ya shebaneng feela le ho fedisa ho tingwa hona ha motlakase.
tgt_text: Kuphunyeleliswa kweMaphuzi Lasihlanu eLuhlelo Lwekusebenta Lwemandla Agezi  luyachutjwa nyalo ngekutimisela lokukhulu futsi Indvuna yeTagezi kulamaviki letako itawumemetela imigomo yekusebenta kwe-Eskom mayelana nekucedza cimicimi..     Ngalokulinganako, Mengameli ku-SoNA yanga-2023 wakhuluma ngetinyatselo lesetibekwe ngabolonina tekubukana nemazinga laphakeme ekweswelakala kwemisebenti kulusha kanye newetindleko tekuphila.

src_text: Ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Leano la Tshebetso la Dintlha tse Hlano ho ntse ho tswelapele ka matla mme Letona la Motlakase dibekeng tse tlang le tla phatlalatsa mekgwa eo Eskom tla latela mabapi le ho fedisa ho tingwa hona ha motlakase..     Ka ho le leng hape, Mopresidente ho SoNA ya hae ya 2023 buile ka mehato behilweng bakeng sa ho sebetsana le maemo hodimo tlhokeho ya mesebetsi ya batjha le ditjheo tse hodimo tsa bophelo.
tgt_text: Ngako-ke, lufunomandla lokungulo kuphela lolungulona sisekelo salombhikisho lisu lekususa Mengameli Ramaphosa esihlalweni ngetindlela letingahambisani nemtsetfosisekelo.

src_text: Ka hona, seo ba se hwantelang feela ke ho tlosa Mopresidente Ramaphosa setulong ka tsela kgahlano le molaotheo.
tgt_text: Sifuna kwatisa wonkhe umuntfu kutsi KUNTJINTJWA KWEMBUSO NGETINDLELA LETINGASEKELWA NGUMTSETFOSISEKELO ANGEKE KWENTEKE LAPHA ENINGIZIMU AFRIKA.

src_text: Re batla ho tsebisa bohle hore HO FETOLA PUSO KA TSELA SA DUMELLANENG LE MOLAOTHEO KA SE ETSAHALE AFRIKA BORWA.
tgt_text: Nanoma ngubani lonenshisekelo yekuphatsa lelive ufanele kutsi alindze lukhetfo jikelele lwanga-.

src_text: Mang kapa mang ya nang le ditabatabelo tsa ho busa naha ena tlameha ho emela dikhetho tsa naha kaofela tsa.
tgt_text: Imitamo yekubanga tibhelu nebuyaluyalu kulelive kutawubukana nemandla emtsetfo.

src_text: Boiteko ba ho hlokisa naha botsitso bo ke se dumellwe.
tgt_text: Sifanele futsi kugcizelela kutsi kute linani lekuklwaya tepolitiki lelifanele kutsi lente bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika bangatinti..     Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yacaphela kuhhema kwemacembu tsite latsi anike iKhabhinethi emalanga lasikhombisa ekuvala tikolwa.

src_text: Re boetse hape re tlameha ho hlakisa hore ha re no dumella mokgwa ofe kapa ofe wa ho fetola maikutlo setjhaba ho tsa dipolotiki ka kgang Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Ikhalenda yetikolwa taseNingizimu Afrika tahulumende naletitimele, leyafakwa kugazethi ngeNdlovulenkhulu nga-2022, seyivele ibale umhla tinge-20 Indlovulenkhulu kutsi liholide lesikolwa lelikhetsekile.

src_text: Kabinete boetse lemohile ditaba tseo seng nnete tsa dihlopha tse ipolelang hore di nehile Kabinete matsatsi supileng ho kwala dikolo.
tgt_text: Bekuvele  kucaca kutsi kunemitamo yekutfola timphumelelo letilula.

src_text: Khalendara ya dikolo  tsohle tsa Afrika Borwa tsa mmuso le tsa poraefete neng phatlaladitswe bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso ka Tlhakubele 2022 se ntse hlwaya letsatsi la la 20 Tlhakubele 2023 jwalo ka letsatsi le ikgethang la phomolo la dikolo.
tgt_text: Kufanana-ke, nelikhefu letikolwa lelisemkhatsini wemaholidi esive.

src_text: Ho ile ha hlaka hore ho na le boiteko ba ho leka ho iphumanela tlotla siyo.
Ho etswa se tshwanang matsatsing ohle pakeng tsa mafelo beke le letsatsi la phomolo.
tgt_text: Luhlelo Lwelihhovisi LaMengameli Lebuholi Belusha.

src_text: Lenaneo la Mopresidente la Boetapele ba Batjha.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikwemukele kwetfulwa kweLuhlelo Lwelihhovisi Lahulumende Lwebuholi Belusha nguMengameli Ramaphosa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2023, e-Walter Sisulu University, eMthatha, lokwaba sisusa sekusungulwa kweluhlelo lwebudlelwane bayo yonkhe i-Afrika..     Loku kwaba yincenye yeseshini yokucala yeNgcoco yeLusha lwe-Nelson Mandela ngaphasi kwesicubulo lesitsi: “Buholi benkhambo lenhle nalobusemkhatsini wetitukulwane netitukulwane kute kutsi kube ne-Afrika lencono”.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho thankgololwa ha Lenaneo la Mopresidente la Boetapele ba batjha ke Mopresidente Ramaphosa ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2023, mane Yunivesiting ya Walter Sisulu, mane Mthatha, le ho thehwa ha lenaneo la kopanelo Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Lenkhundla yebuholi emkhatsini wetitukulwane icinisa tivumelwane letikhona tetinhlelo talelivekati kanye netivumelwane letifana ne-Ajenda Yenhlangano Yamave Ase-Afrika yanga-2063, Ishatha Yelusha Yase-Afrika kanye neSivumelwano Sendzawo Yekuhwebelana Ngalokukhululekile Yelivekati Lase-Afrika.

src_text: Sena se thehile karolo ya kopano ya ho qala ya Dipuisano tsa Batjha ba Nelson Mandela tlasa mookotaba: “Boetapele bo nang le maitshwaro le meloko fapaneng bakeng sa Afrika betere”.
tgt_text: Sivumelwane seluhlakasimo sekwakhiwa kwetimoto lapha eNingizimu Afrika .

src_text: Lepatlelo lena la boetapele ba meloko fapaneng le matlafatsa meralo le ditumellano tse seng di le teng tsa kontinente ka bophara tse jwalo ka Lenaneo la Kopano ya Afrika la 2063, Tjhatha ya Batjha ba Afrika le Tumellano ya Sebaka sa Kgwebisano Senang Ditshita ya Kontinente ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi yemukele tindzaba tekutsi inkampani yetimoto i-Stellantis South Africa isayine sivumelwano sekusebentisana neNhlangano Yetekutfutfukiswa Kwetimboni kanye neLitiko Letekuhwebelana, Timboni neKuncintisana kute kutsi kwakhiwe sikhungo lesisha sekukhicita timoto eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Tumellano ya Moralo wa ho aha Dikoloi Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: I-Stellantis itsengisa timoto teluhlobo lwe-Jeep, i-Alfa Romeo, i-Fiat, i-Citroën, i-Opel kanye nelwe-Peugeot eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ditaba tsa hore khamphani ya dikoloi ya Stellantis Afrika Borwa tekenne tumellano ya tshebedisano le Koporasi ya Tlhabollo ya Diintasteri le Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Diindasteri le Tlhodisano ho bula sebaka sa tlhahiso ya dikoloi Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Budlelwane Lobusemkhatsini WeNingizimu Afrika NeTanzania.

src_text: Stellantis rekisa mefuta ya dikoloi tse kang Jeep, Alfa Romeo, Fiat, Citroën, Opel le Peugeot Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ilwemukele luvakasho lwekuya eNingizimu Afrika ngaLesine, mhla ti-16 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 lwaMengameli Samia Suluhu Hassan wase-United Republic of Tanzania, lobekamenywe ngumlingani wakhe,  Mengameli Ramaphosa.

src_text: Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Tanzania.
tgt_text: Loluvakasho lulandzela umhlangano weKhomishini Yetindvuna Yalamave YaseNingizimu Afrika neTanzania (i-BNC) lobewubanjelwe ePitoli ngaLesitsatfu, mhla ti-15 Indlovulenkhulu.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo ya Mopresidente Samia Suluhu Hassan wa Tanzania Afrika Borwa ka Labone, la la 16 Tlhakubele 2023 arabela memo ya mphato wa hae Mopresidente Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Lutawuphindze futsi luhambe embili kuseshini yesibili ye-BNC yeNingizimu Afrika neTanzania, lolwakhiwe ngemakomidi lamane: Letepolitiki neTebuncusa; Tekuvikela Netekuphepha; Temnotfo, neTenhlalakahle neTemasiko.

src_text: Ketelo ena latela Khomishene ya Matjhaba Kopaneng ya Matona Afrika Borwa le Tanzania (BNC) neng tshwaretswe Tshwane ka Laboraro la 15 Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: Kwengeta kulomfelandzawonye nemzabalazo wenkhululeko yaseNingizimu Afrika, iTanzania ingulenye yebalingani betekuhwebelana labakhulu, labahwebelana ngalokuphelele lokusemkhatsini walamave lamabili lokukhuphuke kwesuka kutigidzigidzi leti-R. 89 nga-2021 kwaya kutigidzigidzi leti-R. 71 nga-.

src_text: Yona tla boela ba letshwao la kopano ya bobedi ya BNC ya Afrika Borwa le Tanzania nang le dikomiti tse nne: ya tsa Dipolotiki le tsa Bodiplomate; Paballo le Tshireletso; Ditaba tsa Moruo, tsa Sechaba le Setso.
tgt_text: Kunetinkampani taseNingizimu Afrika letingetulu kwe-250 emikhakheni leyehlukene eTanzania.

src_text: Ntle le kabelo ya yona ntweng ya Afrika Borwa ya tokoloho, Tanzania ke e nngwe ya dinaha tseo naha ena hwebisanang le tsona mme ka kakaretso matsetse kgwebisano dinaha tsena tlohile ho dibillione tse  89 ka 2021 ho ya ho tse  71 ka.
tgt_text: Kuhlangana kwe-Heineken ne-Distell.

src_text: Ho na le dikhamphane tse tswang naheng ya Afrika Borwa tse fetang 250 makaleng fapaneng tse naheng ya Tanzania.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikwemukele kugunyatwa Sigungu Semincintiswano sekuhlangana kwenkampani yemhlaba lekhicita tjwala yaseYurophu i-Heineken kanye nomkhicizi wetjwala waseNingizimu Afrika i-Distell Group Holdings.

src_text: Ho Kopana ha Heineken le Distell.
tgt_text: Kuhlanganiswa, lokuwukwakha umkhiciti lomkhulu wema-cider kulelive, kweyeme etimeni letinyenti letijatjulelwa ngummango, letifaka ekhatsi kukhutsatwa kwekutfutfukiswa labasita ngemphahla, kugcinwa kwekutsengwa kwempahla yasekhaya, kugcugcutelwa kwekutjalwa kwetimali elucwaningweni nasekutfutfukisweni kanye nekwandza kwemandla ekukhicita akuleli..     Lebhizinisi lehlanganisiwe itawuphindze ikhutsate bunikati bebasebenti ngekusungula luhlelo lwebunikati bemasheya besisebenti iphindze futsi yente kutsi basebenti bamelelwe ebhodini.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tumello ya Lekgotlana la Ditlhodisano ya ho dumella ho kopana ha khamphane ya Yuropa ya jwala Heineken le ya Afrika Borwa ya Distell Group Holdings.
tgt_text: Kulandzelelwa Kwenchubelembili Yetekuhhamuleka Yetikhukhula Tanga-.

src_text: Kopanyo ena tla theha moetsi moholo ka ho fetisisa wa majwala nang le tshukiri ka hara naha itshetlehile ka letoto la maemo kgahleho ya setjhaba kenyeletsang kgodiso ya ntshetsopele ya baabi, paballo ya ditheko tsa lehae, kgothaletso ya matsete ho dipatlisiso le ntshetsopele le ho eketsa bokgoni ba tlhahiso ka naheng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iwemukele umsebenti lowentiwe yiNdvuna yeTekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu, Mk.

src_text: Ho kopana hona ha dikhamphani tsena ho tla boela ho tswela basebetsi molemo ka hore le bona be beng ba diabo khamphaneng leng se tla etsa hore ba be le kemedi botong ya khamphani..     Kgatelopele Tlhokomelong ya Tshenyo ya Dikgohola tsa.
tgt_text: Mmamoloko Kubayi kanye neMalunga e-MinMEC yeTekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu wekulandzelela inchubekelembili mayelana nekuhlaliswa kwebantfu kwalomphela kanye nekuhlalisa imindeni lekhahlabetwe tikhukhula tanga-2022 KwaZulu-Natal njengoba lelive lisondzela ekuhlanganeni kwemnyaka wekucala lelive lehlelwa tikhukhula nga-.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelo pele mosebetsing entsweng ke Letona la ho Dudiswa ha Setjhaba, Mme Mmamoloko Kubayi le bomphato ba hae mosebetsing wa ho dudiswa ha setjhaba ya ho phallela ba malapa anngweng ke dikgohola tsa 2022 KwaZulu-Natal jwalo naha itokiseletsa ho hlwaya sehopotso sa pele sa tshenyo ena ya dikhohola tsa.
tgt_text: Lokungasiwo emaciniso mayelana neTinzuzo teTindvuna neMasekelatindvuna.

src_text: Ditlhaloso tse Fosahetseng Mabapi le Melemo ya Matona le Batlatsi ba Matona.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kukhatsateka ngalokuchubekako nalokuhlaneketelwa kabi mayelana neTinzuzo teTindvuna neMasekelatindvuna njengaloku kubekiwe kuNkhombandlela Yetindvuna letiseSigungwini lesiphetse, lobeka tinzuzo, emathulusi ekusebenta kanye netimbasha teMalunga eSigungu kwekwenta imisebenti yawo.

src_text: Kabinete hlahisa matshwenyeho yona mabapi le tlhahiso fosahetseng tswelang pele ya Melemo ya Matona le Batlatsi ba Matona jwalo ka ha ngotswe Bukaneng ya Ditlhaloso tsa Melemo ya Ditho tsa Kabinete hlalosang megolo eo ba fumanang, disebediswa tsa ho etsa mosebetsi wa bona le merokotso ya bona ha ba entse mosebetsi wa bona ka bokgabane.
tgt_text: Kuhlelwa kweTindlu teTindvuna kungumphumela wekuVumelana kwanga-1910 ngesikhatsi kwakhiwa Inhlangano YaseNingizimu Afrika leyancuma lamadolobhanhloko lamatsatfu aseNingizimu Afrika lapho khona iPitoli yaba Sihlalo Sahulumende, iBloemfontein yaba Sihlalo Setebulungiswa, kwabe sekutsi iKapa yona yaba Sihlalo SePhalamende.

src_text: Taba ya matlo bodulo ba matona haesale ne thehwe ka 1910 nakong eo ho neng ho qalwa mmuso wa Union of South Africa mme matlo taolo ya puso arolwa hararo, Dikantoro tsa Puso tsa ba Tshwane, tsa Boahlodi tsa ba Bloemfontein mme Palamente yona ya ba Motse Kapa.
tgt_text: Tonkhe letindlu lekutsiwa titsabatsaba tatfolwa ngembi kwa-1994 futsi hulumende lowalandzela loholwa nguKhongolose usandza kucinisekisa kunakekelwa kwaleto tindzawo tekuhlala kute kutsi kulondvolotwe linani lato futsi ngaleyo ndlela-ke tiyazuza ekukhuphukeni kwelinani letindlu..     Tindvuna neMasekelatindvuna lasebentisa totimbili tindlu letiniketwa nguHulumende bakhokha irenti ngendlela lefanako nemalunga ephalamende.

src_text: Matlo ana madulo kaofela ke pele ho 1994 mme mmuso latetseng eteletsweng pele ke African National Congress netefatsa hore matlo ana fumana tlhokomela hlokahalang bakeng sa ho boloka hore se be dithako.
tgt_text: Kungaba yintfo lengakalungi kutsi Tindvuna neMasekelatindvuna labasebenta imisebenti lengacinisekisiwe etikhundleni tabo labakuto kwanyalo kute batitfolele tabo tindzawo tekuhlala  babe kodvwa benta umsebenti wesive..     Timoto letisetjentiswa Tindvuna neMasekelatindvuna tihambisana kahle kakhulu neLibhukwana  Letindvuna kanye nemkhawulo welinani uncunywa yiNdvuna yeTetimali ngekubonisana neNdvuna Yetemaphoyisa mayelana netekuphepha.

src_text: Matona le Batlatsi ba Matona ba dulang matlong mmuso, le bona ba lefa rente jwalo ka ditho tsohle tsa Palamente tla be le ho hloka toka ho lebella hore Matona le Batlatsi ba Matona ba se nang mosebetsi wa moshwelella hore ba ipatlele bodulo empa ba sebeletsa setjhaba.
tgt_text: Tici tetekuphepha titinhlangotsi letibalulekile ekuncunyweni kwemkhawulo wemanani futsi tehlakalo letingasitinhle takamuva teBaphatsimadolobha labafile noma labehlelwe tingoti tetemgwaco letimbi kabi kugcizelela kubaluleka kwaloludzaba futsi kufanele kususe loludzaba etinchakeleni tetepolitiki.

src_text: Dikoloi tse sebediswang ke Matona le Batlatsi ba bona di tsamaellana le Bukana ya Ditlhaloso tsa Melemo mme tekanyetso ya boleng ba tsona behilwe ke Letona la Matlotlo ka therisano le Letona la Sepolesa mabapi le dikarolo tsa tshireletso.
tgt_text: Onkhe Emalunga ePhalamende afanelwe kutfola lusito kubasebenti betinsita lababasitako ekwenteni imisebenti yabo.

src_text: Dikarolo tsa tshireletso ke ntlha ya bohlokwa leng ona laolang ditheko mme sena hape se bakwa le ke diketsahalo tse sa thabiseng tsa moraorao tjena tsa matona lahlehelwang ke maphelo ka lebaka la ho ameha dikotsing tse mpe.
tgt_text: Imehluko yemanani ebasebenti betinsita emahhovisi eTindvuna angumphumela wesikhatsi lesitsite leNdvuna leyacashwa ngaso, ngoba bonkhe basebenti bachumene nesikhatsi sekuba sehhovisi leNdvuna letsite.

src_text: Ena ke taba ya bohlokwa haholo seng ya ho bapala dipapadi tsa dipolotiki.
tgt_text: Loku kubangelwa kutsi Libhukwana Letindvuna liyidokhumenti lephilako lehlala njalo ibuyeketwa..     Mengameli wendlulisele leLibhukwana Letindvuna lanyalo kuKhomishini Letimele yeTekuholelwa Kwalabasemahhovisi Emisebenti Yahulumende, leselivele libukana netemiholo yalabasemahhovisi ahulumende kutsi ibuyeketwe     Tincumo Tekhabhinethi.

src_text: Ditho tsohle tsa Palamente di na le tokelo ya ho ba le basebetsi ba ba thusang ho phetha mosebetsi wa bona.
tgt_text: Inchubomgomo Leluhlaka yeTabomake Kutemidlalo.

src_text: Palo ya basebeletsi ba Letona ka leng laolwa ke nako eo le kgethilweng ka lona, mme hape re tlameha ho hopola hore nako ya kgiro ya basebeletsi bana a lekana le ya Letona leo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kugazethi luhlaka lweNchubomgomo yeTabomake Kutemidlalo kute ummango uphawule ngalo.

src_text: Sena se bontsha hore Bukana ena a sebediswa mme dula hlahlojwa kgafetsa..     Mopresidente fetiseditse Bukana ena ya Melemo ya Matona ho Khomishene Ikemetseng ya Meputso ya Ditho tsa Palamente ho lekola, komishene ena ke yona sebetsanang le meputso ya basebetsi bohle ba mmuso maemong phahameng     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo ibeka isethi yetinyatselo letifanele kutsi titsatfwe letitawukhutsata futsi tisekele besifazane kutemidlalo iphindze futsi icinisekise kutsi kunetinhlelo tekubukana nekungafani kwebulili emitsetfweni nasetinhlakeni tetemidlalo..     Iphindze ibukane netihibe tekungena kwebesifazane kutemidlalo njengekushoda kwetimali, lusito kanye nekungaholi ngalokwenele.

src_text: Moralo wa Leano la Basadi ba Dipapading.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo lehlongotwako ihlose kukhutsata kwandza kwekutibandzakanya kwebesifazane kutemidlalo netebuholi njengekucecesha nekuphatsa..     Lenchubomgomo yemukela kutsi kwandza kwekutibandzakanya kwebesifazane kutemidlalo nasetikhundleni tebuholi kutawuncipha kakhulu bese kutsi ekugcineni kucedze kungalingani ngekwebulili kanye netinhlobo letehlukene tekubandlululwa kwebesifazane.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kenngwa ha Moralo wa Leano la Basadi ba Dipapading bukaneng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa tshwaelo ya setjhaba.
tgt_text: Iphindze futsi ikhutsate kulingana kanye nekucinisekisa kutsi besifazane batfola kuhlonishwa noma kunakwa ngekwebungcweti betemsebenti, lokufaka ekhatsi nemiholo lelinganako njengebalingani babo labadvuna.

src_text: Leano lena le hlakisa letoto la mehato tla ntshetsapele le ho tshehetsa basadi dipapading le ho netefatsa hore mananeo teng bakeng sa ho rarolla phapang ya bong mefuteng le mekgatlong ya dipapadi.
tgt_text: Kungeniswa Kwengcungcutsela Yemave Emhlaba Yetemphilo Yabomake Netinswane Letisandza Kutalwa Yanga-.

src_text: Leano lena le boetse le sebetsana le ditshitiso tsa ho kena ha basadi dipapading tse kang kgaello ya ditjhelete, tshehetso ya ditjhelete le meputso sa lekaneng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi igunyate kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ingenise Ingcungcutsela Yemave Emhlaba Yetemphilo Yabomake Netisandzakutalwa (tinswane Letisandza Kutalwa) letawubanjelwa eKapa kucala mhla ti-8 kuya kumhla ti-11 Inkhwekhweti 2023, lapho khona badlalindzima labavela emhlabeni jikelele labangetulu kwalaba-1 000 batawube babutsene kute kutsi baphutfumise ludzaba lwetisombululo tekwenta kancono kuphila kwabomake netinswane tabo letisandza kutalwa kanye nekuvikela kutalwa kwebantfwana sebashonile..     INingizimu Afrika yente inchubekelembili lenkhulu ekufezekiseni tinjongo teNtfutfuko Lesimeme yaMhlabuhlangene (i-UN) yetemphilo yamake nesisandzakutalwa sakhe, kanye nekuvikelwa kutala umntfwana asashonile.

src_text: Leano le sisintsweng le rerile ho kgothaletsa bonkakarolo bo mahlahahlaha bo eketsehileng ba basadi dipapading le mesebetsing ya boetapele kang ya ho kwetlisa le ho okamela.
tgt_text: Lelive lakitsi litawuzuza kakhulu ngoba titfunywa talengcungcutsela titawukwabelana, emkhatsini walokunye, emasu ato lasebentako kanye netintfo letinsha letitsintsa imphilo yamake nesisandzakutalwa.

src_text: Leano lena le shebile ho theha bonkakarolo bo eketsehileng ba basadi dipapading le maemong boetapele bo tla fokotsa haholo mme qetellong bo fedisitse ho se lekane ha bong le mefuta fapaneng ya kgethollo kgahlano le basadi.
tgt_text: Umklamo Wendlela Yetemafa Emzabalazo Nenkhululeko (i-RLHR).

src_text: Le boetse le batla ho phahamisa tekatekano le ho netefatsa hore basadi ba fumana tlhompho kapa kananelo maemong profeshenale, ho kenyeletswa le meputso lekanang le bomphato ba bona ba banna..     Ho tshwara Seboka sa Matjhaba sa Bophelo bo Botle ba Baimana le Masea sa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko lonemininingwane yenchubekelembili mayelana nekucala kusetjentwa kwemklamo we-RLHR.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tshwarelwa ha Seboka sa Matjhaba sa Bophelo bo Botle ho Baimana le Masea mane Kapa ho tloha ka la 8 ho isa ka la 11 Motshehanong 2023 moo ho tla kopana teng bankakarolo ba fetang 1 000 ho tswa lefatsheng ka bophara ho tla le ditharollo mathateng boimana le ho thibela ho hlokahala ha masea le ho thibela ho ho tsholoha ha mpa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yagunyata kutsi Indvuna yeTebudlelwane Bemave Emhlaba Nekubambisana kanye Netebulungiswa Nekucondziswa Kwesimilo babe yincenye yeLikomidi Letindvuna (i-IMC) le-RLHR..     Lomklamo we-RLHR ungumklamo wesikhumbuto savelonkhe lokuhloswe ngawo kutsi kukhunjulwe futsi kugujwe umkhosi wendlela yeNingizimu Afrika leya enkhululekweni.

src_text: Aforika Borwa entse kgatelopele kgolo mabapi le ho fihlella dipehelo tsa Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tse Kopaneng (UN) bakeng sa bophelo bo botle ba baimana le mo ho thibeleng ho tsholoha ha mpa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi isungule i-IMC kutsi yengamele lomklamo futsi isite ngebuholi betepolitiki.

src_text: Naha le yona tla una molemo moholo ha baemedi ba dikopano ba tla arolelana hara tse ding, maano bona hlwahlwa mabapi le ditaba tsa bophelo bo botle ba baimana le masea..     Morero wa Resistance and Liberation Heritage Route (RLHR).
tgt_text: Loluhlelo luhlose kufaka tinhlobo letehlukene tesikhumbuto sekutinikela kwebalweli benkhululeko kute kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ikhululeke futsi ibe nentsandvo yelinyenti.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tlaleho felletseng ya kgatelopele mabapi le ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha morero wa RLHR.
tgt_text: Iphindze ivumele kwakhiwa kwemisamo, ematje esikhumbuto, imitapolwati netilulu temilandvo, futsi ihlose kucaphela umoya welubumbano nekubambisana emkhatsini kwema-Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete hape tjhaetse monwana hore Letona la Dikamano le Tshebedisano ya Matjhaba le la tsa Toka le Tlhabollo ya Batshwaruwa be karolo ya Komiti ya Matona (IMC) RLHR.
tgt_text: Igunyatwe yi-UN futsi inemandla ekucinisa kubambisana emkhatsini webantfu kusetjentiswa lisiko nemagugu kulo lonkhe lelivekati..     Imisebenti leminyentana leyentiwe nga-2022 ifaka ekhatsi kuvakasha kweNdvuna eBotswana naseZimbabwe kanye nekuhlela imihlangano ne-Angola kanye neTanzania..     Imisebenti lemayelana nalomsebenti ihlose kuchumanisa onkhe emave aseNingizimu ne-Afrika futsi ifundzise bantfu labasha ngemzabalazo wekulwa nebukoloni kanye nekubandlululwa ngekwelibala.

src_text: RLHR ke projeke ya sehopotso ya naha reretsweng ho ikgopotsa le ho keteka tsela ya Afrika Borwa isang tokolohong.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo ngalokufanako ivumela kubuyiselwa ekhaya kwematsambo ebalweli benkhululeko baseNingizimu Afrika labangcwatjwa kulamanye emave.

src_text: Kabinete thehile IMC ho okamela morero ona le ho fana ka boetapele ba dipolotiki.
tgt_text: Kunemangcwaba lalinganiselwa kula-11 ebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika lakhonjiwe eZambia, lafaka ekhatsi elishanhlitiyo neLichawe lemzabalazo lokunguMnu.

src_text: Morero ona habile ho kenyelletsa mekgwa fapaneng ya sehopotso sa boitelo boo balwanedi ba tokoloho ba bo entseng hore Afrika Borwa lokolohe fumane le demokrasi boetse dumella kaho ya dimusiamo, difika, dilaeborari le dipolokelo, mme ikemiseditse ho ananela moya wa kopano le tshebedisano-mmoho hara Maafrika amohetsoe ke Matjhaba Kopaneng mme na le monyetla wa ho matlafatsa tshebedisanommoho pakeng tsa batho ka ho sebedisa setso le lefa ho phatlalla le kontinente.
tgt_text: Duma Nokwe..     Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekufaka Tebuciko, Temasiko Netemafa Kudijithali.

src_text: Mesebetsi mengata etsahetseng ka 2022 kenyeletsa maeto Matona ho leba Botswana le Zimbabwe ha mmoho le ho rera dikopano le Angola le Tanzania.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kuphunyeleliswa kweNchubomgomo Yavelonkhe yeKufaka Tebuciko, Temasiko Netemafa Kudijithali.

src_text: Diketso tse mabapi le morero ona di ikemiseditse ho hokahanya dinaha tsohle tsa Afrika ka Borwa le ho ruta batjha ka ntwa kgahlano le bokoloniale le kgethollo ya morabe.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo iphindze futsi iphumelelise Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekwentiwa Kwetinsita Tetemafa kutsi tibe teDijithali lokwasungulwa Litiko Letebuciko Netemasiko nga-.

src_text: Leano lena le lona le fana ka tumello ya ho kgutlisa masalla balwanedi ba tokoloho ba Afrika Borwa ba patilweng dinaheng tsa kantle.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo igcila ekufakeni tinsita tetemafa kutedijithali ngekwenhloso yekutilondvolota, kufinyeleleka kanye nekulawulwa kwebuniyo.

src_text: Mabitla ka bang 11 tsebahalang le Maafrika Borwa fumanwe Zambia, ho kenyeletswa le la mohale wa ntwa Monghadi Duma Nokwe.
tgt_text: Nanoma-nje kukwenta kube kwedijithali kuyinchubo yekugucula lokucuketfwe kwe-analogi kube ngulokucuketfwe kwedijithali, lokufaka ekhatsi emarekhodi eliphepha, i-microfiche kanye nekucoshwa kwematheyiphu langasiwe ekwedijithali, lenchubomgomo ikhulise lenchazelo emitfonjeni yetedijithali njengelwati lolukhicitwe ngekwedijithali, lolungeke luguculwe lube simo salokuphatsekako.

src_text: Leano la Naha la Dijithale ho tsa Bonono, Setso le Botjhaba.
Kabinete amogetse Leano la Naha la Dijithale ho tsa Bonono, Setso le Botjhaba ho ka kengwa tshebetsong.
tgt_text: Kwentiwa kube kwedijithali kutawuba tinzuzo letinkhulu kulelive njengoba kutawusita kufinyelela kalula emitfonjeni yelwati, ikakhulukati leyo lephetfwe tilululwati, imitapolwati kanye nemisamo.

src_text: Leano lena le fana ka phaello eketsehileng Leanong la Naha la phetolelo ho tsa Dijithale ha Disebediswa tsa Bonono ho ntlafaditsweng ke Lefapha la Bonono le Setso ka.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo itawusetjentiswa kuhulumende wonkhe kanye nasemmangweni wonkhe     Umtsetfosivivinyo.

src_text: Leano lena le tsepamisitse maikutlo hodima ho kenya mehlodi ya lefa la dijithale ka sepheo sa ho boloka, phihlello le taolo ya beng.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tetebulungiswa Wanga-.

src_text: Le hoja phetolelo ena ya dijithale le mokgwa wa ho fetolela ditaba tsa analogue hore be tsa dijithale, mona ho kenyeletswa direkoto tsa pampiri, di-microfiche le direkoto tsa theipi tseo seng tsa dijithale, leano le atolositse le tlhaloso ena ho mehlodi meng ya dijithale jwalo ka tlhahisoleseding hlahiswang ka mokgwa wa dijithale kannang ya se ke ya fetolwa sebopeho sa boyona.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tetebulungiswa wanga-.

src_text: Ho etsa dijithale ho tla ba le melemo meholo bakeng sa naha ka ha ho tla fana ka phihlello bonolo ho mehlodi ya tlhahisoleseding, haholoholo tshwerweng ke dipolokelo, dilaeborari le dimusiamo.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kuchibela Imitsetfo leminyenti lesetjentiswa Litiko Letebulungiswa NeMtsetfosisekelo ngekulungisa tindzaba tetebucwepheshe kanye netindzaba letitsintsa kusetjentiswa mbamba kweMitsetfo..     LoMtsetfosivivinyo ucuketse tindzinyana letinge-37 letihlongota tichibelo kute kutsi kulungiswe kungahambi kahle ngekwemtsetfosisekelo kwaleMitsetfo leyehlukahlukene     Imikhosi Letako.

src_text: Leano lena le tla kenngwa tshebetsong ho phatlalla le mmuso le setjhaba     Tshisinyo ya molao.
tgt_text: Lilanga Lemalungelo Eluntfu.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Tokiso ya Ditaba tsa Boahlodi ya.
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utawetfula inkhulumo yelilanga emkhosini wavelonkhe weLilanga Letemalungelo Eluntfu langa-2023 ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-21 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 eNkhundleni Yetemidlalo  Enshonalanga yeDe Aar, eNyakatfo Kapa..     Ingcikitsisicubulo  itsi: “Kuhlanganisa Nekusimamisa Lisiko Lelilungelo Leluntfu Kuchubekela Embili Kulikusasa”, lapho sikhumbula kubulawa ngesibhuku nangebunyenti kwebantfu baseSharpeville nebakaLanga, kanye naleminye imishuco leyaba khona mhla tinge-21 Indlovulenkhulu 1960 kulo lonkhe lelive lakitsi.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho phatlalatswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Tokiso ya Ditaba tsa Boahlodi wa 2023 Palamenteng.
tgt_text: Singuhulumende, sichubeka nekutinikela etibopheni tetfu temtsetfosisekelo tekuvikela emalungelo eluntfu abo bonkhe bantfu balelive letfu.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya Molao ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa Melao fapafapaneng okametsweng ke Lefapha la Toka le Ntshetsopele ya Molaotheo ka ho sekaseka diketso tse tobaneng le ho kengwa tshebetsong ha melao eo.
tgt_text: Asisebente sonkhe ngekubambisana kutsi kungabikhona lesimshiya emuva ekwenteni imigomo yeMtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996 kanye neMculu Wemalungelo ube yintfo lephilwa mbamba yawonkhewonkhe..     Lilanga Lemhlaba Lemanti.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena na le dikarolo tse 37 tse lokisang mathata molaotheo melaong fapafapaneng     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika itawugubha Liviki Lemanti kusukela mhla tinge-20 kuya kumhla tinge-26 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 ngaphasi kwengcikitsisicubulo letsi: “Kusheshisa Ingucuko”..     Leliviki lihlangana neLilanga Lemhlaba Letemanti mhla tinge-22 Indlovulenkhulu 2023, legcamisa kubaluleka kwemanti lahlantekile.

src_text: Letsatsi la Litokelo tsa Botho.
tgt_text: Nanoma-nje kube netimvula letinkhulu etindzaweni letinyenti talelive, iNingizimu Afrika iyachubeka nekuba live leleswela emanti futsi isezingeni le-30 lemave lome kakhulu emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya sehlooho ketsahalong ya naha ya Letsatsi la Ditokelo tsa Botho la 2023 ka Labobedi la la 21 Tlhakubele 2023 Lebaleng la Dipapadi la De Aar West, Kapa Leboya.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi icele tonkhe takhamuti kutsi tivikele imitfombo yetfu yemanti leligugu kakhulu njengetihlambo, njengoba tibaluleke kakhulu ngoba tingumtfombo wesikhatsi lesidze.

src_text: Mookotaba wa selemo sena ke: “Ho Kopanya le ho Tshwara Setso sa Ditokelo tsa Botho ho Isa Bokamosong”, ha re ntse re hopola dipolao tsa Sharpeville le Langa, le mehwanto meng etsahetseng ka la 21 Tlhakubele 1960 naheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Sonkhe sinendzima lesifanele kutsi siyidlale songe emanti kanye nekucinisekisa kutsi imitfombo yetfu ayipheli..     Lilanga Lemhlaba Lesifo Semaphaphu  (i-TB).

src_text: Jwalo ka mmuso, re dula re itlamme boikarabelong ba molaotheo ba ho sireletsa ditokelo tsa botho tsa batho bohle naheng.
tgt_text: Sekelamengameli Paul Mashatile utawetfula inkhulumo yelilanga ngelilanga lekukhunjulwa ngalokusemtsetfweni kweLilanga Lemhlaba Le-TB mhla tinge-24 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 ngaphasi kwengcikitsisicubulo letsi: “Yebo!

src_text: Ha re sebetseng mmoho ho netefatsa hore ha re siele motho morao mabapi le ho etsa dipehelo tsa Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 le Bili ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ho phethahala ho bohle.
tgt_text: Wena ukanye Nami Singayicedza i-TB”..     Lomkhosi losemtsetfweni lotawubanjelwa eNkhundleni Yetemidlalo i-Thlabane eNyakatfonshonalanga utawuphindze futsi ube sikhatsi sekutsi Umkhandlu Wavelonkhe WaseNingizimu Afrika Wete-AIDS kanye neLitiko Letemphilo wetfule Luhlelobuciko Lwavelonkhe Lwekusebenta lwanga-2023 kuya ku-2028 lwe-TB, i-HIV kanye neTifo Letitsatselwana Ecansini.

src_text: Letsatsi la Lefatše la Metsi.
tgt_text: Loku kwakhela kunchubekelembili lenkhulu letfolwe ngekugcila kabusha ekuvikeleni, ekwelapheni, ekutsatseni, ekufinyeleleni kanye nasekutfobeleni, kanye nekucedza lubandlululo nekukhishwa inyubatana  Imilayeto.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwaya Beke ya Naha ya Metsi ho tloha ka la 20 ho isa la 26 Tlhakubele 2023 tlasa mokotaba: “Re Potlakisa Phetoho”.
tgt_text: KuhalaliselaIkhabhinethi yendlulisela kuhalalisa netilokotfo letinhle: Ecenjini lema-Protea kwanyalo langenise ema-West Indies mayelana neluvakasho lolumkhakhaminyenti.

src_text: Beke ena tsamaisana le Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Metsi ka la 22 Tlhakubele 2023, le totobatsang bohlokwa ba metsi hlwekileng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi imema bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi besekele licembu lema-Protea ngesikhatsi lichubeka liphakamisa umjeka wetfu.

src_text: Ho sa tsotellehe dipula tse matla tsa moraorao tjena dikarolong tsa naha, Afrika Borwa ntse le naha hlokang metsi mme maemong bo 30 dinaha tse omeletseng ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng.
tgt_text: Emavi endvudvuto Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ekulilela nekudvudvuta imindeni nebangani: I-MEC yeTemfundvo yaseFree State Tate Makgoe (60), lowafaka ligalelo lelikhulu kakhulu emkhakheni wetemfundvo futsi wahola ngemphumelelo iFree State kutsi itfole lizinga lekuphumelela kamatekuletjeni lelisetulu kakhulu iminyaka lemine lelandzelanako.Mk.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba ho sireletsa mehlodi ya rona ya metsi bohlokwa haholo paballong ya metsi.
tgt_text: Maurencia Gillion, lobekamelele Inshonalanga Kapa kuMKhandlu Wavelonkhe Wetifundza, futsi lobekasebenta kuLikomidi Lavelonkhe Letifundza leTemphilo Netenhlalakahle.

src_text: Kaofela re na le karolo eo re lokelang ho bapala ho baballeng metsi le ho netefatsa hore phepelo ya ona ha fele.
tgt_text: Bekasishikashiki lesatiwa kakhulu futsi ubasebentele kakhulu bantfu baseNshonalanga Kapa, ikakhulu betindzawo tasemaphandleni, iminyaka leminyenti.UMnu.

src_text: Letsatsi la Matjha la Lefuba (TB).
tgt_text: John Wills (66), lobekasishikashiki futsi angummeli wetemalungelo ebantfu lobekatiwa kakhulu lowamelela baholi betembusave labanyenti, kufaka ekhatsi Mengameli wesikhatsi lesendlulile Nelson Mandela.UMnu.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente Paul Mashatile tla fana ka puo ya sehlooho nakong ya sehopotso sa semmuso sa Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Lefuba ka la 24 Tlhakubele 2023 tlasa mokotaba: “E!
tgt_text: Mark Pilgrim (54), lobekawetindzaba lowafaka inshisekelo waphindze futsi wakhutsata bantfu labanyenti embonini yetindzaba.

src_text: Nna le wena re ka fedisa TB”.
tgt_text: Mk.

src_text: Ketsahalo ya semmuso tla ba Lebaleng la Dipapadi la Tlhabane ho la Leboya Bophirima mme Lekgotla la Naha la AIDS la Afrika Borwa le Lefapha la Bophelo bo Botle ba tla thakgola Moralo wa Lewa la Naha bakeng sa TB, HIV le Mahloko Tshwaetso ka Thobalano bakeng sa 2023 ho isa ho.
tgt_text: Gloria Bosman (50), umhlabeleli nemcambi wetingoma te-jazz eNingizimu Afrika lowatfola tindondo letinyenti     Kubekwa EtikhundleniKutawucinisekiswa ticu tetemfundvo nekuhlola kufaneleka kwabo bonkhe lababekwe etikhundleni.

src_text: Sena se ahella hodima kgatelopele kgolo fihlelletsweng ka tjantjello ntjhafaditsweng hodima thibelo, kalafo, ho amohela, ho latela melao, le ho fedisa kgethollo le sekgobo     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Emalunga Emkhandlu Wetekweluleka Baphatsi Betikimu Tematayitela Etincenye     Adv.

src_text: Diteboho Kabinete fetiseditse ditebohiso le ditakaletso tse molemo ho:Proteas bao ha jwale ba amohelang West Indies bakeng sa leeto la mefuta mengata.
tgt_text: Boyce Mkhize (Sihlalo)     Hosi Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Sekelasihlalo)     Mk.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho Maafrika Borwa ho tshehetsa Proteas jwalo ka ha ba tswelapele le ho phahamisa folakga ya naha ya habo rona..     MatshidisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso ho ba lelapa le metswalle ya:Letona la Thuto la Foreisetata Tate Makgoe (60), ya kentseng letsoho haholo lekaleng la thuto mme etella pele Foreisetata ka katleho ho fihlela sekgahla se phahameng ka ho fetisisa sa ho pasa ha baithuti ba materiki dilemong tse nne tse latellanang.Mme Maurencia Gillion, ya neng emetse Kapa Bophirima Lekgotleng la Naha la Diprofensi, mme sebetsa Komiting Ikgethileng ya Ditshebeletso tsa Bophelo bo Botle le Setjhaba ne le moitseki ya tsebahalang mme sebeletsa batho ba Kapa Bophirima, haholo dibakeng tsa mahaeng profensing eo, ka dilemo tse ngata.Ntate John Wills (66), mmuelli ya tummeng wa ditokelo tsa botho le molwanedi ya neng emela baeteledipele ba sepolotiki ba kenyeletsang Mopresidente wa mehleng Nelson Mandela.Ntate Mark Pilgrim (54), raditaba ya tummeng ya bileng le tshusumetso kgolo indastering ya boraditaba.Mme Gloria Bosman (50), sebini le moqapi wa mmino wa jazz wa Afrika Borwa ya hapileng dikgau tse ngata     KhiroPele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.
tgt_text: Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana     UMnu.

src_text: Ditho tsa Lekgotla la Keletso la Tsamaiso ya Merero ya Dithaetlele tsa ho ba le Matlo     Moatevokate Boyce Mkhize (Modulasetulo)     Hosi Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Motlatsi wa Modulasetulo)     Mme Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana     Ntate Pieter Jacobus De Beer     Moatevokate Nomonde Nokuthula January     Ntate Iqbal Mohamed Motala; le     Ngaka Vuyisani Moss.
tgt_text: Pieter Jacobus De Beer     Adv.
